# Public Good Beer 🍺

![](https://i.imgur.com/Wfgt1Ye.png)
‎ 
## A brand born from a culture 🍻

A cc0 beer, label, and recipe. But more than that – a brand that reflects the culture.

Public Good's goal is to bring the culture of cc0 and public good into the world of consumer products, putting Nouns in the spotlight as a leader in this movement.

Real products amplify visibility and legitimize the ecosystem outside of crypto Twitter, facilitating the onboarding funnel and paving the way for the flywheel to work beyond speculation. 

We are going global. And the first step has been taken.
‎ 
## First phase: done! ✅

💡 This first phase wasn’t funded by NounsDAO.
‎ 
![](https://i.imgur.com/LrFagUj.png)
‎ 

✅ Public Good brand development
✅ Prospecting partners
✅ cc0 beer recipe creation
✅ Label design and production
✅ Canning of 3500 cans of Public Good IPA
✅ Website creation ([access now](https://publicgood.wtf))
✅ Metaverse onboarding experience by Voidge with free Public Good beer module for related communities ([access now](https://voidge.com/publicgood) - desktop only)
✅ NFT airdrop for supporters and buyers
✅ Lens handle airdrop for early supporters
✅ All resources available on [cc0-lib.wtf ](https://cc0-lib.wtf/ )
✅ Free technical consulting and upgrade of company e-commerce to accept cryptocurrencies
✅ Launch campaign with influencers funded by [FOODNOUNS](https://prop.house/foodnouns/open-kitchen-rounds/4282) (0.25 ETH) and [Cryptoadz](https://snapshot.org/#/cryptoadz.eth/proposal/0xfd727bbf5c5f8fec37b96ce7de6d8ce12dcd7aa12e4fa026b0bffbbc25860076) (0.25 ETH)
✅ Two main crypto events sponsorship in Brazil

- BTC Pizza Day, Porto Alegre - 170 Attendees ([media](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1pE7UDpaEauN8EECnBInMP-CVe4XFMgTg))
- NFT Brazil, São Paulo - 20k Attendees ([watch video](https://twitter.com/PublicGoodBeer/status/1669666576985997312))

A few months ago, Narcose was just another award-winning craft brewery. But now it is leading a global movement that it has pioneered. They accept crypto as a form of payment in their e-commerce, have tokenized experiences, have a metaverse, and see this new market as a point of differentiation. Now they are innovators AND BUILDERS, promoting the Nouniverse to all their stakeholders.

![](https://i.imgur.com/jZkSfr9.png)

![](https://i.imgur.com/HDOViNt.png)

![](https://i.imgur.com/rSak9r8.png)

![](https://i.imgur.com/yovNFDQ.gif)

![](https://i.imgur.com/DxPb6M0.png)

![](https://i.imgur.com/2gdcu5z.png)

![](http://i.imgur.com/AOgiihd.gif)
‎ 
*Check out our module in Voidge Metaverse 👉 [voidge.com/publicgood](https://voidge.com/publicgood)*
‎ 
![](http://i.imgur.com/F9XkmLk.gif)

![](https://i.imgur.com/xGZGzJ3.png)
‎ 
Shout out to the amazing network of collaborators who believed in the cc0 culture, joined forces, and made it all possible:

fabioseva.eth (Coordination and Design), jp.⌐◨-◨ (Operations and Marketing), Narcose (Beer Production), Viking (Malt and Hop Supplier), **[Buidler.it](http://buidler.it/)** (NFT Launchpad), **[Voidge.com](http://voidge.com/)** (Metaverse Development), **[BPague.com](http://bpague.com/)** (Crypto Payment Gateway), BTC Pizza Day Porto Alegre (Event), NFT.Brasil (Event), FOODNOUNS (Funding), Cryptoadz (Funding), Lens Protocol (Handles Giveaway), **[Gotas.Social](http://Gotas.Social)** (Loyalty/Engagement) and Nounish Punk (Game).
‎ 
## An opportunity to scale 🌐

![](https://i.imgur.com/IJHYa1z.png)
‎ 
The first phase proved that beer is an excellent product to start proliferation on a global scale. We are seeking funding to expand our actions in three complementary strategic directions:

1) New regions 📍
2) Proper marketing in Brazil 🇧🇷
3) New product categories 👀

**1) New regions 📍**
‎ 
![](https://i.imgur.com/4iKllzi.png)
‎ 
Narcose is already part of a network of regular collaborative breweries, through which it markets its beers in the US and Europe. We will take Public Good Beer to these markets, also integrating them into our onboarding ecosystem and turning them into real Nouns builders.

We are asking for 4350 USDC for label printing, marketing material, initial beer production (minimum 1500 cans/bottles), and aftermovies/content production FOR EACH of our partners:

**Canil** (Portugal) 🇵🇹 - already committed to 1500 bottles and will launch in October, ahead of various crypto events such as ZKdevsummit, Dune Con, ETH Lisbon, EBS2023, Nearcon and Web Summit, all happening in November.

**Stillwater Brewery** (Seattle) 🇺🇸
**Against the Grain** (Kentucky) 🇺🇸
**Wooden Ship** (Minneapolis) 🇺🇸
**Brewski** (Sweden) 🇸🇪
**Bierol** (Austria) 🇦🇹

If breweries exclusively produce the subsidized batch, Nouns' maximum cost per can or bottle, which includes premium beer, label printing, a launch event, and ongoing marketing and sales throughout the batch, is only 2.90 USD. Should the brewery opt for a larger batch, as is the case in Brazil, or produce a second batch independently, this cost significantly decreases.

Additionally, the impact of the funding goes beyond a single event. It serves as a **catalyst for wider influence and regular integration of Nouns into everyday culture.** This is evident in the growing number of [reviews](https://untappd.com/b/cervejaria-narcose-public-good-ipa/5389905) on the popular Untappd app (over 70 to date), spontaneous shares on social media, adoption by various Gnars-related activities in Brazil, featuring in the Nounish Punk game, and our successful production management in Portugal.

👉 **Accelerating Public Good Beer expansion not only brings legitimacy but also sustains a lasting cultural impact for Nouns.**

**BUDGET: 6x 4350 = 26100 USDC**

![](https://i.imgur.com/jvG8dTb.png)
‎ 
**2) Proper marketing in Brazil 🇧🇷**
‎ 
International expansion will not be instantaneous, as it demands a free schedule in the industry. In this period, we take advantage of the remaining inventory of over 3000 cans produced. 

Despite the success of Phase 1, we believe we haven’t reached the full IRL proliferation potential for such a pioneer project. We had 0.5 ETH for everything (sub-300 cans and a very short-scale marketing activation). Thus, the proposed expansion would bring the deserved impact and tons of resources for further promotion of the Nouniverse.

We are requesting 4350 USDC per quarter for the next six months to fund the activities below. We commit to at least one IRL event every quarter, but given the rapid growth of the Nouns community in Brazil, we anticipate numerous opportunities to engage with new fans.

- Public Good Beer distribution
- Marketing materials (shirts, stickers, temporary tattoos, and more)
- Brand activations
- Professional media production

**BUDGET: 2x 4350 = 8700 USDC**

![](https://i.imgur.com/5JpkcCz.gif)
‎
**3) New product categories 👀**
‎ 
Beyond beer, we have the opportunity to extend the portfolio to two synergic brands/categories:

a) BBQ sauces - for the weekly beer-fueled barbecues we do in Brazil; and
b) Sunscreen - for our community along 7637 km of coastline, with bikinis, surf stars, and sunglasses ⌐◨-◨ 

We would like to allocate a total budget of 5000 USDC for working on this as the project progresses. Alongside this, we also have the coordination and maintenance of the activities during the period of six months at a cost of 6000 USDC.

**BUDGET: 11000 USDC**
‎ 
## Roadmap

![](https://i.imgur.com/S9KqgmZ.png)
‎ 
## Team

fabioseva.eth
jp.⌐◨-◨ 

We are very excited to keep spreading the cc0 culture and bringing companies on board with us. A huge shoutout and heartfelt thanks to everyone who's supporting the project, either by engaging online or drinking the beer IRL. Don't forget to follow [@PublicGoodBeer](https://twitter.com/publicgoodbeer) on Twitter for all the latest updates. Cheers to a future of collaboration and doing good!
‎ 
## Budget

**45800 USDC (~ 28 ETH)**

![](https://i.imgur.com/LHIh5Aw.gif)

![](https://i.imgur.com/HUBuh7p.gif)

*Sponsor's Note: (ccarella.eth)*

*As an enthusiast for Public Goods, I am thrilled to sponsor this proposal onchain. It's incredibly satisfying to witness a tangible representation of the Public Goods brand. With its CC0 recipe, distinctive branding, and collaboration with various breweries, this project stands out as an innovative venture that extends the reach of the meme. It also encourages people to contemplate the importance of both CC0 and Public Goods.*

# Villa Nouns  

## Summary

![ 3D Render](https://i.postimg.cc/Ght7nkVh/DEFINITIVO-4-K.jpg)

We’re transforming a villa by the sea in Italy into the first-ever Nouns vacation rental.

Imagine a living art gallery, where nounish NFTs, items, and projects are not just showcased but become the center of a unique experience. Villa Nouns aims to be the ultimate destination for Nouns fans and newcomers alike, a place that blurs the line between onchain and offchain.

More than a place to stay, our goal is to create a highly curated, customisable, Nouns-themed venue open to all. By encouraging innovation, art, education and fun experiences, Villa Nouns will reflect the Nouns values and ethos in the real world, while meeting the growing demand for immersive experiences inside and outside of the Nouns community. 

**How it works**

- **Book** your stay on Airbnb, or onchain from villanouns.wtf.
- **Access** the villa with your wallet, and share access with others onchain. No physical keys needed.
- **Explore** the spaces to discover and interact with the Nouns universe.
- **Buy** nounish furniture, items or NFTs directly at the villa, with your Ethereum wallet.

Revenue generated from bookings and sales of nounish items will be partly channeled back into the Nouns treasury, as well as shared with partnering communities and Nouns owners.

**Timeline**

We plan to complete all work in 12 to 24 weeks and start welcoming guests by 2024.

**Team**

- **Management**: Led by the villa owner, an experienced property developer.
- **Development**: Carried out by dlabs, known for working on projects like Nouns Agora, Optimism, Slice and Juicebox.
- **Design and art**: Made by skilled architects, designers and artists.
- **Community**: Nouns owners and communities will be able to partner up with us and become sponsors of the project, further customising the spaces at the villa.

**Funding request**

We request 153 ETH to give the villa a nounish makeover, cover operational expenses for 1 year, as well as ensure guests have a highly curated experience.

The villa in its present state is already a sought-after location in the area. Renovating it will only add to its popularity, so execution risks are minimal.

The primary goal of this project is to explore the potential of a nounish vacation destination, gauging both demand and impact, while keeping risks and costs low for the DAO.

The villa will stay Nouns-themed for at least 2 years, and possibly indefinitely. This fact together with the growth potential and the future plans outlined below further help justifying the expense.

**Future plans**

The proposal aims to fund the redesign of the villa and cover operational costs, but our commitment doesn’t stop there. In the coming months we’ll explore the following areas, either autonomously or with further support from the DAO:

- **Nounish home goods**: In collaboration with artists and designers, we’ll craft a line of items and furniture inspired by Nouns. They'll first appear at Villa Nouns and then will be available for everyone to buy, helping to proliferate the Nouns vibe far and wide.
- **Activities for everyone**: We’ll offer a range of activities to enhance the guest experience further. Think pools, sports areas, dining spots, and curated outdoor adventures for kids and adults.
- **Builders retreats**: During the low-season we plan to host artists, hackers, and creators to brainstorm and build on nounish ideas, free of charge. Leveraging Prop House for the selection process, Villa Nouns will be temporarily turned into a hub sparking innovative projects and fostering connections in the Nouns ecosystem.
- **More spaces, more stories**: We plan to open more properties locally and around the world, especially in places rich in art and culture. It’s not just about expanding — it's about building a global community that shares the Nouns spirit.
- **Franchise model as a public good**: Keeping in line with the CC0 spirit, we’ll be opening doors for property owners to become part of Villa Nouns, while ensuring quality through a rigorous review by our team.
- **Decentralized ownership**: If the concept proves successful and Nouns DAO wishes to double down on the initiative, it will be possible for the DAO to own or co-own the estate.

![2.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/fy280LtN/2.jpg)

---

## The nounish experience

![Villa_Nouns_Gate.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/m2Zxzzn0/Villa-Nouns-Gate.jpg)

References to many past and future Nouns projects will be integrated with the interiors of the villa and the surrounding natural environment. 

Guests will be able to read the Nouns comic, ride Gnars skateboards or surfboards, watch the Nouns movie, learn the history of Nouns, and more. Furthermore, holders of Nouns and derivatives will enjoy an even more personalised experience, customising screens and interiors of the villa based on their NFT holdings.

Certain areas of the house like the bedrooms will be themed on specific Nouns or derivative collections. The overall experience will also evolve over time due to feedback and new projects in the Nouns ecosystem.

Most items at the villa will be Nouns themed, like towels, cutlery and home accessories, and some will also be gifted to guests. Among the nounish objects, furniture and decorations, we also plan to build suggestive stone mosaics and murals made by artists in the Nouns community. 

![_final.gif](https://i.postimg.cc/TPDBMryW/final.gif)

**Booking and entering the villa**

![main.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/cHc90Td6/main.jpg)

Guests will be able to book the villa on Airbnb, or directly onchain through a custom booking website on [villanouns.wtf](http://villanouns.wtf).

The villa can be accessed by connecting the wallet on-site and verifying the purchase. Other wallets can also be appointed by the buyer to unlock the villa using delegate.cash.

![iphone mock.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/BntdNW4p/iphone-mock.jpg)

---

## The villa and location

![1.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/VLh7fJP9/1.jpg)

Villa Nouns is an elegant villa located in Sardinia offering stunning views over the La Maddalena Archipelago, one of Italy's most coveted tourist destinations.

The spacious interior is designed for relaxation and focus, while the outdoor patio and large private garden are perfect for enjoying al fresco dining, relaxing in the Jacuzzi, or immersing in nature.

![Villa_Nouns_Backyard.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/T2JM3qtV/Villa-Nouns-Backyard.jpg)

The villa includes a large living room with a sofa bed, four bedrooms (three with queen beds, two of which have en-suite bathrooms, and one with twin beds), and three bathrooms with hydromassage showers.

Features a 1250 sqm garden, a heated four-person Jacuzzi, high-speed Starlink internet connection, heating and air conditioning, and private parking for up to two cars.

**The location**

![locations.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/htH3rfC4/locations.jpg)

The villa is located in the heart of Costa Smeralda between the picturesque port town Palau and the popular spot Roccia dell’Orso. Its prime location provides easy access to beautiful beaches and renowned attractions.

The spectacular Maddalena islands, are just a short boat ride away, while the prestigious Porto Cervo and Porto Rotondo are conveniently close, making it the perfect location to enjoy the most evocative places Sardinia has to offer.

See more on [villanouns.wtf/gallery](http://villanouns.wtf/gallery)

**Financial aspects**

The villa has been rented out for several years, with rates between $50 and $110 per person per night based on the season. This generated on average $60k of revenues a year, mainly during summer.

By renovating the villa and adding a private pool, we expect an increase in demand and in turn revenues and prices — especially during summer. During the low season, the villa may also be repurposed for events and host other activities related to Nouns, allowing experimentation with alternative revenue models.

---

## Roadmap

**October 2023 - December 2023**
- Villa Nouns refurbishment and redesign
- Development of website and on-chain booking experience

**From January 2024**
- Open bookings at [villanouns.wtf](http://villanouns.wtf) and start welcoming guests

---

## Funding request

![expenses.png](https://i.postimg.cc/J0mfQGzH/expenses.png)

**Villa redesign and refurbishment - 59 ETH**

- [Renovation] Allocate 45 ETH to upgrade the villa's interior and exterior to incorporate Nouns-themed objects, decorations, furniture, NFT displays, and other technologies to make the guests experience unique.
- [Professional services] Architects, interior designers and artists involved in the redesign process

**Operational costs - 42 ETH**

- Hire personnel and a villa manager to ensure a smooth nounish experience to guests all year round, as well as handle bookings, communications, maintenance.
- All operational and management costs involved in bringing Villa Nouns to fruition.

**Development - 40 ETH**

- [Website and contracts integration] Build the [villanouns.wtf](http://villanouns.wtf) platform, with an innovative onchain booking experience.
- [On-site technology] Make a smart lock which allows access based on onchain bookings, as well as develop and fine-tune the interactive experience at the villa.

**Marketing and promotional material - 12 ETH**

- Create material to promote Villa Nouns as the ultimate nounish destination, such as drone and showcase videos, and professional photo shoots.

**Total ask: 153 ETH**

---

PS. Villa Nouns is already accepting booking requests on [villanouns.wtf](http://villanouns.wtf) **⌐◨-◨**

# Elect 24 Nouns "Gardeners" as the Voting Body for Nouns' Prop House Open Rounds

## TLDR

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/B1WFfT30n.png)

Let's kickstart the Prop House (PH) open rounds again by branding them as the "Nouns Garden" (to make them more fun and memeable) and run a mandated PH round to elect 24 "Gardeners" to vote on the DAO's behalf in these rounds.

_Note: This prop was ideated by Noun 40 and was developed in collaboration with seneca. Artwork was created by [Facu](https://twitter.com/facuserif)._

---

## Context

Early in Nouns' history, PH open rounds served an important role within the Nouns ecosystem. It was a place where new builders could receive a few ETH for their early to mid stage ideas with less governance overhead. It was also a way for the DAO to create open competition around a not-too-big commitment of ETH spending, and allow the DAO to harvest the long-tail of ideas rather than being limited to what makes it onchain.

However, over the rounds, voter attention waned and PH open rounds started to show its governance weakness. Unlike onchain props where every large voter ultimately paid attention to every prop and voted when necessary, PH open rounds started to go largely unattended. What's worse, rounds increasingly ran the risk of being arbitrarily determined by whichever large voter decided to engage in a given round.

As a result, the PH open rounds lost much of its legitimacy and we were unable to continue funding through it. Towards the end, we were running 2.5 ETH single-winner rounds every other week, funding a grand total of 5 ETH(!) per month through PH. The last round's outcome—[Open Round 21](https://prop.house/nouns/open-round-21)—was determined by a single large voter as the sole voter of the winning prop.

---

## Proposal

Let's kickstart the PH open rounds again branding them as the "Nouns Garden" (to make them more fun and memeable) and run a mandated PH round to elect 24 "Gardeners" to vote on the DAO's behalf in these rounds.

Representative voting should allow for a more attentive class of voters to vote on each open round while the election ensures that the DAO voters still indirectly maintain influence over the outcomes of PH open rounds. 

## More details:

**The Art:**
The gardener art work was completed by [Facu](https://twitter.com/facuserif) and funded using PH team's funds.


![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BJyrigaCn.png)


**Minting & Distribution:**
This proposal mints 24 Nouns Gardener NFTs initially going to the [garden-admin multisig](https://etherscan.io/address/0xD94F65a9BFa4Fcb04FFbc0A64687667FcB28110e) managed by Noun 40 and seneca. If this prop goes through, the PH team will run the Gardener election mandate round. The winners will then be sent the Gardener NFTs which will serve as the voting token in the Nouns Garden rounds. 


**Gardener Selection:**
The Gardener position should be open to nouners and non-nouners alike and everyone that's interested in having fun doing civic service for the dao is welcome to run for the position!

It's desirable that the PH layer doesn't end up with an entirely disjoint set of voters from the onchain prop voters. Ideally, there's a lot of overlap and as a result the props that win funding at the PH layer will have a good chance of success receiving continued funding onchain if they continue to execute well.

The Gardener position will be re-elected at a 3 month cadence. 6 months or a year feels like forever in Nouns time. 2 months feels too frequent.

**Gardener Compensation:**
The Gardener position will be volunteer roles without specific compensation (outside of the NFTs!)

There's a notion that delegate positions should be paid b/c reading props and voting is "work". However, not all civic service positions are better performed when paid, and there's also definitely fun and prestige in serving as a PH delegate of the DAO. This proposal intends to explore the potential of representative voting at the PH layer without adding financial incentives into the mix.

**Gardener Voting Power:**
Each Gardener will have the equal voting power (10 votes to spread across props in each round). If we start to observe bad behavior amongst Gardenders such as collusion or self-dealing, then we could institute quadratic voting where the cost of voting for the same prop multiple times goes up linearly such that it is harder to effectuate collusion or self-dealing. We're proposing to start with the simple voting scheme so that we don't unnecessarily introduce complexity.

**Gardener Count:**
24 was chosen as a size that is materially larger than committee sizes we explored in the past with NSFW (4-10) and DCS pod (5), as to assuage the concern (or perception) that a few people can be influenced to sway outcomes, while also ensuring that the Gardener election is likely to be competitive. It is not hard to imagine that we can elect two dozen worthy candidates. It is not clear that we could elect fifty. 

**Garden Rounds:**
Nouns Garden rounds will start off as 5 ETH x 2 winners (10 ETH) rounds every other week. 

Two 10 ETH rounds a month still amounts to a very small percentage of our overall funding allocated through PH open rounds. We spent around ~900 ETH per month the past year, so 20 ETH would be ~2% of our spending rate. Ideally, the open-ended, lower friction, competitive, mid-tail funding the PH open rounds promise can scale further to be 10-20% of our spending, but we likely shouldn't start where we want to end up. We should scale up as builders return to PH and rounds remain competitive even as more funding goes through.

Once the PH protocol is launched, the DAO could vote on these parameters concretely. For now, we have to trust the PH team to execute these rounds.

**Garden Funding:**
Nouns DAO has granted the Prop House team a total of 550 ETH over the last 2 years to direct towards Nouns DAO related rounds of which 160 ETH remain. These funds will be used towards the first quarter of Nouns Garden (60 ETH).

**Miscellaneous:**
If the Nouns Garden is successful and continues after the first quarter, each quarter we will mint new Gardener NFTs such that Gardeners can continue to own their old NFTs as an object that holds provenance of their service. We would not expect Gardeners to transfer or sell their NFTs to someone else before the quarter is over given their reputation is at stake.

# Nouns Meetups

![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafybeiesm2sbkxovkjh2xwigdntehw3i2zre5vwdv6nuobjjdvj3odlkeq)

## TLDR

This candidate proposal invites nouners to nominate monthly meetup hosts, via the pre-proposal feedback mechanism, after which edits can be made to include them in the attached transactions. Eg. 3 ETH for first meetup, followed by a 5 month stream of 3 ETH, to continue facilitating meetups, for a 6 month experiment (each) in total.

## Introduction

There's so many Nounsfolk residing in different cities around the world. Since the early bitcoin days, meetups have helped people gather around emerging crypto movements. Nouns should be no different, so let's exploit the full feature set of candidate proposals, and source hosts for  in their cities.

## People among Places doing Things

We've all come to appreciate the power of IRL events, but until recently, we've focused mostly on top-down gatherings. I'm proposing a grassroots movement of intimate local meetups of Nounsfolk around the world. Each host would be streamed 3 ETH per month for facilitating such, with 1.5 ETH as remuneration and the remaining 1.5 ETH for expenses. 

## One Meet, Every Month, Forever

I can imagine discussions around Web3 evolving into in-person Prop House pitches, Nounish hackathons, builder support groups, and some epic brainstorming sessions. If genuine grassroots movements begin to emerge from various cities around the world, we'd be fine tuning our serendipity machine with a breadth of healthy competition. Facilitators would be encouraged to source and host other builders from outside the Nouniverse and do their best to record, document, and broadcast panel discussions, AMA sessions, workshops, and whatever else they can dream up.

## Nouns Meetup Sydney

I'd like to request 3 ETH to host an inaugural meetup alongside [SXSW Sydney](https://sxswsydney.com/) during 15-22 October 2023. Followed by a 3 ETH monthly stream starting 1 November 2023, for a trial period of 5 months (a total of 6 months if you include the pilot event). To make the absolute most of what candidate proposals have to offer, I'd also like to invite pre-proposal feedback, including nominations for whoever else is interested in hosting a monthly Nouns Meetup in their city.

## Lets Meet?

Opt-ins from 12 locations for example, would cost us 36 ETH per month over 6 months, for a total of 216 ETH. As nominations are received and interest is confirmed, this proposal can be edited with nominee details and associated transactions, prior to being sponsored and going onchain for voting.

Shall we call it in?

[Gami](https://gami.wtf)

*Note: there's a bug with stream setup, so have omitted from attached transactions, and it can be added later during further iterations of this candidate proposal. Details have been sent to developers.*

*Update: Ripe has shipped a Pull Request to address the above issue.*

# Elect 24 Nouns "Gardeners" as the Voting Body for Nouns' Prop House Open Rounds

## TLDR

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/B1WFfT30n.png)

Let's kickstart the Prop House (PH) open rounds again by branding them as the "Nouns Garden" (to make them more fun and memeable) and run a mandated PH round to elect 24 "Gardeners" to vote on the DAO's behalf in these rounds.

_Note: This prop was ideated by Noun 40 and was developed in collaboration with seneca. Artwork was created by [Facu](https://twitter.com/facuserif)._

---

## Context

Early in Nouns' history, PH open rounds served an important role within the Nouns ecosystem. It was a place where new builders could receive a few ETH for their early to mid stage ideas with less governance overhead. It was also a way for the DAO to create open competition around a not-too-big commitment of ETH spending, and allow the DAO to harvest the long-tail of ideas rather than being limited to what makes it onchain.

However, over the rounds, voter attention waned and PH open rounds started to show its governance weakness. Unlike onchain props where every large voter ultimately paid attention to every prop and voted when necessary, PH open rounds started to go largely unattended. What's worse, rounds increasingly ran the risk of being arbitrarily determined by whichever large voter decided to engage in a given round.

As a result, the PH open rounds lost much of its legitimacy and we were unable to continue funding through it. Towards the end, we were running 2.5 ETH single-winner rounds every other week, funding a grand total of 5 ETH(!) per month through PH. The last round's outcome—[Open Round 21](https://prop.house/nouns/open-round-21)—was determined by a single large voter as the sole voter of the winning prop.

---

## Proposal

Let's kickstart the PH open rounds again branding them as the "Nouns Garden" (to make them more fun and memeable) and run a mandated PH round to elect 24 "Gardeners" to vote on the DAO's behalf in these rounds.

Representative voting should allow for a more attentive class of voters to vote on each open round while the election ensures that the DAO voters still indirectly maintain influence over the outcomes of PH open rounds. 

## More details:

**The Art:**
The gardener art work was completed by [Facu](https://twitter.com/facuserif) and funded using PH team's funds.


![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BJyrigaCn.png)


**Minting & Distribution:**
This proposal mints 24 Nouns Gardener NFTs initially going to the [garden-admin multisig](https://etherscan.io/address/0xD94F65a9BFa4Fcb04FFbc0A64687667FcB28110e) managed by Noun 40 and seneca. If this prop goes through, the PH team will run the Gardener election mandate round. The winners will then be sent the Gardener NFTs which will serve as the voting token in the Nouns Garden rounds. 


**Gardener Selection:**
The Gardener position should be open to nouners and non-nouners alike and everyone that's interested in having fun doing civic service for the dao is welcome to run for the position!

It's desirable that the PH layer doesn't end up with an entirely disjoint set of voters from the onchain prop voters. Ideally, there's a lot of overlap and as a result the props that win funding at the PH layer will have a good chance of success receiving continued funding onchain if they continue to execute well.

The Gardener position will be re-elected at a 3 month cadence. 6 months or a year feels like forever in Nouns time. 2 months feels too frequent.

**Gardener Compensation:**
The Gardener position will be volunteer roles without specific compensation (outside of the NFTs!)

There's a notion that delegate positions should be paid b/c reading props and voting is "work". However, not all civic service positions are better performed when paid, and there's also definitely fun and prestige in serving as a PH delegate of the DAO. This proposal intends to explore the potential of representative voting at the PH layer without adding financial incentives into the mix.

**Gardener Voting Power:**
Each Gardener will have the equal voting power (10 votes to spread across props in each round). If we start to observe bad behavior amongst Gardenders such as collusion or self-dealing, then we could institute quadratic voting where the cost of voting for the same prop multiple times goes up linearly such that it is harder to effectuate collusion or self-dealing. We're proposing to start with the simple voting scheme so that we don't unnecessarily introduce complexity.

**Gardener Count:**
24 was chosen as a size that is materially larger than committee sizes we explored in the past with NSFW (4-10) and DCS pod (5), as to assuage the concern (or perception) that a few people can be influenced to sway outcomes, while also ensuring that the Gardener election is likely to be competitive. It is not hard to imagine that we can elect two dozen worthy candidates. It is not clear that we could elect fifty. 

**Garden Rounds:**
Nouns Garden rounds will start off as 5 ETH x 2 winners (10 ETH) rounds every other week. 

Two 10 ETH rounds a month still amounts to a very small percentage of our overall funding allocated through PH open rounds. We spent around ~900 ETH per month the past year, so 20 ETH would be ~2% of our spending rate. Ideally, the open-ended, lower friction, competitive, mid-tail funding the PH open rounds promise can scale further to be 10-20% of our spending, but we likely shouldn't start where we want to end up. We should scale up as builders return to PH and rounds remain competitive even as more funding goes through.

Once the PH protocol is launched, the DAO could vote on these parameters concretely. For now, we have to trust the PH team to execute these rounds.

**Garden Funding:**
Nouns DAO has granted the Prop House team a total of 550 ETH over the last 2 years to direct towards Nouns DAO related rounds of which 160 ETH remain. These funds will be used towards the first quarter of Nouns Garden (60 ETH).

**Miscellaneous:**
If the Nouns Garden is successful and continues after the first quarter, each quarter we will mint new Gardener NFTs such that Gardeners can continue to own their old NFTs as an object that holds provenance of their service. We would not expect Gardeners to transfer or sell their NFTs to someone else before the quarter is over given their reputation is at stake.

Furthermore, I wish to extend mine hand in assistance, particularly in matters of design, being the possessor of Noun 35 (initially pondering delegation, but the path appeared labyrinthine).

As the venerable Uncle Ben once spoke, "With great power comes great responsibility," and I hold in high esteem the ethos of donning the Noggles. From a distance, I have been an observer and contributor for some time, and in this year, I have grown more entwined with the Lil Nouns DAO. # Villa Nouns  

## Summary

![3D Render](https://i.postimg.cc/wvPnykQT/DEFINITIVO-4-K-2.jpg)

We’re transforming a villa by the sea in Italy into the first-ever Nouns vacation rental.

Imagine a living art gallery, where nounish NFTs, items, and projects are not just showcased but become the center of a unique experience. Villa Nouns aims to be the ultimate destination for Nouns fans and newcomers alike, a place that blurs the line between onchain and offchain.

More than a place to stay, our goal is to create a highly curated, customisable, Nouns-themed venue open to all. By encouraging innovation, art, education and fun experiences, Villa Nouns will reflect the Nouns values and ethos in the real world, while meeting the growing demand for immersive experiences inside and outside of the Nouns community. 

**How it works**

- **Book** your stay on Airbnb, or onchain from villanouns.wtf.
- **Access** the villa with your wallet, and share access with others onchain. No physical keys needed.
- **Explore** the spaces to discover and interact with the Nouns universe.
- **Buy** nounish furniture, items or NFTs directly at the villa, with your Ethereum wallet.

Revenue generated from bookings and sales of nounish items will be partly channeled back into the Nouns treasury, as well as shared with partnering communities and Nouns owners.

**Timeline**

We plan to complete all work in 12 to 24 weeks and start welcoming guests by 2024.

**Team**

- **Management**: Led by the villa owner, an experienced property developer.
- **Development**: Carried out by dlabs, known for working on projects like Nouns Agora, Optimism, Slice and Juicebox.
- **Design and art**: Made by skilled architects, designers and artists.
- **Community**: Nouns owners and communities will be able to partner up with us and become sponsors of the project, further customising the spaces at the villa.

**Funding request**

We request 153 ETH to give the villa a nounish makeover, cover operational expenses for 1 year, as well as ensure guests have a highly curated experience.

The villa in its present state is already a sought-after location in the area. Renovating it will only add to its popularity, so execution risks are minimal.

The primary goal of this project is to explore the potential of a nounish vacation destination, gauging both demand and impact, while keeping risks and costs low for the DAO.

The villa will stay Nouns-themed for at least 2 years, and possibly indefinitely. This fact together with the growth potential and the future plans outlined below further help justifying the expense.

**Future plans**

The proposal aims to fund the redesign of the villa and cover operational costs, but our commitment doesn’t stop there. In the coming months we’ll explore the following areas, either autonomously or with further support from the DAO:

- **Nounish home goods**: In collaboration with artists and designers, we’ll craft a line of items and furniture inspired by Nouns. They'll first appear at Villa Nouns and then will be available for everyone to buy, helping to proliferate the Nouns vibe far and wide.
- **Activities for everyone**: We’ll offer a range of activities to enhance the guest experience further. Think pools, sports areas, dining spots, and curated outdoor adventures for kids and adults.
- **Builders retreats**: During the low-season we plan to host artists, hackers, and creators to brainstorm and build on nounish ideas, free of charge. Leveraging Prop House for the selection process, Villa Nouns will be temporarily turned into a hub sparking innovative projects and fostering connections in the Nouns ecosystem.
- **More spaces, more stories**: We plan to open more properties locally and around the world, especially in places rich in art and culture. It’s not just about expanding — it's about building a global community that shares the Nouns spirit.
- **Franchise model as a public good**: Keeping in line with the CC0 spirit, we’ll be opening doors for property owners to become part of Villa Nouns, while ensuring quality through a rigorous review by our team.
- **Decentralized ownership**: If the concept proves successful and Nouns DAO wishes to double down on the initiative, it will be possible for the DAO to own or co-own the estate.

![3D Render](https://i.postimg.cc/wvz0Smvj/2-final.jpg)

---

## The nounish experience

![Villa_Nouns_Gate.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/m2Zxzzn0/Villa-Nouns-Gate.jpg)

References to many past and future Nouns projects will be integrated with the interiors of the villa and the surrounding natural environment. 

Guests will be able to read the Nouns comic, ride Gnars skateboards or surfboards, watch the Nouns movie, learn the history of Nouns, and more. Furthermore, holders of Nouns and derivatives will enjoy an even more personalised experience, customising screens and interiors of the villa based on their NFT holdings.

Certain areas of the house like the bedrooms will be themed on specific Nouns or derivative collections. The overall experience will also evolve over time due to feedback and new projects in the Nouns ecosystem.

Most items at the villa will be Nouns themed, like towels, cutlery and home accessories, and some will also be gifted to guests. Among the nounish objects, furniture and decorations, we also plan to build suggestive stone mosaics and murals made by artists in the Nouns community. 

![_final.gif](https://i.postimg.cc/TPDBMryW/final.gif)

**Booking and entering the villa**

![main.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/cHc90Td6/main.jpg)

Guests will be able to book the villa on Airbnb, or directly onchain through a custom booking website on [villanouns.wtf](http://villanouns.wtf).

The villa can be accessed by connecting the wallet on-site and verifying the purchase. Other wallets can also be appointed by the buyer to unlock the villa using delegate.cash.

![iphone mock.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/BntdNW4p/iphone-mock.jpg)

---

## The villa and location

![1.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/VLh7fJP9/1.jpg)

Villa Nouns is an elegant villa located in Sardinia offering stunning views over the La Maddalena Archipelago, one of Italy's most coveted tourist destinations.

The spacious interior is designed for relaxation and focus, while the outdoor patio and large private garden are perfect for enjoying al fresco dining, relaxing in the Jacuzzi, or immersing in nature.

![2.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/fy280LtN/2.jpg)

The villa includes a large living room with a sofa bed, four bedrooms (three with queen beds, two of which have en-suite bathrooms, and one with twin beds), and three bathrooms with hydromassage showers.

Features a 1250 sqm garden, a heated four-person Jacuzzi, high-speed Starlink internet connection, heating and air conditioning, and private parking for up to two cars.

![Villa_Nouns_Backyard.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/T2JM3qtV/Villa-Nouns-Backyard.jpg)

**The location**

![locations.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/htH3rfC4/locations.jpg)

The villa is located in the heart of Costa Smeralda between the picturesque port town Palau and the popular spot Roccia dell’Orso. Its prime location provides easy access to beautiful beaches and renowned attractions.

The spectacular Maddalena islands, are just a short boat ride away, while the prestigious Porto Cervo and Porto Rotondo are conveniently close, making it the perfect location to enjoy the most evocative places Sardinia has to offer.

See more on [villanouns.wtf/gallery](http://villanouns.wtf/gallery)

**Financial aspects**

The villa has been rented out for several years, with rates between $50 and $110 per person per night based on the season. This generated on average $60k of revenues a year, mainly during summer.

By renovating the villa and adding a private pool, we expect an increase in demand and in turn revenues and prices — especially during summer. During the low season, the villa may also be repurposed for events and host other activities related to Nouns, allowing experimentation with alternative revenue models.

---

## Roadmap

**October 2023 - December 2023**
- Villa Nouns refurbishment and redesign
- Development of website and on-chain booking experience

**From January 2024**
- Open bookings at [villanouns.wtf](http://villanouns.wtf) and start welcoming guests

---

## Funding request

![expenses.png](https://i.postimg.cc/J0mfQGzH/expenses.png)

**Villa redesign and refurbishment - 59 ETH**

- [Renovation] Allocate 45 ETH to upgrade the villa's interior and exterior to incorporate Nouns-themed objects, decorations, furniture, NFT displays, and other technologies to make the guests experience unique.

# Aburra (fka Alphacaster): Nouns x Farcaster

TL;DR: Requesting 28 ETH for Aburra (formerly Alphacaster) to explore the frontier of Nouns x Farcaster and build a best-in-class web3 social app. 50% retro and 50% forward funding (via streaming).


### Overview

Farcaster represents a unique opportunity to decentralize Nouns communication and bring Nounishness to more onchain organizations.

At Aburra, we have been building at the intersection of Nouns and Farcaster since early 2023 and have won Nouns Hack Week for our MVP v1 in April.

Today, Aburra has evolved significantly since its v1. In addition to being both a Nouns client and a Farcaster client, it allows anyone to host Farcaster spaces where listeners can directly vote for proposals.

![Aburra iOS](https://i.imgur.com/Fm3kQS3.png)


Our ambition is not just to create the best Nouns client, but to make all DAOs more Nounish by helping them communicate on top of an open and permissionless protocol (i.e. Farcaster).

We also hope to use this prop to see what is possible when you combine two of the best web3 ecosystems - we want to push towards a future where open communication protocol is favored over Discord and Twitter.



### What Aburra has delivered so far

**Applications developed**
- [Alphacaster.xyz](https://Alphacaster.xyz) and WebView-based mobile apps ([iOS](https://testflight.apple.com/join/JLPtu4r8) and [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=xyz.alphacaster.app) - to be combined with the new app): DAO-specific Farcaster feed, governance notifications, enhanced proposal pages with cast-based comments etc.
- A proposal bot ([@alphabot](https://warpcast.com/alphabot)) to convert all props, votes, auctions and propdates into casts
- Beta Aburra app ([iOS](https://testflight.apple.com/join/uLiAhdUA) and web): Been testing it for two weeks and it now supports Farcaster space with native DAO integrations (proposal and voting)

![Nounish Emoji Reactions in Aburra](https://i.imgur.com/RQCt0fz.jpg)

**Current traction**
- Aburra has become the default way for Farcaster users to consume proposals and votes. In the last 30 days, it had 3.9K unique visitors. It also has Warpcast [integrations](https://warpcast.com/dwr.eth/0x3cec05).
![](https://i.imgur.com/oT7WtK7.png)

- Since we started testing the new app 2 weeks ago, we've hosted 8 Farcaster spaces for Nouns, Purple and Nouns Builder. 70 users have installed the [app](https://testflight.apple.com/join/uLiAhdUA). More Nounish spaces are in the [pipeline](https://warpcast.com/toadyhawk.eth/0x64bd48).
![](https://i.imgur.com/rXUDxAX.png)

### Plan for the next 3 months
- Full integration with Farcaster channels, including reading Nouns channel directly in
the app (and in any space)
- Phase out the old Alphacaster app and merge all functionality into Aburra: this
includes implementing everything (governance feed, proposal pages etc.) natively,
instead of using WebView, which will significantly improve UX
- Better space UX, with native DAO features (NFT minting, droposal, smoother voting etc.)
- Integrate with more Nounish DAOs (and others!)
- Launch Android



### Team

Aburra has 2 full-time team members, billzh.eth ([@billzh](https://warpcast.com/billzh) on FC) and blingbling.eth ([@16](https://warpcast.com/16) on FC). Both of us are experienced developers and have built production-grade consumer applications.

So far we have received 12.9 ETH grants from Nouns Builder ([9 ETH](https://www.alphacaster.xyz/dao/BuilderDAO/prop/48)), Nouns Hack Week ([3 ETH](https://prop.house/nouns/hack-week-developers-developers-developers/5256)) and Warpcast ([~0.9 ETH](https://warpcast.com/v/0xd74872)).



### Ask

The ask is 28 ETH (0.2% of current treasury) to help us continue to build Aburra, specifically:
- 14 ETH retroactive funding for the past 4 months of developments (since our last Nouns BuilderDAO retro [funding](https://www.alphacaster.xyz/dao/BuilderDAO/prop/48)), paid via direct ETH transfer
- 14 ETH for the next 3 months of developments as outlined above, paid via ETH streaming

The team is lean and we are confident to deliver a top-tier application with significantly lower cost than comparable clients (House of Nouns at [95](https://nouns.wtf/vote/242) ETH, Agora at [220](https://nouns.wtf/vote/154) ETH and Prop Lot at [60](https://nouns.wtf/vote/244) ETH).

# DAOpunks: A retroactive Nounish DAO for the CryptoPunks community

# DAOpunks
*tl;dr - A generalized protocol to "Nounsify" any existing NFT collection, starting with the CryptoPunks community in the form of a Punker DAO*

![DAOpunks Landing Page Preivew](https://imgur.com/oJlSew2)

**Mainnet Launch:** Today, Sept 26th, 2023
**Website:** [daopunks.wtf](https://daopunks.wtf)
**Twitter:** [@daopunks](https://twitter.com/cdaopunks)
**Discord:** [join](https://discord.gg/daopunks)

# Nounsifying an Existing Collection

We believe (i) the Nouns model is the most innovative and sustainable model for NFTs to date, and (ii) it should be made available to retrofit any existing collection.

Thus, we forked Nouns DAO and added 3 new features:

1. **Attribute rarity** - attributes can be rendered in the daily artwork based on weighted probabilities.
2. **Duplication prevention** - a registry is used to index the attributes of existing NFTs, which prevents the `NSeeder.sol` contract from ever creating any repeat artwork.
3. **Treasury co-ownership** - two collections are permitted to co-govern the DAO treasury: the new, Nouns-based collection plus an additional, existing collection.

These three features allow any community of an existing NFT collection to "Nounsify" themselves by introducing new artwork and a continuous source of collective revenue.

# Scope
1. We've taken this protocol and developed it for the CryptoPunks community first: 

    i. **Attribute rarity** - one new DAO Punk will be generated per day. The rarity of attributes will be approximately the same as CryptoPunks.
    ii. **Duplication Prevention** - we indexed all 10,000 CryptoPunks. No DAO Punks will ever be a duplicate of a CryptoPunk. Once a DAO Punk is minted, it is added to the index to prevent its own duplication.
    iii. **Treasury co-ownership** - One CryptoPunk = 1 vote. One DAO Punk = 1 vote.

2. This protocol will be generalized in partnership with [Zora](https://twitter.com/ourZORA) and [Builder DAO](https://nouns.build/dao/ethereum/0xdf9b7d26c8fc806b1ae6273684556761ff02d422/265) via [Nouns Builder](https://twitter.com/nounsbuilder) to create a ***Collections+*** protocol for any existing NFT community to "Nounsify" itself.

# Why start with CryptoPunks?
CryptoPunks is the [largest NFT collection by market cap](https://nftpricefloor.com/?sort=ranking&dir=asc), but is communally, completely cash poor. CryptoPunks were released by [Larva Labs](https://www.larvalabs.com/) on June 23rd, 2017 with a free mint price and zero trading fees. As a result, no community funds were ever accumulated, and Punk holders are unable to do any of the cool things Nouns holders get to do today.

Because CryptoPunk holders are so high profile, yet financially incapacitated, they are particularly susceptible to adopt a retrofitted, self-sustaining mechanism, like Nouns. This provides an especially high probability of success with this experiment.

If we can demonstrate a successful execution of the Nouns protocol for the CryptoPunks community, it will serve as an inspiration for all other prominent (but potentially nascent) NFT collections to Nounsify themselves, too. The success of a DAOpunks collection could easily become one of the largest proliferators of the Nouns ethos, while simultaneously catalyzing widespread NFT coordination and market sentiment for select and willing communities.

# Request

* 100 ETH transferred to seed the Nounsified DAO treasury for the CryptoPunks + DAOpunks community, collectively known as the Punkers DAO.

## Reasoning

The request is effectively structured as a 100 ETH delegation to the owners of all CryptoPunks in exchange for them adopting the Nouns model and distributing funds with comparable intent (and vibes).

Similar to Zora's [proposal #167](https://nouns.wtf/vote/167), we are requesting that NounsDAO pay it forward rather than reimburse us for:

* approximately 50 ETH worth of development we paid out of our own pocket.
* 12 months of time we spent independently researching, developing, and fine tuning the first  *Collections+* implementation.

We do not want reimbursement, we want proliferation!

## Deliverables

In return for seeding 100 ETH into the Punker DAO, we will (or have already):

* Deploy the implementation for the CryptoPunks community to mainnet
* Open source the codebase of this first Collections+ implementation
* Open source the research we conducted on CryptoPunks in building this project
* Open source the research we've begun for other collections
* Generalize the protocol in partnership with Zora & Builder DAO via Nouns Builder
* Steward the Punker DAO initiatives & community

## Generalizing the Protocol

> "If I had to suggest only one short term focus after L2 it would be funding and generalizing the Punks+ work by [@cr](https://warpcast.com/cr). Show up to the website and start a canon DAO for any existing project."
>`-` [Jacob Horne](https://twitter.com/js_horne), Founder of Zora ^[https://warpcast.com/jacob/0xabeab6] ([see also](https://warpcast.com/jacob/0xd00662))

CryptoPunks are dramatically different than other NFT collections:

* They do not use the ERC721 standard - they use ERC20
* They have multiple, mutually exclusive sub-classes of traits
    * *Example: `{hair, hat}` are in the same sub-class*
* They have single-attribute (non-class based) rules of exclusion
    * *Example: `welding goggles` are `glasses` that can be worn with `hair` but not with a `hat`*
* They have multiple visual implementations of the same attribute
    * *Example: `vr glasses` have 2 different pixel patterns depending on if the punk is `female` or not*

These unique characteristics, which are not found in other collections, required us to create a lot of custom logic. As a result, our codebase is not yet immediately generalizable.

To achieve a generalizable state, we will work in cooperation with Zora and Builder DAO to port our architecture into their Nouns Builder protocol, which is already extremely accessible and widely adopted. This port will allow any NFT community to deploy their own Nounified DAO using Zora's intuitive, no-code tools.

# Team
* I am [CBob.eth](https://twitter.com/CBobRobison), founder of [meTokens](https://twitter.com/metokens) and former [Hoard](https://twitter.com/hoardexchange), [Golem Foundation](https://twitter.com/GolemFoundation), and OMG Network team member. I presented the first ever talk on NFT Utility at ETHBerlin in 2018, and have since spoken at DevCon, NFT.NYC, NIFTY (first ever NFT hackathon), the ECF’s Non-Fungible Summit, and more. I acquired [CryptoPunk #4330](https://cryptopunks.app/cryptopunks/details/4330) in 2018 for 0.15 ETH ($34 at the time).

* [FR3UD](https://twitter.com/FR3UD_) is the founder of the NFT Cambridge meetup and former Risk & Data Analyst at [Coinbase](https://twitter.com/coinbase), [Binance US](https://twitter.com/BinanceUS), [MoonPay](https://twitter.com/moonpay), and [Wyre](https://twitter.com/sendwyre). He is a day one holder of The Proof Collective pass and an active member of the Moonbirds community.
---

***Disclaimer**: this project is **NOT** affiliated with Yuga Labs. It has, however, received guidance from both the Yuga Labs legal team and their CryptoPunks division.*

# The Smallest Noggles Ever Made: A Micro-Sculpture by Dr. Willard Wigan MBE

Update (9/27/23):

Appreciate the interest Noun 40 and Brennen!  Responding to your feedback below:
- The micro-sculpture will simply be the Noggles in the middle of the eye of a needle. For this, it will take me about 9 weeks to create as I work on multiple projects at the same time.
- I’ve removed the part on highlighting 3 Nouns for sponsoring.
- Updated cost: 45 ETH. I will build this at-cost (microsculpture + Nouns-themed microscope display) and all proceeds will go to me - none to my foundation.

Very excited for this opportunity. Would love to get started on this as soon as possible!

--

Hi all, my name is [Dr. Willard Wigan MBE](https://youtu.be/zh5BMEyfmCI?feature=shared). I’m a [micro-sculpturist](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3YOdH2wqL9M) and I hold the record for creating the [world’s smallest sculpture](https://www.willardwiganmbe.com/world-records). 

![hello](https://i.imgur.com/KEcTQNg.png)
![youtube](https://i.imgur.com/1afCMCC.png)

Growing up for me was a little hard. I wasn’t too good at reading or writing as my autism and dyslexia made it incredibly difficult. Luckily, I was able to discover my hidden talent for creating small sculptures and since then I’ve achieved things I never thought I could. 

This brings me to Nouns - I love how you all support the creative arts with your treasury. My [foundation](https://www.thewiganfoundation.com/) is heavily focused on helping the youth to find FAAIR - Focus, Awe, Ambition, Inspiration, Resilience. Many of the projects and people in your community reflect the ideals that I strive to instill in the youth and that gets me excited to make this proposal to you all.

For this proposal, I want to turn the Noggles into one of my signature micro-sculptures. This will take me 9~ weeks to create. When I finish the sculpture, I will encase it in acrylic and place it in a custom Nouns-themed microscope display box. 

![tiny](https://i.imgur.com/ZeWpibE.png)

To make these sculptures, I hold my breath to slow down my heart rate and chisel in-between my heartbeats. Sometimes I use the tremors caused by my heartbeat to jackhammer the material. Much like how the Nouns are sculpting an infinite art piece with every onchain proposal, every vote and every Noun created every day.

I’m requesting 45 ETH to bring the Noggles micro-sculpture to life.

# Nouns Builder Awards

## TLDR
Every quarter, let's vote on past props to select four props worthy of being awarded a noun. Proposers of winning props will be able to claim a noun of their choice from the treasury along with ETH equivalent to 1/3 of the recent 30 day auction price to assist with the tax burden of being awarded a noun.

All props since inception should be eligible. Props are targets of voting in order to have an objective eligibility criteria as well as have the voting conversation centered around prop outcomes rather than people.

---

## Context

I've [long been an advocate](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/retro-house-retroactive-reward-house/1757) for some form of retroactive rewards towards our best props. It serves two goals of providing upside incentive that is missing currently (you're not financially incentivized to do well beyond just delivering the prop) along with providing a retrospective feedback moment that we can all learn from (all prop builders are incentivized to give good [prop updates](https://www.propdates.wtf/) since they want to win; nouns voters end up expressing onchain what props they value).

The last time we had a really concrete conversation around doing retroactive rewards for props was [this conversation](https://discourse.nouns.wtf/t/proposal-build-retro-house-retroactive-reward-house/1810/13). Yitong (pre-Agora) suggested leading this effort. It was well received as an idea but at the time we thought Prop House would ultimately handle retro rewards as well and decided to table implementation. Unfortunately, we got super side-tracked as a community and never really got to implementing something here. 

Season 3 is when we should finally make this happen. I suggest we have the prize be nouns since we now have a good amount in the treasury post-fork and because it feels right that nouns are also earnable in the world building game that is nouns beyond just only being up for purchase.

Another motivation is to reduce the burden of prop builders having to make the [awkward ask](https://www.nounsagora.com/proposals/371) of including nouns in their props. I would much rather it be proactively clear that if your prop is one of the best props of the quarter, you'll be getting a noun even without having made such negotiation ahead of funding.

Starting somewhere low to be safe (ensuring being awarded a noun is high status) while still not being too low (for example two per quarter) since we're also opening up all past two years of props as eligible as well.

# Nouns Stories + Stoopid Buddy = Shorts Galore

# 

## TLDR

On the heels of [Prop 180](https://nouns.wtf/vote/180)’s and [Prop 73](https://nouns.wtf/vote/73)’s overwhelming success, we’re rallying the creative forces once again on what promises to be our biggest and most impactful proposal yet. Nouns Stories is seeking $1,795,000 to develop, produce and distribute over 50 Animated Nouns Shorts on a global scale with nine time Emmy-Award winners Stoopid Buddy Stoodios, along with 50 of the best animators in the world.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SyIYuo7gp.png)

[Nouns Short Shorts Trailer](https://youtu.be/QxrvHepTh38)

## NOUNS: FRONT AND CENTER

Most sources of financing for animated content are tied to networks that move at a snail’s pace and that are not considered artist friendly. This is where Nouns steps in to disrupt the system. We want to provide the proper funding to attract the world’s best animators, help them bring their ideas to life, and in so doing — put Nouns DAO on the map as the number one source for innovative, diverse storytelling in animation. 

Not only that, but by making Nouns DAO the seed funder we’re putting the Nouns IP (and the brand’s aesthetic) front and center on a series of innovative and hilarious shorts that are bound to get massive amounts of attention with animation fans all around the world. What better way to spread the Nounish vibes and garner some positive attention?

## PERSON, PLACE & THING: 3 THEMATIC ROUNDS, 50 CREATORS, 1 YEAR

Over the course of the next twelve months we’ll onboard 50 of the world’s most innovate animators to create engaging animated shorts featuring great characters, engaging storylines, and Nounish vibes. By expanding the run times and upping the budgets, we’ll give the animators the opportunity to produce even MORE engaging visuals and storylines!

We’ll roll out the animated shorts over three themed rounds:

- Round 1 - stories about theme 1
- Round 2-  stories about theme 2
- Round 3 - stories about *theme 3*

Other than requiring the films to feature Nouns characters or Noggles, we’ll encourage the animators to go absolutely wild with the best and funniest ideas: the ones that may not exist within the walled gardens of Hollywood. Because not every artist has the bandwidth to produce longer form shorts, we’ll keep the short short 15 second+ format for some of our creators. 

In total the three themed rounds will feature:

- 12 x 2-3 minute S*horts*
- 38 x 15-30 second S*hort Shorts*
- 3 original shorts by the team at Stoopid Buddy

## 50 OF THE WORLD’S BEST

We’ll cast our net wide to onboard the best animators we can muster, and by allowing them the creative freedom to ***************do what they do***************, we believe we’ll get the very best out of them. Not only that, but many of these talented folks already have huge followings online which will further expose the Nouns DAO to their legions of fans when we go live with the shorts.

## 3 STOOPID SHORTS

To kick off each thematic round, Stoopid Buddy Stoodios will pour all of their Nouns-lovin’-energy (see: Rose Parade / forthcoming Nouns Documentary) into making something truly special for Nouns — a love letter in animation like only they can. They’ll tap their A-list Buddies to create and voice these fully original mini-movies, creating some hilarious cohesion to what promises to be a wildly eclectic program!

## CC0 Heroes

As we did in the first Nouns Short Shorts Festival, we’ll encourage each animator to embrace Nounish culture by opting in to making their shorts CC0. While it won’t be required, opting into to CC0 will make their films eligible for some damn [fine awards](https://twitter.com/nouns_stories/status/1670029456688418818) and cash prizes!

## OH YEAH…ONE MORE THING

We’ll be hosting a *Nountastic* IRL animation festival to premiere these amazing shorts, attracting Nounish animation fans from all over the world.   Why do this when we could just hide behind the safety of our computer monitors? Because as we experienced with the first screening at [Braindead Studios](https://studios.wearebraindead.com/) in Los Angeles (in conjunction with the Melbourne screening at Pixel), there’s an *energy* and *magic* to bringing communities together to share in a truly unique experience that will help put Nouns DAO on the map. We’ll invite all our industry pals, and will we live-stream the whole thing just as we did before? Abso-fucking-lutely!

## IMPACT: NETWORK EFFECT

The first round of shorts garnered over a million views in the first month of release. Most of these views were native to the creator channels of the animators themselves — providing a whole new audience for Nouns. This time around, we’ll not only continue to seek out animators with their own audiences, but amplify views across all platforms with a social media marketing campaign and enlisting a PR firm to bolster [awareness](https://www.animationmagazine.net/2023/07/stoopid-buddy-stoodios-chris-waters-unzips-about-the-nouns-short-shorts-festival/) of what we’re up to. On top of this, to build anticipation and excitment for the festival as the year unfolds, we'll create original promotional content, including teasers and trailers, behind the scenes footage, and creator profiles.

## THE NOUNS STORIES TEAM

**Stoopid Buddy Stoodios**

9 time Emmy-winning studio behind *Robot Chicken,* and producer of over 1,000 hours of animated television **including: *Crossing Swords, Mickey Saves Christmas, and Marvel’s MODOK.* Stoopid Buddy is a pioneering independent studio that has helped drive the tremendous growth in adult animation over the past decade. Co-founder Eric Towner and Head of Development Chris Waters have deep roots in the Nouns ecosystem. Their first proposal funded the Nouns Rose Parade Float (seen by over 30 million people) and both are producers of the forthcoming documentary about Nouns.

**Walter Newman**

Former SVP of program development at Adult Swim who oversaw such shows as Rick & Morty, Tuca and Bertie, Smiling Friends, Black Dynamite, and more. Walter brings network experience and a deep talent roster to the Nouns Stories team.

**Goldy** / **Pixel**

**[Goldy's](https://twitter.com/Goldypix)** Oscar-Shortlisted hybrid production studio is behind **[nounish ⌐◨-◨](https://twitter.com/nounish)** and the animated short film "**[The Wizards Hat](https://twitter.com/nouns_stories/status/1570433066900017152?s=20&t=T_vYbAun_YQEsZUlEwfjSA)**" from the original Nouns Stories proposal.

**Joshua Fisher**

Manager of Grammy-winning music producers, music publisher, SharkDAO Rep, Ugly Noun, The Nouns Square co-founder, Nouns DAO Builder and Nouns narrative advocate.

**Joel Cares**

CEO of **[Lobal Global](https://lobal.global/) / [ANOA](https://anoa.ca)**, creator of **[Nerman](https://twitter.com/nermanbot)**, founding member of **[Nouncil](http://nouncil.wtf/)**, creative director @ [**JoelCares.net**](https://joelcares.net).

## OUR ROLES

We’ve got the experience, knowledge, and relationships to successfully pull off this wildly ambitious proposal. Not only will we be identifying top-tier talent from our own networks of creators, but we’ll also be recruiting on a global scale to identify and onboard the next generation of up-and-coming animation talent.

We’ll be managing and coordinating a massive effort to create (literally) decentralized content and creatively packaging it in a way that connects with audiences around the globe. Not only that, but we’ll be tapping our extensive network to best position our exposure and distribution of the program online, at festivals, and beyond. We’ll be coordinating a social media / marketing and PR strategy, as well as presenting “behind the scenes” access and status updates to the DAO as this undertaking fully develops.

## BEYOND THE PROP

The Nouns Stories team has over 613,620 hours of experience in animation development, production, marketing, distribution and sales. Our team is well positioned to take these Nounish creations beyond what is promised in the proposal. Our hope is we can continue to develop the best-of-the-best beyond their existence as a short, and seed Nounish content and characters into the mainstream zeitgeist. Think about it — *The Simpsons*, *South Park*, *Rick & Morty*, and hell, even *Robot Chicken*, all got their start **********as animated shorts.**********

## THAT’S A WRAP!

Animation drives cultural conversation. There’s a white space in animation that Nouns DAO is uniquely positioned to fill. Nimble development. Artist friendly. Global reach. We believe there’s a more “Nounish” way to produce the next great animated shorts, and that we have the team to help find them and make them. 

For Nouns, there’s an opportunity to be front-and-center in one of the most passionate arenas in pop culture and create break-out successes that proliferate the meme.

Our team has poured our hearts and souls into the Nouns experiment since it’s inception, and we’ve proven we can develop world-class animation and execute on ambitious ideas. We believe in a new way of generating content and organizing passionate communities of creators and fans. Together we can change the culture and build Nouns DAO into the next great destination for animation, so slap on your dang Noggles and let’s do this!!

50% distributed upon commencement, 50% upon completion of first round.

# Aburra (fka Alphacaster): Nouns x Farcaster

TL;DR: Requesting 24 ETH for Aburra (formerly Alphacaster) to explore the frontier of Nouns x Farcaster and build a best-in-class web3 social app for the next 3 months. Payment via steaming.


### Overview

Farcaster represents a unique opportunity to decentralize Nouns communication and bring Nounishness to more onchain organizations.

At Aburra, we have been building at the intersection of Nouns and Farcaster since early 2023 and have won Nouns Hack Week for our MVP v1 in April.

Today, Aburra has evolved significantly since its v1. In addition to being both a Nouns client and a Farcaster client, it allows anyone to host Farcaster spaces where listeners can directly vote for proposals.

![Aburra iOS](https://i.imgur.com/Fm3kQS3.png)


Our ambition is not just to create the best Nouns client, but to make all DAOs more Nounish by helping them communicate on top of an open and permissionless protocol (i.e. Farcaster).

We also hope to use this prop to see what is possible when you combine two of the best web3 ecosystems - we want to push towards a future where open communication protocol is favored over Discord and Twitter.



### What Aburra has delivered so far

**Applications developed**
- [Alphacaster.xyz](https://Alphacaster.xyz) and WebView-based mobile apps ([iOS](https://testflight.apple.com/join/JLPtu4r8) and [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=xyz.alphacaster.app) - to be combined with the new app): DAO-specific Farcaster feed, governance notifications, enhanced proposal pages with cast-based comments etc.
- A proposal bot ([@alphabot](https://warpcast.com/alphabot)) to convert all props, votes, auctions and propdates into casts
- Beta Aburra app ([iOS](https://testflight.apple.com/join/uLiAhdUA) and web): Been testing it for two weeks and it now supports Farcaster space with native DAO integrations (proposal and voting)

![Nounish Emoji Reactions in Aburra](https://i.imgur.com/RQCt0fz.jpg)

**Current traction**
- Aburra has become the default way for Farcaster users to consume proposals and votes. In the last 30 days, it had 3.9K unique visitors. It also has Warpcast [integrations](https://warpcast.com/dwr.eth/0x3cec05).
![](https://i.imgur.com/oT7WtK7.png)

- Since we started testing the new app in early Sep, we've hosted 9 Farcaster spaces for Nouns, Purple and Nouns Builder. 80 users have installed the [app](https://testflight.apple.com/join/uLiAhdUA). More Nounish spaces are in [the](https://warpcast.com/aburra) [pipeline](https://warpcast.com/toadyhawk.eth/0x64bd48).
![](https://i.imgur.com/rXUDxAX.png)

### Plan for the next 3 months
- Full integration with Farcaster channels, including reading Nouns channel directly in
the app (and in any space)
- Phase out the old Alphacaster app and merge all functionality into Aburra: this
includes implementing everything (governance feed, proposal pages etc.) natively,
instead of using WebView, which will significantly improve UX
- Better space UX, with native DAO features (NFT minting, droposal, smoother voting etc.)
- Integrate with more Nounish DAOs (and others!)
- Launch Android

### Team

Aburra has 2 full-time team members, billzh.eth ([@billzh](https://warpcast.com/billzh) on FC) and blingbling.eth ([@16](https://warpcast.com/16) on FC). Both of us are experienced developers and have built production-grade consumer applications.

So far we have received 12.9 ETH grants from Nouns Builder ([9 ETH](https://www.alphacaster.xyz/dao/BuilderDAO/prop/48)), Nouns Hack Week ([3 ETH](https://prop.house/nouns/hack-week-developers-developers-developers/5256)) and Warpcast ([~0.9 ETH](https://warpcast.com/v/0xd74872)).


### Ask

The ask is 24 ETH (0.2% of current treasury) to help us continue to build Aburra for the next 3 months. That is, 8 ETH per month for a team of two.

The team is lean and we are confident to deliver a top-tier application with significantly lower cost than comparable clients (House of Nouns at [95](https://nouns.wtf/vote/242) ETH, Agora at [220](https://nouns.wtf/vote/154) ETH and Prop Lot at [60](https://nouns.wtf/vote/244) ETH).

# Retro Fund Wilson for Propdates & Refill Gas Refund Balance

[Wilson](https://twitter.com/WilsonCusack) built the initial [Propdates](updates.wtf) contract, which has been getting a lot of use and positive feedback from the community.

I propose retro funding Wilson 5 ETH for his work on the contracts, as well as refilling the Gas Refund which reimburses gas costs for updates posted on successful transactions. These costs hover around $2 per update. 0.5 ETH should have us covered for the foreseeable future.

[Propdates Contract](https://etherscan.io/address/0x94b4fb16893c0fb4e470eef2559c24fd87fed5f1)

# Gift Noun 542 to Bob Burnquist

![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafybeicmfhrpam75ycjyf7rjmvcern5f7ba4wn2xwlagryuyqq2jy2dreq)

**Requesting Noun 542 and 15000 USDC** to assist with the tax burden of being gifted a noun, to a [hardware wallet address](https://etherscan.io/address/0x3dfd76a87cf769275e5Bc8c4AB77e47D50eCDA49) retrieved from and owned by Bob Burnquist, the legendary Brazilian-American skateboarding hall of famer, and repeat Nouns DAO contributor.

## 🛹 Meet Bob

![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafybeidvgfdn65nvwugmodzlqumyvskclhpkjv5pdosdpe3rbwjqixz2oy)

[Bob Burnquist](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bob_Burnquist), a name that resonates with innovation, audacity, and unparalleled skill in the world of skateboarding. Born in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, Bob has not only transformed the skateboarding landscape but has also left an indelible mark on global culture. Gifting Noun 542, adorned with a skateboard head, to this skateboarding maestro would be a fitting tribute to his legacy.

## 💥 Cultural Impact

![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafybeifoecnwfhetsm3zpkw5342ai6v4lckbo2xmo7nkww45idczou6mfy)

▶️ *[Click here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?app=desktop&v=wlL4NPOrYck) to watch the above video*

Bob's influence transcends skateboarding. He's been a cultural icon, inspiring countless individuals to challenge the status quo and redefine boundaries. His Brazilian roots combined with his global appeal have made him a bridge between cultures, fostering understanding and appreciation for the sport across continents.

## 🧲 Media Magnet

![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafybeidet2efui2mxkiduurct3x2m2nc4ggemgvvsdhsmogoyczkfqkwki)

From video games like the iconic "Tony Hawk's Pro Skater" series to documentaries and live broadcasts, Bob's presence in media is vast. His Dreamland series, which showcased his private skatepark, was a testament to his creativity and became a viral sensation. His stunts, especially the heart-stopping Grand Canyon jump, have been broadcasted worldwide, further cementing his status as a skateboarding superstar.


## 💸 Charitable Endeavours

![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafybeia4t4k2zg6g3ptxxdfisowu7reisskj4rr5jm6jmq2njj7xbqpmwi)

Bob's heart is as big as his talent. Through his institutes and foundations, he has consistently worked towards the betterment of society. From promoting skateboarding among underprivileged kids to championing environmental causes, his philanthropic efforts are commendable.

## 🫂 Nounish Contributions

Bob's engagement with the NFT world and Nouns DAO is not just as an icon but as an active contributor. As a partner at **NFT Brasil**, he's at the forefront of integrating the vibrant city of São Paulo into the NFT landscape, with a robust collaboration planned in the coming year. 

![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafkreigxcco4jkqhbtj6kphjirdxgmno3cdwv7u5tohu2yc2ftseipdz6a)

His social program, **Skate Cuida**, is a testament to his commitment to community upliftment. Through this initiative, he's been onboarding individuals into the world of technology, offering programming classes, and witnessing transformative progress. The launch of [SkateboardingCares.com](http://SkateboardingCares.com), a collective that's making "concrete waves," is powered by [That's Gnarly](https://thatsgnar.ly) and further amplifies his dedication to merging skateboarding with technological advancements.

[![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafybeidmc4oopw35og6e37gtv7fpppurjnfm3zcrjfurymgwf76rnyknl4)](https://twitter.com/bobburnquist/status/1604636743332159488)

Bob's advocacy for the NFT space is evident in his active participation at various events. His recent presence at **Blockchain Rio** and the upcoming engagement at **Rio Innovation Week** from October 3-6 showcases his dedication to promoting the onchain world. With **Skateboarding Cares DAO** being a pivotal component, he's ensuring that the skateboarding community is intricately linked with the latest in blockchain tech.

![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafybeice6gg7is34tfvkx4iwbifdjcvg64fimxbjwgdfted44rpbikf274)

For those keen on tracking real-time updates on these endeavours, Bob's [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/bobburnquist/) and [Twitter](https://twitter.com/bobburnquist) both serve as a window into his contributions and the broader impact of these initiatives. Or to get some further context on Bob's involvement with Nouns DAO, check out [Proposal 142](https://nouns.wtf/vote/142) that was sponsored by Gnars DAO.

## 🔥 Bring on the "Burnquest"

Gifting [Noun 542](https://nouns.wtf/noun/542) to Bob Burnquist would be more than just a token of appreciation. It would be a celebration of a legend, an acknowledgment of his contributions, and a testament to the indomitable spirit of skateboarding. We'd be embarking on a quest of serendipity together, where the potential for collaboration is boundless.

![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafkreicn34ghkmznkjyfn7zhbnyni73hwfmldaqhthpqivpi7frksopu2e)

Bob's committed to repping Noun 542 and participating in governance, as both a voter and nounish builder. His creativity and groundbreaking track record are testament to what he could, and already does, bring to Nouns. If there are times where his full focus is needed elsewhere, there's ample opportunity for thoughtful representation through delegation, either by his team, vast network with deep industry experience, or as part of educational endeavours at his institute. 

![](https://ipfs.decentralized-content.com/ipfs/bafybeideeb4fbkn2i3s37fmq5tnkzr3krmi5l4wyza7sx7a2tcchkwddge)

▶️ *[Click here](https://www.voxels.com/play?coords=E@1007E,1112N) to visit to Bob's Voxels property (got a tour on our most recent call)* 

I've followed Bob's career since I was a child, and as an amateur skateboarder, I'm thrilled to have even met him, let alone be collaborating with him directly. Gnars has taken me on such an incredible journey and Nouns has made it all possible. It's a wonderful feeling to come full circle and present an opportunity such as this one to the community I hold so dear. Can't wait for everyone to see what Bob's been cooking.
