# 🕊️ Free the Nouns

This is is a proposal to protocolize recirculation of Nouns that have been returned to the treasury. 


One way to understand the falling demand / fork cycle is as a referendum on the protocol's ability to maintain alignment with an expanding voter base. 

We may want to enshrine, as the highest order mandate for voters, that we aim to produce not near-term roi but a rich, magnetic culture anchored by a progressively more distributed governance network. With or without v3, it's more important token-holders stay than that they come in the first place. 

Thus

Rather than be focused on protecting price/bv, we could instead prioritize minimizing forks, not just when auction prices are low but high as well. The two objectives are likely at odds in the long term. The dao has already proved that it will de-circulate Nouns if it serves near-term capital interests. Attempting to peg auction price to treasury balance via a periodic burn does not fundamentally change this.

Because

As long as natural demand is falling (price<bv), the highest marginal buyer at auction is still likely to be a value extractor. This is self-evident when fork threshold < allowed burn frequency. There is no way to eliminate the arb under this market condition via burn without constraining the Fork's utility as minority protection, and can be little/no supply expansion under price contraction.  

And 

When periods of price & supply expansion (price>bv) reverse, the dao will be under significant & possible cascading exit pressure in the form of profit-taking. We may find the token supply ultimately little changed. Nouns lifers will be palliated by an increased voting share in the dao (as with fork # 0), rather than rightfully held to task for failing to value progressive decentralization, inclusivity and organic leadership churn.  

And So 

I suggest we encode the recirculation of treasury nouns at a predictable cadence after forks (N/year until fully distributed). 

Fork execution schedules a series of on-chain prop house-style rounds (perhaps triggered by a modified auction settlement process?) where anyone can apply to be granted a Noun via a weighted vote governed by Noun-owners. Imo the most visceral/memetic steady-state value for N is 365. We can ramp up responsibly but lets not take an eternity. 

This maximizes alignment on growing the Nouns holder base, rather than near-term auction demand, minimizes arb interest and downstream rugs. It affords ardent Nouns believers a direct, merit-based pathway to agency in the network, and demonstrates we are immutably committed to a diverse and expanding range of interesting voices contributing to the conversation- the highest good for us, Ethereum, and beyond.

Nouns belong to the world.

# Nouns Stories + Stoopid Buddy = Shorts Galore

# 

# 

## TLDR

On the heels of [Prop 180](https://nouns.wtf/vote/180)’s and [Prop 73](https://nouns.wtf/vote/73)’s overwhelming success, we’re rallying the creative forces once again on what promises to be our biggest and most impactful proposal yet. Nouns Stories is seeking $1,795,000 to develop, produce and distribute over 50 Animated Nouns Shorts on a global scale with nine time Emmy-Award winners Stoopid Buddy Stoodios, along with 50 of the best animators in the world.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SyIYuo7gp.png)

[Nouns Short Shorts Trailer](https://youtu.be/QxrvHepTh38)

## NOUNS: FRONT AND CENTER

Most sources of financing for animated content are tied to networks that move at a snail’s pace and that are not considered artist friendly. This is where Nouns steps in to disrupt the system. We want to provide the proper funding to attract the world’s best animators, help them bring their ideas to life, and in so doing — put Nouns DAO on the map as the number one source for innovative, diverse storytelling in animation. 

Not only that, but by making Nouns DAO the seed funder we’re putting the Nouns IP (and the brand’s aesthetic) front and center on a series of innovative and hilarious shorts that are bound to get massive amounts of attention with animation fans all around the world. What better way to spread the Nounish vibes and garner some positive attention?

## PERSON, PLACE & THING: 3 THEMATIC ROUNDS, 50 CREATORS, 1 YEAR

Over the course of the next twelve months we’ll onboard 50 of the world’s most innovate animators to create engaging animated shorts featuring great characters, engaging storylines, and Nounish vibes. By expanding the run times and upping the budgets, we’ll give the animators the opportunity to produce even MORE engaging visuals and storylines!

We’ll roll out the animated shorts over three themed rounds. Other than requiring the films to feature Nouns characters or Noggles, we’ll encourage the animators to go absolutely wild with the best and funniest ideas: the ones that may not exist within the walled gardens of Hollywood. Because not every artist has the bandwidth to produce longer form shorts, we’ll keep the Short Shorts 15 second+ format for some of our creators. 

In total the three themed rounds will feature:

- 12 x 2-3 minute Shorts
- 38 x 15-30 second Short Shorts
- 3 original shorts by the team at Stoopid Buddy

## 50 OF THE WORLD’S BEST

We’ll cast our net wide to onboard the best animators we can muster, and by allowing them the creative freedom to ***************do what they do***************, we believe we’ll get the very best out of them. Not only that, but many of these talented folks already have huge followings online which will further expose the Nouns DAO to their legions of fans when we go live with the shorts and the post them to their own socials.

## 3 STOOPID SHORTS

To kick off each thematic round, Stoopid Buddy Stoodios will pour all of their Nouns-lovin’-energy (see: Rose Parade / forthcoming Nouns Documentary) into making something truly special for Nouns — a love letter in animation like only they can. They’ll tap their A-list Buddies to create and voice these fully original mini-movies, creating some hilarious cohesion to what promises to be a wildly eclectic program!

## CC0 Heroes

As we did in the first Nouns Short Shorts Festival, we’ll encourage each animator to embrace Nounish culture by opting in to making their shorts CC0. While it won’t be required, opting into to CC0 will make their films eligible for some damn [fine awards](https://twitter.com/nouns_stories/status/1670029456688418818) and cash prizes!

## OH YEAH…ONE MORE THING

We’ll be hosting a *Nountastic* IRL animation festival to premiere these amazing shorts, attracting Nounish animation fans from all over the world.   Why do this when we could just hide behind the safety of our computer monitors? Because as we experienced with the first screening at [Braindead Studios](https://studios.wearebraindead.com/) in Los Angeles (in conjunction with the Melbourne screening at Pixel), there’s an *energy* and *magic* to bringing communities together to share in a truly unique experience that will help put Nouns DAO on the map. We’ll invite all our industry pals, and will we live-stream the whole thing just as we did before? Abso-fucking-lutely!

## IMPACT: NETWORK EFFECT

The first round of shorts garnered over **a million views** in the first month of release across creator and owned social channels. Most of these views were native to the creator channels of the animators themselves — providing a whole new audience for Nouns. This time around, we’ll not only continue to seek out animators with their own audiences, but amplify views across all platforms with a social media marketing campaign and enlisting a PR firm to bolster [awareness](https://www.animationmagazine.net/2023/07/stoopid-buddy-stoodios-chris-waters-unzips-about-the-nouns-short-shorts-festival/) of what we’re up to. On top of this, to build anticipation and excitment for the festival as the year unfolds, we'll create original promotional content, including teasers and trailers, behind the scenes footage, and creator profiles.
Check out some of the postings from our first Shorts Shorts Festival below!

[![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/Hy2i70Kxa.jpg)](https://www.instagram.com/reel/Ctm_qiRBIre/)
[![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/By3o7AtxT.jpg)](https://www.instagram.com/p/CttDyBBo33G/)
[![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/S13oQ0Yxp.jpg)](https://www.instagram.com/reel/CtgbaWPJ9iK/)


## THE NOUNS STORIES TEAM

**Stoopid Buddy Stoodios**

9 time Emmy-winning studio behind *Robot Chicken,* and producer of over 1,000 hours of animated television **including: *Crossing Swords, Mickey Saves Christmas, and Marvel’s MODOK.* Stoopid Buddy is a pioneering independent studio that has helped drive the tremendous growth in adult animation over the past decade. Co-founder Eric Towner and Head of Development Chris Waters have deep roots in the Nouns ecosystem. Their first proposal funded the Nouns Rose Parade Float (seen by over 30 million people) and both are producers of the forthcoming documentary about Nouns.

**Walter Newman**

Former SVP of program development at Adult Swim who oversaw such shows as Rick & Morty, Tuca and Bertie, Smiling Friends, Black Dynamite, and more. Walter brings network experience and a deep talent roster to the Nouns Stories team.

**Goldy** / **Pixel**

**[Goldy's](https://twitter.com/Goldypix)** Oscar-Shortlisted hybrid production studio is behind **[nounish ⌐◨-◨](https://twitter.com/nounish)** and the animated short film "**[The Wizards Hat](https://twitter.com/nouns_stories/status/1570433066900017152?s=20&t=T_vYbAun_YQEsZUlEwfjSA)**" from the original Nouns Stories proposal.

**Joshua Fisher**

Manager of Grammy-winning music producers, music publisher, SharkDAO Rep, Ugly Noun, The Nouns Square co-founder, Nouns DAO Builder and Nouns narrative advocate.

**Joel Cares**

CEO of **[Lobal Global](https://lobal.global/) / [ANOA](https://anoa.ca)**, creator of **[Nerman](https://twitter.com/nermanbot)**, founding member of **[Nouncil](http://nouncil.wtf/)**, creative director @ [**JoelCares.net**](https://joelcares.net).

## OUR ROLES

We’ve got the experience, knowledge, and relationships to successfully pull off this wildly ambitious proposal. Not only will we be identifying top-tier talent from our own networks of creators, but we’ll also be recruiting on a global scale to identify and onboard the next generation of up-and-coming animation talent.

We’ll be managing and coordinating a massive effort to create decentralized content and creatively package it in a way that connects with audiences around the globe. Not only that, but we’ll be tapping our extensive network to best position our exposure and distribution of the program online, at festivals, and beyond. We’ll be coordinating a social media / marketing and PR strategy, as well as presenting “behind the scenes” access and status updates to the DAO as this undertaking fully develops.

## BEYOND THE PROP

The Nouns Stories team has over 613,620ish hours of experience in animation development, production, marketing, distribution and sales. Our team is well positioned to take these Nounish creations beyond what is promised in the proposal. Our hope is we can continue to develop the best-of-the-best beyond their existence as a short, and seed Nounish content and characters into the mainstream zeitgeist. Think about it — *The Simpsons*, *South Park*, *Rick & Morty*, and hell, even *Robot Chicken*, all got their start **********as animated shorts.**********

## THAT’S A WRAP!

Animation drives cultural conversation. There’s a white space in animation that Nouns DAO is uniquely positioned to fill. Nimble development. Artist friendly. Global reach. We believe there’s a more “Nounish” way to produce the next great animated shorts, and that we have the team to help find them and make them. 

For Nouns, there’s an opportunity to be front-and-center in one of the most passionate arenas in pop culture and create break-out successes that proliferate the meme.

Our team has poured our hearts and souls into the Nouns experiment since it’s inception, and we’ve proven we can develop world-class animation and execute on ambitious ideas. We believe in a new way of generating content and organizing passionate communities of creators and fans. Together we can change the culture and build Nouns DAO into the next great destination for animation, so slap on your dang Noggles and let’s do this!!

## BUDGET BREAKDOWN

**TOTAL: $1,795,000 USDC** 
50% distributed upon commencement, 50% upon completion of first round.

**Animation** **************Content - $1,270,000**************

- Publicist - $15K
- Social Media Mgr - $15K
- Legal+Accounting - $20K
- Event Planner - $20K
- Team Travel & Accommodation - allow $25K

# 🧈 The Churn

//This is a proposal to protocolize distribution of Nouns that have been returned to the treasury via a permissionless forum similar to Prop House, allocated by Nouner vote. 


One way to understand the falling demand / fork cycle is as a referendum on the protocol's ability to maintain alignment with an expanding voter base. 

We may want to enshrine, as the highest order mandate for voters, that we aim to produce not near-term roi but a rich, magnetic culture anchored by a progressively more distributed governance network. With or without v3, it's more important token-holders stay than that they come in the first place. 

Thus

Rather than be focused on protecting price/bv, we could instead prioritize minimizing forks, not just when auction prices are low but high as well. The two objectives are likely at odds in the long term. The dao has already proved that it will de-circulate Nouns if it serves near-term capital interests. Attempting to peg auction price to treasury balance via a periodic burn does not fundamentally change this.

Because

As long as natural demand is falling (price<bv), the highest marginal buyer at auction is still likely to be a value extractor. This is self-evident when fork threshold < allowed burn frequency, but is also the case generally. There is no way to eliminate the arb under this market condition via burn, meaning there can be be little/no supply expansion under price contraction.  

And 

When periods of price & supply expansion (price>bv) reverse, the dao will be under significant & possible cascading exit pressure in the form of profit-taking. We may find the token supply ultimately little changed. Nouns lifers will be palliated by an increased voting share in the dao (as with fork # 0), rather than rightfully held to task for failing to value progressive decentralization, inclusivity and organic leadership churn.  

And So 

I suggest we encode the recirculation of treasury nouns at a predictable cadence after forks (N/year until fully distributed). 

Fork execution schedules a series of on-chain prop house-style rounds (perhaps triggered by a modified auction settlement process?) where anyone can apply to be granted a Noun via a weighted vote governed by Noun-owners. Imo the most visceral/memetic steady-state value for N is 365. We can ramp up responsibly but lets not take an eternity. 

This maximizes alignment on growing the Nouns holder base, rather than near-term auction demand, minimizes arb interest and downstream rugs. It affords ardent Nouns believers a direct, merit-based pathway to agency in the network, and demonstrates we are immutably committed to a diverse and expanding range of interesting voices contributing to the conversation- the highest good for us, Ethereum, and beyond.

Nouns belong to the world.

# 🔥 The Burn: audit funding

We are planning to propose an upgrade that implements [The Burn](https://w.mirror.xyz/AmHOzH-FQZVO3IhGXHSvCRxRSf2MO6VCZdmMwNEIyKE). The goals for the burn are described in the blog post above by wilson.

This is a first draft of the proposal candidate through which we will ask the DAO to fund one or two audits of the implementation. We are putting it up even before we have quotes from auditors, in order to raise awareness among voters, stimulate the conversation, and listen to feedback.

## Technical spec

We plan to deploy a new contract, with a single function that lets burn excess ETH from the timelock.

### How much will be burned?

Excess ETH is defined as the difference between the treasury value denominated in ETH, and: adjusted_total_supply * trailing_N_day_mean_auction_price.

adjusted_total_supply is the number of minted nouns, excluding nouns held by the treasury or in the escrow contract.

In order to calculate the treasury value in ETH, the contract will consider only ETH, stETH, rETH & WETH. All other assets are ignored.

The number of auctions looked at when calculating the mean price is a configurable parameter; we suggest starting with 90.

Example based on numbers close to actuals:

Treasury has 2857 ETH, 10830 stETH, 228 rETH.
Adjusted total supply: 394.
Mean price of last 90 auctions: 30 ETH.
Treasury value in ETH: 2857 + 10830 + 247 (228 worth of rETH) = 13,934 ETH.
Excess ETH: 13,934 - 30 * 394 = 2114 ETH.

### What is burned?

Only ETH is burned. If the Nouns runs out of ETH, it will need to swap other assets (e.g. stETH) into ETH to allow for more burn.

### When can it be called?

The goal is for the burn to happen at predictable times. One parameter will define what will be the first noun id at which the first burn can happen. Another parameter will define how many noun ids need to be minted before the next burn can happen.

Example:

Suppose the first noun id is set to 1000, and the number of nouns between burns is set to 100. The first burn will be possible once a noun with id 1000 is minted. The next burn would be possible once a noun with id 1100 is minted.

Even if the first burn actually occurs when noun 1002 is auctioned, the next burn will still be possible starting id 1100.


### Timelock upgrade

The timelock will be upgraded to a new version which will allow the burner contract to call it an burn ETH.

The timelock will only allow the burner contract to call it.

The address of the burner contract is a configurable param. Setting it to the zero address is effectively turning off the burn mechanism.


## Audit costs

Our plan is to undergo a deep code review with solimander, and an audit with [Sherlock](https://www.sherlock.xyz/). In a bit more detail:

1. Soli review (+ verbs fix things)
2. Sherlock audit
3. Verbs fix things + soli reviews fixes
4. Sherlock mitigation review

We are asking for 30K USDC to be sent to the Tech Grants Pod multisig to pay for the audit.

## Next steps

Funding the audit will let us know the DAO wants the burn to be deployed. Once funded we will finalize the code, undergo the audit, and follow up with a proposal to upgrade the auction house contract and the treasury contract.

The upgrade will leave the burn disabled, since it seems best to separate the deployment of the mechanism from reaching consensus on its parameters. We will of course support any voters who will want to follow up with a proposal to set the burn parameters.

It's also worthwhile for voters to consider converting stETH into ETH ahead of the burn, since as mentioned above this simple design only burns native ETH.

## Appendix: pseudocode

ExcessETHBurner:

```

// configurable params:

uint numPastAuctions;

uint nextBurnNounId;

uint mintsBetweenBurns;

function burnExcessETH() {

    if (auction().nounId < nextBurnNounId) revert('Not yet');

    

    allowedTreasuryInETH = adjustTotalSupply() * meanAuctionPrice();

    excessETH = treasuryValueInETH() - allowedTreasuryInETH;

    amountToBurn = min(excessETH, timelock.balance);

    

    nextBurnNounId += mintsBetweenBurns;

    

    timelock.burnETH(amountToBurn);

}

function treasuryValueInETH() {

    return timelock.balance + stETH.balanceOf(timelock) + 

        wETH.balanceOf(timelock) + rETH.getEthValue(rETH.balanceOf(timelock));

}

function meanAuctionPrice() {

    return mean(auctionHouse.prices(numPastAuctions));

}

```


## Appendix: current asset breakdown

At the time of writing this text, [according to Etherscan](https://etherscan.io/tokenholdings?a=0xb1a32FC9F9D8b2cf86C068Cae13108809547ef71):



* Total treasury value is roughly $23.15M.
* Its two main assets are:
    * ETH at $4.391M (2631.493 ETH).
    * stETH at $18.061M (10830.768 stETH).
* These two assets alone make up over 96.7% of the total treasury value.
* USDC is roughly 1.1% of the treasury, and we’re comfortable ignoring it for the sake of code simplicity.
* wstETH is roughly 0.11% and is ignored as well.

# Villa Nouns  

## Summary

![3D Render](https://i.postimg.cc/wvPnykQT/DEFINITIVO-4-K-2.jpg)

We’re transforming a villa by the sea in Italy into the first-ever Nouns vacation rental.

Imagine a living art gallery, where nounish NFTs, items, and projects are not just showcased but become the center of a unique experience. Villa Nouns aims to be the ultimate destination for Nouns fans and newcomers alike, a place that blurs the line between onchain and offchain.

More than a place to stay, our goal is to create a highly curated, customisable, Nouns-themed venue open to all. By encouraging innovation, art, education and fun experiences, Villa Nouns will reflect the Nouns values and ethos in the real world, while meeting the growing demand for immersive experiences inside and outside of the Nouns community. 

**How it works**

- **Book** your stay on Airbnb, or onchain from villanouns.wtf.
- **Access** the villa with your wallet, and share access with others onchain. No physical keys needed.
- **Explore** the spaces to discover and interact with the Nouns universe.
- **Buy** nounish furniture, items or NFTs directly at the villa, with your Ethereum wallet.

Revenue generated from bookings and sales of nounish items will be partly channeled back into the Nouns treasury, as well as shared with partnering communities and Nouns owners.

**Timeline**

We plan to complete all work in 12 to 24 weeks and start welcoming guests by 2024.

**Team**

- **Management**: Led by the villa owner, an experienced property developer.
- **Development**: Carried out by dlabs, known for working on projects like Nouns Agora, Optimism, Slice and Juicebox.
- **Design and art**: Made by skilled architects, designers and artists.
- **Community**: Nouns owners and communities will be able to partner up with us and become sponsors of the project, further customising the spaces at the villa.

**Funding request**

We request 121 ETH to give the villa a nounish makeover, cover operational expenses for 1 year, as well as ensure guests have a highly curated experience.

The villa in its present state is already a sought-after location in the area. Renovating it will only add to its popularity, so execution risks are minimal.

The primary goal of this project is to explore the potential of a nounish vacation destination, gauging both demand and impact, while keeping risks and costs low for the DAO.

The villa will stay Nouns-themed for at least 2 years, and possibly indefinitely. This fact together with the growth potential and the future plans outlined below further help justifying the expense.

**Future plans**

The proposal aims to fund the redesign of the villa and cover operational costs, but our commitment doesn’t stop there. In the coming months we’ll explore the following areas, either autonomously or with further support from the DAO:

- **Nounish home goods**: In collaboration with artists and designers, we’ll craft a line of items and furniture inspired by Nouns. They'll first appear at Villa Nouns and then will be available for everyone to buy, helping to proliferate the Nouns vibe far and wide.
- **Activities for everyone**: We’ll offer a range of activities to enhance the guest experience further. Think pools, sports areas, dining spots, and curated outdoor adventures for kids and adults.
- **Builders retreats**: During the low-season we plan to host artists, hackers, and creators to brainstorm and build on nounish ideas, free of charge. Leveraging Prop House for the selection process, Villa Nouns will be temporarily turned into a hub sparking innovative projects and fostering connections in the Nouns ecosystem.
- **More spaces, more stories**: We plan to open more properties locally and around the world, especially in places rich in art and culture. It’s not just about expanding — it's about building a global community that shares the Nouns spirit.
- **Franchise model as a public good**: Keeping in line with the CC0 spirit, we’ll be opening doors for property owners to become part of Villa Nouns, while ensuring quality through a rigorous review by our team.
- **Decentralized ownership**: If the concept proves successful and Nouns DAO wishes to double down on the initiative, it will be possible for the DAO to own or co-own the estate.

![3D Render](https://i.postimg.cc/wvz0Smvj/2-final.jpg)

---

## The nounish experience

![Villa_Nouns_Gate.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/m2Zxzzn0/Villa-Nouns-Gate.jpg)

References to many past and future Nouns projects will be integrated with the interiors of the villa and the surrounding natural environment. 

Guests will be able to read the Nouns comic, ride Gnars skateboards or surfboards, watch the Nouns movie, learn the history of Nouns, and more. Furthermore, holders of Nouns and derivatives will enjoy an even more personalised experience, customising screens and interiors of the villa based on their NFT holdings.

Certain areas of the house like the bedrooms will be themed on specific Nouns or derivative collections. The overall experience will also evolve over time due to feedback and new projects in the Nouns ecosystem.

Most items at the villa will be Nouns themed, like towels, cutlery and home accessories, and some will also be gifted to guests. Among the nounish objects, furniture and decorations, we also plan to build suggestive stone mosaics and murals made by artists in the Nouns community. 

![_final.gif](https://i.postimg.cc/TPDBMryW/final.gif)

**Booking and entering the villa**

![main.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/cHc90Td6/main.jpg)

Guests will be able to book the villa on Airbnb, or directly onchain through a custom booking website on [villanouns.wtf](http://villanouns.wtf).

The villa can be accessed by connecting the wallet on-site and verifying the purchase. Other wallets can also be appointed by the buyer to unlock the villa using delegate.cash.

![iphone mock.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/BntdNW4p/iphone-mock.jpg)

---

## The villa and location

![1.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/VLh7fJP9/1.jpg)

Villa Nouns is an elegant villa located in Sardinia offering stunning views over the La Maddalena Archipelago, one of Italy's most coveted tourist destinations.

The spacious interior is designed for relaxation and focus, while the outdoor patio and large private garden are perfect for enjoying al fresco dining, relaxing in the Jacuzzi, or immersing in nature.

![2.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/fy280LtN/2.jpg)

The villa includes a large living room with a sofa bed, four bedrooms (three with queen beds, two of which have en-suite bathrooms, and one with twin beds), and three bathrooms with hydromassage showers.

Features a 1250 sqm garden, a heated four-person Jacuzzi, high-speed Starlink internet connection, heating and air conditioning, and private parking for up to two cars.

![Villa_Nouns_Backyard.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/T2JM3qtV/Villa-Nouns-Backyard.jpg)

**The location**

![locations.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/htH3rfC4/locations.jpg)

The villa is located in the heart of Costa Smeralda between the picturesque port town Palau and the popular spot Roccia dell’Orso. Its prime location provides easy access to beautiful beaches and renowned attractions.

The spectacular Maddalena islands, are just a short boat ride away, while the prestigious Porto Cervo and Porto Rotondo are conveniently close, making it the perfect location to enjoy the most evocative places Sardinia has to offer.

See more on [villanouns.wtf/gallery](http://villanouns.wtf/gallery)

**Financial aspects**

The villa has been rented out for several years, with rates between $50 and $110 per person per night based on the season. This generated on average $60k of revenues a year, mainly during summer.

By renovating the villa we expect an increase in demand and in turn revenues and prices — especially during summer. During the low season, the villa may also be repurposed for events and host other activities related to Nouns, allowing experimentation in coordination with the DAO and the exploration of alternative revenue models.

---

## Roadmap

**October 2023 - December 2023**
- Villa Nouns refurbishment and redesign
- Development of website and on-chain booking experience

**From January 2024**
- Open bookings at [villanouns.wtf](http://villanouns.wtf) and start welcoming guests

---

## Funding request

![expenses.png](https://i.postimg.cc/j54qKt9g/Screenshot-2023-10-04-at-21-10-22.png)

**Villa redesign and refurbishment - 59 ETH**

- [Renovation] Allocate 45 ETH to upgrade the villa's interior and exterior to incorporate Nouns-themed objects, decorations, furniture, NFT displays, and other technologies to make the guests experience unique.
- [Professional services] Architects, interior designers and artists involved in the redesign process

**Development - 40 ETH**

- [Website and contracts integration] Build the [villanouns.wtf](http://villanouns.wtf) platform, with an innovative onchain booking experience.
- [On-site technology] Make a smart lock which allows access based on onchain bookings, as well as develop and fine-tune the interactive experience at the villa.

**Marketing and operational costs - 22 ETH**

- Create material to promote Villa Nouns as the ultimate nounish destination, such as drone and showcase videos, and professional photo shoots.
- All operational and management costs involved in bringing Villa Nouns to fruition.

**Total ask: 121 ETH**

---

PS. Villa Nouns is already accepting booking requests on [villanouns.wtf](http://villanouns.wtf) **⌐◨-◨**

# GLITCH: Art residency + Prop House + Droposal

# 

# DESCRIPTION
## TLDR;
GLITCH is a 2-weeks residency for blockchain artists and engineers embracing the principles of openness and collaboration. We want to set up a Prop House to fund public goods projects and artworks within the GLITCH collective and beyond, where the highest-ranked artworks will be submitted as a Droposal for Nouns.

**Total funds requested: 25 ETH**
* 10 ETH for the GLITCH residency (see below for more granular budget)
* 15 ETH for the Prop House Treasury

![GLITCH Community](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=126XxNSe_cLiVf0vE7tPmRHelc9c28-dg)

# GLITCH 3.0
The GLITCH art collective is organising the third edition of its art residency. It’s a 2 weeks long event gathering blockchain / AI artists and engineers, collaborating on the creation of new NFT collections inspired by the notion of CC-0 and Remix. GLITCH is a unique opportunity to build new types of public goods, past editions have led to the creation of several protocols (e.g. REMIX NFT, IMPACT NFT) as well as an open source NFT Token-Bound Licensing standard to embed Creative Commons-like licensing conditions directly into NFTs.

## ART RESIDENCY
GLITCH is a two-week focused residency at an 18th century chateau in France. About 40-50 participants will be invited to create, imagine, develop theories, build projects and standards aimed at supporting a new creative ecosystem of open creativity and digital abundance in the blockchain art world.  The participants will be a highly curated group of creative and smart individuals actively engaged with NFTs, art, music and AI. The goal is to bring the right people, in the right place, at the right time, and then let the magic happen.

At GLITCH, we strive to empower people with ideas, visions, and expertise, while providing space for our attendees to reach deep into their minds and forge better models together. We exist to disrupt the status quo and to manifest positive solutions for society.
The outcomes of the residency will be, first and foremost, a tight community of value-aligned people eager to collaborate with one another, new collaborations and synergies in order to shape the world of tomorrow. The residency will also promote a variety of new initiatives about how to promote the value of openness and interoperability in the blockchain art world. Expected deliverables include new NFT protocols that encourage remix and creativity, new NFT protocols geared towards maximization of social and environmental impact, as well as a variety of collaborative exhibitions for NFT artists. All content produced within the residency will be released and made available to all under Creative Commons licenses.

More details about the third edition of GLITCH can be found at the [following link](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1xWfm3HfZJHDdlb8-7bhrVE4fWmNJDOhd)

![GLITCH overview](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1EHB6ZJxOhGZOb1wWWz1YobCez6UViYop)

# GLITCH Prop House & Droposal

GLITCH is an avant-garde hub for blockchain art and innovation. We aim to utilize Prop House's pioneering mechanism to fund the creation of artworks and public goods that will be stewarded and/or mentored by the members of the GLITCH collective (artists, engineers, curators, etc). By harnessing Prop House's governance system, we aim to democratize the funding process, foster cross-pollination between the Nouns and GLITCH community, and support projects that contribute significantly to the blockchain art ecosystem.

## GLITCH Prop House

GLITCH will create a Prop House round for blockchain artists and engineers to propose artworks and public goods to be created during the GLITCH residency. Artworks can range from NFTs to physical installations; public good initiatives can range from developing open standard or open-source tools, organizing educational events, or supporting initiatives to promote the blockchain art space. Collaboration between artists, technologists, and other stakeholders will be strongly encouraged, leading to the creation of groundbreaking initiatives in the blockchain art world, and beyond.

Anyone can submit a proposal for a new artwork or public good and request a maximum of 3 ETH. The GLITCH and Nouns community members assess the proposals and vote to allocate funds to the initiatives that align with GLITCH's mission of openness, collaboration, and innovation. Votes can be cast both by Nouns holders and GLITCH-NFT holders (we will distribute a GLITCH-NFT to all current and previous GLITCH participants, around 90 people total). Nouns and GLITCH-NFTs have an equal weight of one vote. We want Nouns holders to have a say on the selection of the proposed projects so that we can get feedback from outside of the event, to ensure that the projects that are funded are relevant not only to the GLITCH community, but also to other communities across the Nouns and NFT space.

## GLITCH DROPOSAL

The successful proposals, if applicable (i.e. to the extent that they include the production of a digital artwork), will be proposed as a Droposal for Nouns. The proceeds from the Droposal will be split equally between Nouns DAO, GLITCH and the creator(s) of the artwork.

![GLITCH people](https://drive.google.com/uc?id=1LWgWO67u5aDXgF7vP5rQej8bkIDPJL1M)

# FUNDINGS

The full costs of the residency is **$60,000** (inclusive of accommodation and catering for all participants). We are requesting **10 ETH** to cover 1/4 of the costs. 

The Prop House will fund proposals for up to **3 ETH per proposal**. We need **15 ETH** to support at least 5 proposals.


We are requesting a total grant of **25 ETH** in order to implement this proposal:
* **10 ETH**: support of the GLITCH residency
* **15 ETH**: Prop House treasury

# TEAM
The GLITCH collective is stewarded by [Primavera De Filippi](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Primavera_De_Filippi), [Will Papper](https://www.linkedin.com/in/wpapper/), [Isaac Patka](https://www.linkedin.com/in/isaac-patka-417b4328/) and many other amazing blockchain artists and engineers !

# Villa Nouns  

## Summary

We’re transforming a villa by the sea in Italy into the first-ever Nouns vacation rental.

More than a place to stay, our goal is to create a highly curated, customisable, Nouns-themed venue open to all. **How it works**

- **Book** your stay on Airbnb, or onchain from villanouns.wtf.

- **Explore** the spaces to discover and interact with the Nouns universe.
- **Buy** nounish furniture, items or NFTs directly at the villa, with your Ethereum wallet.

Revenue generated from bookings and sales of nounish items will be partly channeled back into the Nouns treasury, as well as shared with partnering communities and Nouns owners.

**Timeline**

We plan to complete all work in 12 to 24 weeks and start welcoming guests by 2024.

**Team**

- **Management**: Led by the villa owner, an experienced property developer.
- **Development**: Carried out by dlabs, known for working on projects like Nouns Agora, Optimism, Slice and Juicebox.
- **Design and art**: Made by skilled architects, designers and artists.
- **Community**: Nouns owners and communities will be able to partner up with us and become sponsors of the project, further customising the spaces at the villa.

**Funding request**

We request 121 ETH to give the villa a nounish makeover, cover operational expenses for 1 year, as well as ensure guests have a highly curated experience.

The villa in its present state is already a sought-after location in the area. Renovating it will only add to its popularity, so execution risks are minimal.

The primary goal of this project is to explore the potential of a nounish vacation destination, gauging both demand and impact, while keeping risks and costs low for the DAO.

The villa will stay Nouns-themed for at least 2 years, and possibly indefinitely. This fact together with the growth potential and the future plans outlined below further help justifying the expense.

**Future plans**

The proposal aims to fund the redesign of the villa and cover operational costs, but our commitment doesn’t stop there. In the coming months we’ll explore the following areas, either autonomously or with further support from the DAO:

- **Nounish home goods**: In collaboration with artists and designers, we’ll craft a line of items and furniture inspired by Nouns. They'll first appear at Villa Nouns and then will be available for everyone to buy, helping to proliferate the Nouns vibe far and wide.
- **Activities for everyone**: We’ll offer a range of activities to enhance the guest experience further. Think pools, sports areas, dining spots, and curated outdoor adventures for kids and adults.
- **Builders retreats**: During the low-season we plan to host artists, hackers, and creators to brainstorm and build on nounish ideas, free of charge. Leveraging Prop House for the selection process, Villa Nouns will be temporarily turned into a hub sparking innovative projects and fostering connections in the Nouns ecosystem.
- **More spaces, more stories**: We plan to open more properties locally and around the world, especially in places rich in art and culture. It’s not just about expanding — it's about building a global community that shares the Nouns spirit.
- **Franchise model as a public good**: Keeping in line with the CC0 spirit, we’ll be opening doors for property owners to become part of Villa Nouns, while ensuring quality through a rigorous review by our team.
- **Decentralized ownership**: If the concept proves successful and Nouns DAO wishes to double down on the initiative, it will be possible for the DAO to own or co-own the estate.

# A very Nounish ⌐◧-◧ Kids Xmas Party for 5,000 kids in need

## 
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/H15-ixnya.png)

*Imagine 5,000 kids, each with their own unique challenges, coming together in a space filled with laughter, joy, and acceptance. Decked out in noggles, experiencing Nouns stories, interacting with vibrant Nouns sculptures and characters, and immersing themselves in a world where disability, disadvantage, or illness doesn't define them. Instead, they're celebrated for their individuality and spirit, all while being introduced to the imaginative universe of Nouns. This is the magic of the Variety Kids Xmas Party, and with your support, we can make it an unforgettable experience.*
### Introduction:
The Variety Kids Xmas Party is an annual event held in Melbourne, Victoria, Australia that brings joy and inclusion to over 5,000 Victorian children facing diverse challenges. We seek Nouns DAO's support of 28.99 ETH to enhance this iconic event, held across 39,000 square metres, with the Nouns bringing the FUN and ENTERTAINMENT, ensuring a memorable experience for all attendees including:
* 5,000 kids in need
* 3,000 parents and carers
* 600 corporate volunteers
* 100 VIP guests

This year's party will be held in mid-December 2023.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SybKqjyga.jpg)

### ⌐◧-◧ Background:
For over three decades, the Variety Kids Xmas Party has been a beacon of hope for kids in need. Held at the Melbourne Convention Exhibition Centre, this event has touched the lives of over 165,000 children since its inception in 1986. The massive event is completely FREE for 5,000 children and 3,000 carers to attend, ensuring that each child receives a gift and experiences an inclusive day of fun, activities, stage entertainment, carnival rides, all-abilities sport and an all-important visit from Santa. For many, this celebration is the only one they have during the Christmas season, and the gifts they receive at the party are often the only ones they receive. The Variety Kids Xmas Party is a safe space for children living with disabilities or experiencing disadvantage or illness, allowing them to be themselves without fear of judgment from their peers. This remarkable event is made possible by the dedication and hard work of the small Variety team and over 600 volunteers.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SkJSDa1xp.jpg)


### ⌐◧-◧ Profound Impact:
The Variety Kids Xmas Party is more than just a day of fun; it's a lifeline for families who often feel isolated or overlooked. For many children, the event offers a rare opportunity to experience joy, laughter, and a sense of belonging. Parents often remark on the transformative effect of the party, noting the boost in their children's confidence and self-esteem. The ripple effect extends beyond the children to their families, providing them with a much-needed respite and the chance to see their children thrive in a supportive environment. The memories created during the party serve as a source of strength and inspiration for families throughout the year.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BkJ5cjkxT.jpg)

### ⌐◧-◧ Testimonials:
"You have no idea what this means to us. Without Variety, we were having no Christmas." Kayla

“Being on your own and battling to afford the basics, you are so conscious of trying to make Christmas special. I will be forever thankful that Variety did that for me and my boys this Christmas.” Shelly, parent of Jaxon and Dylan.

To make the day even more special, each child receives a gift bag full of age-appropriate toys and games (including Nounish items) to take home and enjoy. For some children, this was the only gift they received that Christmas.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/ryvQ5jklT.jpg)


### ⌐◧-◧ Videos and imagery:

Watch the party in action – news coverage of last year's event 
[7 News Click here to play](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o8bpybGRlZY&themeRefresh=1)

[9 News Click here to play ](https://youtu.be/GXfgo3frPww)
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BJx9B6yxa.png)

Meet some of the families who attend and hear what it means to them

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/B1gBLaJea.png)

**Click here to view our gallery** of [pictures of the day](https://photos.app.goo.gl/GATPZpPnU5TEy7nTA) 


### ⌐◧-◧ A Nounish Christmas Deliverables:

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/S1AOkl6x6.png)


To elevate the 2023 Variety Kids Xmas Party, we propose the Nouns brand activations in synchronicity with the Variety red branding where Nouns bring the FUN and ENTERTAINMENT! These activations include a standalone **Nouns Fun Zone** with Nounish activities, branding across the venue and the **Nouns Entertainment Zone** (which cover 80% of the venue space) with dedicated Nouns branding at a cost of 28.99 ETH. Deliverables include:

* **Nouns Fun Zone**: A centrepiece that showcases the Nouns brand and its ethos including large scale foam Noggle sculpture and cut outs. 
    * Distribution of **LO-FI Noggles** to attendees: A fun and interactive way for kids to engage with the Nouns brand.
    * Nouns Colouring-in Station: A **creative space** for children to colour and engage with Nouns-themed artworks.
    * A roving Nouns character costume: **roving character** are a hit with attendees and receive lots of photo requests! The character and Noun volunteers will hand out **Noggles** and **Nouns temporary tattoos**.
    * LEGO Nouns creation station – hosted by kid’s entertainers and **LEGO** experts **live-building giant Noggles** as well as a **kids creation station** for attendees create their favourite Nouns tokens to contribute to the Nouns sculpture.

* **Nouns Entertainment Zone**:
    * From on stage entertainment (characters, dancers, magicians and more!) to carnival rides, all-abilities sports demonstrations, craft activities and the big man – SANTA – himself, Nouns will be bringing the entertainment to our 5,000 kids! Each area of the entertainment zone (venue wide) will be branded with Nouns corflute signs (Nouns Entertainment Zone) with Nouns brand ownership of the main stage through stage signage, on-stage screens, signage on grand stand seating, on-stage Noggles sculpture, Noggles signage on all carnival rides and activities across 39,000 square feet.

* **Nouns Community Volunteers**:
    * An opportunity for members of the local Nouns community to take part and witness the Nounish party through volunteering for the event (all volunteers require a current Working with Children’s Check) as well as providing filming and documentation for distribution in the Nouns community

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SJpH0RkxT.png)

### ⌐◧-◧ Value to Nouns DAO:
By integrating the Nouns brand into the Variety Kids Xmas Party and its associated marketing campaign, we aim to increase brand awareness, foster a positive association with the Nouns community and create exposure for the DAO to our ongoing corporate partners who will be in attendance at an associated VIP event. This event will serve as a platform to showcase the Nouns brand's commitment to social causes and its ability to make a tangible difference in the lives of thousands, reaching a diverse and expansive audience through a large scale IRL experience amplified online and through media outreach.

Event releases plus specific story pitches centred on Nouns funding. Advertising space rate (ASR) for news stories is $37,500 for an audience on 377,000 per story and print $16,000 ASR for an audience of 566,000. ![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/Sydqnskla.jpg)

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/H1O5y2JeT.jpg)


### ⌐◧-◧ Budget & Funding:
Hosting an event as impactful as the Variety Kids Xmas Party, with over 8,000 people in attendance, requires a significant financial investment each year even with a number of suppliers providing their services at a greatly reduced cost or comped. On average, previous Xmas Parties have cost USD $160,000 and have been funded from Variety's non-profit funds.

Variety is committed to continue to fund this event with the knowledge that it is crucial for thousands of families whose children are living with disabilities, illnesses, or experiencing disadvantages. It serves as a day of joy and inclusion, often providing the only Christmas celebration and gifts these children receive. For over three decades, this event has been sustained by year-round contributions from our dedicated individual of donors and fundraisers.

The current cost-of-living crisis has intensified the needs of our most vulnerable families, increasing the demand for our support. Simultaneously, community donations have become less frequent, as they are no longer as possible for some individuals as they once were.

If the Nouns prop passes to fund the 2023 event, the money previously allocated for it will be redirected to our individual grant program, which provides essential items like wheelchairs, communication devices, scholarships, education programs and assistance dogs for kids experiencing disadvantage or living with conditions including Cerebral Palsy, Down Syndrome, Autism, global development delay, muscular dystrophy, brain

# Unstake all stETH from Lido

*This candidate draft is put forward with the hopes of further feedback from the community.*

#### **Proposal**
As good Ethereum citizens [1], I propose we lead by example and unstake all [2] stETH. We currently hold a total of ~10836 stETH in the [treasury](https://etherscan.io/tokenholdings?a=0xb1a32FC9F9D8b2cf86C068Cae13108809547ef71).

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BJSEZLTeT.png)


#### **Problems with Lido**
I recommend watching the video below to better understand the concerns with Lido, but in short:
-  Ethereum epochs require 2/3rds of attestors voting to finalize;
- Lido's node operators control almost 1/3rd of all validators (32.2% at the time of writing);
- Lido DAO decides who can be a node operator;
-  In every Lido DAO vote, over 50% of power is controlled by [just 2 or 3 participants](https://snapshot.org/#/lido-snapshot.eth);
-  That makes Lido an Ethereum 'middleware' with a huge amount of centralized power;
-  The risks are not unrecoverable but serious enough that we ought to choose a better path.


[![](https://i.imgur.com/1k18c2V.png)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y0ddkSa1ZuI&ab_channel=Web3Builders)
*Lido conversation starts at 17m30s, and ends at 27m30s. Another section on risks starts at 47m30s.*

#### **More resources**
- The blog post by Danny Ryan referenced in the video:
[https://github.com/djrtwo/writing/blob/main/docs/2022-05-30_the-risks-of-lsd.md](https://github.com/djrtwo/writing/blob/main/docs/2022-05-30_the-risks-of-lsd.md)
- Another Evan van Ness podcast with Ben Edgington (issues with governance start around 8min mark):
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WcGpHXTepcA&ab_channel=Web3Builders](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WcGpHXTepcA&ab_channel=Web3Builders)
- Recent Hasu post on future of Lido:
[https://research.lido.fi/t/hasus-goose-submission-proposed-goals-for-lido-dao-to-consider/5590](https://research.lido.fi/t/hasus-goose-submission-proposed-goals-for-lido-dao-to-consider/5590)
- Dune dashboard displaying Lido dominance:
[https://dune.com/hildobby/eth2-staking](https://dune.com/hildobby/eth2-staking)

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rJXenQTlp.png)


---

#### **Transactions (technicalities)**
Unstaking from Lido is a [two-step process](https://stake.lido.fi/withdrawals/request). This proposal deals with step one.

- Approve Withdrawal Queue to transfer any stETH amount owned by the DAO.
    - `0xae7ab96520DE3A18E5e111B5EaAb095312D7fE84.approve(0x889edC2eDab5f40e902b864aD4d7AdE8E412F9B1, uint256.max)`
- Request to withdraw 10837.24266 stETH. The request is split into batches up to 1K ETH due to a Lido [withdrawal limit](https://etherscan.io/address/0x889edC2eDab5f40e902b864aD4d7AdE8E412F9B1#readProxyContract#F6).
    - `0x889edC2eDab5f40e902b864aD4d7AdE8E412F9B1.requestWithdrawals([1000 ether, 1000 ether, 1000 ether, 1000 ether, 1000 ether, 1000 ether, 1000 ether, 1000 ether, 1000 ether, 1000 ether, 837.24266 ether], 0xb1a32FC9F9D8b2cf86C068Cae13108809547ef71)`

---

#### **Notes**
[1] In anticipation of the burn mech, it's necessary for us to reduce our stETH holdings since excess treasury value is denominated in vanilla eth. By reducing stETH, we are _also_ being good Nouns citizens and playing by the intended rules of the burn mechanic.

[2] Assuming this proposal executes, its up to the dao to decide if we want to re-stake, presumably with another solution. This proposal does not make any value judgment around whether Nouns DAO should stake or not; it is solely concerned about the risks of Lido.

*Thanks to Wiz for reading a draft, and Elad for helping with transactions.*

### What is Atenea?

#### Atenea.wtf is the go-to customizable governance client for Nouns DAO members. It adapts to the evolving narrative of community-led efforts within Nouns DAO, offering a dynamic platform for Noun holders to personalize their governance journey.

### Why Atenea?

#### Atenea is more than a governance client—it's a canvas for Nouners to craft their governance masterpiece. It's about turning governance from a duty into an experience. **Shape your governance. Shape your world. Make it Nounish.**

### Our Journey for the Past 4 Months

Some months back, navigating on-chain proposals seemed complex. We saw each DAO member needing a unique solution due to the decentralized and varied nature of our system. So, we aimed for a solution offering freedom—a system to explore governance without limits. With a clear vision, we began to color our sketch.

- #### **Fun and Creativity**:  We built a widget system for customization. Like a canvas to an artist, Atenea aims to spark curiosity in Nouns governance.
![Imgur](https://i.imgur.com/DmjZzRy.gif)
- #### **Agility**: We designed all elements to be flexible and self-adjustable, aiming for a smooth user experience.
![Imgur](https://i.imgur.com/YNy0RUK.gif)
- ####  **Informative**: We created a database to include all necessary information for a Nouner, avoiding the loss of crucial data. Atenea, named after a Greek goddess symbolizing wisdom, reflects our mission for an informed community.
![Imgur](https://i.imgur.com/KRNkiR2.gif)
- #### **Useful and Analytical**: Atenea aims to provide insights from social to economic aspects within DAO, all easily accessible, valuing Nouners' time while enhancing their experience.
![Imgur](https://i.imgur.com/orIQS8t.gif)
----

## Current Widgets from Atenea


We have spent most of our time building the structure of the Atenea, live saving, sharable clients, remix clients, accounts, etc. Even so, we have created 15 widgets with which you can explore governance starting today:

- **4 in one**
![Imgur](https://i.imgur.com/i6lO4D9.gif)

![Imgur](https://imgur.com/WMSgEI6.gif)

![Imgur](https://imgur.com/UocWFlT.gif)

	   

### What Makes Atenea Unique?

The 'network effect' within Nouns is special—it’s about many joining forces for something larger. We envisioned an open system where any coder could create widgets, with imagination being the only limit. This collective effort will birth something unique.

Atenea removes the entry barriers to client development to make Nouns governance more exciting. Choose which part of the governance you want to improve and we will make it as easy as possible for you.

### ROADMAP 

#### **High-Priority**

Roll out features like bidding, making proposals, candidate function, assimilating updates.wtf, and proposal voting.

- Integration of external data sources, such as updates.wtf, would 		   require the development of API connectors or data import tools. This ensures that Atenea keeps up to date with information from these data sources.

- Implementing interaction with smart contracts would involve creating and designing the user experience (UX) for interacting with them, with a strong focus on maximum security.

- The proposal creation system is currently our top priority. It allows users to create proposals directly from Atenea, including all necessary data such as category, budget, roadmap or team, all accessible through Atenea widgets. In addition, all the information in these proposals would be accessible through the API for anyone to use.

#### **Mid-Priority**

- Optimize data processing and improve the open-source widget creation system.

- Atenea will only make sense if it works in public, so articles (for propdates) will be made announcing the progress (2 times a month) and a monthly video talking about the most important aspects in which progress has been made in the period.

# **Wet Butt, So What? Noun's Bidet Revolution!** 

# Summary 

With a $34,000 proposal, MakeWater aims to shift U.S. bathroom culture by promoting bidets, a net positive for the environment and households. Bidets can slash toilet paper costs, boost hygiene, and ease water infrastructure stress. Our pilot will provide Nouns-branded bidets to low-to-middle-income families, complete with DIY installation videos. 
The initiative involves an educational drive where students, acting as citizen scientists, gather and share data on bidet usage and delve into water issues in their region. This hands-on approach also includes field trips to local water facilities, providing them with a comprehensive understanding of bidet advantages. By partnering with water utilities and local governments, we envision a self-sustaining model, continually championing bidet use. 
Additionally, in collaboration with our partner Endaoment, we're running a fundraiser. Contributors providing over 0.05 ETH will receive a **Limited Edition Golden Nouns Bidet ⌐◨-◨** as a token of our appreciation. For those wishing to participate, please donate at [https://app.endaoment.org/orgs/81-1369592](https://app.endaoment.org/orgs/81-1369592). 
As this initiative grabs headlines, Nouns will stand out as the pioneering force behind it. Your support will be the kickstart we need!

**Update** We’ve updated the proposal after listening to feedback and reduced the initial ask, explained our goal for a self-sustained program (no future nouns funding required), and highlighted how Nouns will be seen as the hero catalyzing this revolutionary change in bathroom culture.







# How will it work?
[![Screen Shot 2023-09-20 at 10.20.35 AM|690x388](https://global.discourse-cdn.com/standard17/uploads/lilnouns/original/1X/64fdc44ca71b4895023689cf724500b0b393e1b8.jpeg)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zr56zofQX2o)
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zr56zofQX2o](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zr56zofQX2o)

Our  journey will start with our pilot program in South Texas which will be a pivotal step for data collection, refining strategies, and pinpointing best practices. We are delighted to have already gained the enthusiastic support and active engagement of local utilities and educators,  who will propel the growth of our community and our vision.
Through our ongoing community-building efforts, we will strive to gather a strong initial group of participants in South Texas, our pilot region. Far from being just beneficiaries, these participants will become pioneers, actively contributing to data collection and shaping a communal narrative through social media engagement. These authentic stories, personal experiences and testimonials,  will initiate a cultural shift towards bidet use and create a united front against water wastage.
The Nouns DAO can kickstart this effort, providing the initial push needed to get the ball rolling. But this isn't just a one-time splash; it's a tide of transformation! The real heart of this initiative is its ability to keep going on its own. Our goal is more than just handing out affordable bidets; it's about making a lasting change in how people use bathrooms in America.
This initiative will be a wave of change that keeps building and reaching farther. Our pilot program marks the first splash, but together, we have the power to reshape perspectives, enhance water sustainability, and fundamentally revolutionize water habits across the United States.



# Why Bidets?
Enter the humble toilet-mounted bidet — a nifty contraption that adds a touch of luxury to your bathroom routine. It replaces or fits beneath the toilet seat and uses a a nozzle to spray water for cleansing. Its installation is easy and doesn't demand a plumbing professional. Many models even showcase features like adjustable pressure, temperature control, and self-cleaning. Beyond all that, however, lies an ecological marvel— a cost-effective solution that promotes better hygiene while reducing toilet paper waste.

Bidets have garnered worldwide recognition for their remarkable water-saving abilities and paper-reducing magic. Embracing bidets translates to preserving trees, conserving water, and reducing the energy dedicated to manufacturing and transporting toilet paper.

Their appeal isn't just environmental; it's also rooted in hygiene. Bidets offer hands-free, pristine cleanliness, an invaluable health advantage, especially in a time when global health awareness is at its peak.

Our aging water infrastructure poses yet another challenge. Sewage systems of many cities groan under the weight of non-degradable items. These infrastructures were designed for a different era, and non-degradable products like wet wipes weren't part of the plan. Despite their convenience, wipes don't break down in water like toilet paper does. This leads to stubborn blockages, damages to equipment, and ultimately, significant repair costs that households and communities have to bear.

Bidets, however, offer a sustainable lifeboat. By adopting bidets, we curtail clogs and damages, sparing households and cities from hefty repair costs. It's not just a bathroom upgrade; it's a blueprint for economic resilience, environmental harmony, and public health.

# The City Farmers

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SylB1lAep.png)



## Developing the workforce by decentralizing agriculture in blighted food deserts.

[https://thecityfarmers.org/](https://thecityfarmers.org/)

---
## 📌 **TLDR**

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/HkSJleClT.png)

### **Requesting 300,000 USDC**

- Rent a warehouse
- Purchase growing equipment and materials
- Hire a grantwriter and a videographer/editor

*Funding the research & development of urban agriculture as a public good, while proliferating Nouns ⌐◨-◨*

---

## 🧑‍🌾 **Background/Problem Statement**

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/S1o4vxAla.jpg)
*📝 Map of low-income and low-access areas in the U.S. 
Source: Economic Research Service, U.S. Department of Agriculture*

Food access is a multi-faceted issue. Because food has not been treated as a public good, **over 1.1 billion people globally, including ~10% of the U.S., are food insecure;** meaning they have limited access to stores that offer a variety of healthy and affordable food. This creates severe challenges:
### Public Health
- **Stunted Childhoods and Learning Disorders**: "Longitudinal studies in Canada indicate that hunger is related to poor health outcomes, including a higher risk of depression and suicidal ideation in adolescents, and chronic conditions, particularly asthma. In addition, nutrient deficiencies, such as iron deficiency, are known to impair learning and cause decreased productivity in school-age children, and maternal depressive disorders." - [Food insecurity and hunger: A review of the effects on children’s health and behaviour](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4373582/)
- **Cardiovascular Disease**: A study published in [the Journal of the American Heart Association](https://www.ahajournals.org/doi/full/10.1161/JAHA.119.014629) included more than 27,000 adults surveyed from 1999 to 2014. Researchers found more cardiovascular disease and higher overall death rates among those reporting food insecurity.
- **Obesity**: "Highly energy-dense processed foods that are high in saturated fats, sugars, and sodium are consumed more often than micronutrient-dense quality foods. Energy-dense foods may help meet daily caloric requirements, but essential nutrients are missing. Therefore, in many countries, undernutrition and obesity coexist and both can be consequences of food insecurity." - [Food insecurity as a risk factor for obesity: A review](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9549066/)
### Economic Opportunity
Individuals who live in low-income, low-access neighborhoods tend to deal with employment challenges. This is often due to a lack of economic opportunity in their neigborhood, a lack of positive role models, and interactions with the criminal justice system.
### Global Supply Chains
In the United States, processed foods travel an average of 1,300 miles (~2,100 KM), and fresh produce travels an average of 1,500  miles (~2,400 KM) to get to your local grocery store. - [Food Miles: Background and Marketing](https://attra.ncat.org/publication/food-miles-background-and-marketing/#:~:text=The%20Leopold%20Center%20found%20that,traveled%20amounted%20to%201%2C518%20miles.)

The United Nation's [2021 State of Food and Agriculture report](https://www.fao.org/3/cb4476en/online/cb4476en.html) states that in over 45 nations, the closure of a single route could increase food travel times by 20%+

---

## 💡 **Proposed Solution**
🌐 [*https://thecityfarmers.org/*](https://thecityfarmers.org/)

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/Skh4ws0x6.png)


📝 *This is what we're building towards, the 10-year vision.
Vertical farming in solar glass greenhouses.* 

**The City Farmers** is the premier program of the Kenwood Training Center, a 501c3 non-profit headquartered in Chicago.

We are dedicated to empowering individuals, particularly those with criminal records and veterans, through comprehensive training in sustainable urban agriculture.  Our goal is to promote self-sufficiency and personal growth by equipping them with the skills to operate and own their own greenhouses.

Parallel to this, we champion vibrant neighborhoods. By transforming vacant city lots into commercial agricultural greenhouses, we contribute to the vitality and sustainability of urban communities.

Our finances are managed by the Public Health Institute of Metropolitan Chicago, another 501c3 non-profit, in return for 10% of all donations received.

---

## 🌟 **Opportunity**

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rk9EuERea.jpg)

📝 *We have the opportunity today to get ahead of an exponential global trend.*
*Source: [Data Bridge Market Research](https://www.databridgemarketresearch.com/reports/global-urban-farming-market)*

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/HkDeetCe6.png)

📝 *"In 2022, food spending by U.S. consumers, businesses, and government entities totaled $2.39 trillion" - [Economic Research Service, U.S. Department of Agriculture](https://www.ers.usda.gov/data-products/ag-and-food-statistics-charting-the-essentials/food-prices-and-spending/#:~:text=U.S.%20food%20spending%20in%202020%20totaled%20%241.81%20trillion.,trillion%20in%202021%20to%20%241.34%20trillion%20in%202022.)*

Nouns is an engine for the development of public goods. Access to fresh, nutritionally rich foods is a key determinent of long term mental health and physical wellness. By reframing food as a public good, we have the potential to uplift the whole of society and proliferate the meme through the direct route to people's hearts: their stomachs.

### **Research & Develop Urban Agriculture** 
Kobe University's Graduate School of Agricultural Science in Japan has researched dry-fog aeroponics since 2011. When growing lettuce, this method uses 90-95% less water and 98% less land than traditional agriculture. We can build upon this research to include new crops and refine the method, in partnership with the [Illinois Institute of Technology's Institute of Food Safety & Health](https://www.ifsh.iit.edu/) and the United States Department of Agriculture, who are opening their first ever Urban Ag office in Chicago towards the end of this year and have $9 million of grants we qualify for.
### **Bring Ag Carbon Onchain** 
We're in conversation with developers focused on omnichain & web2 interopability to bring [agricultrual carbon data](https://cid-inc.com/plant-science-tools/leaf-area-measurement/ci-340-handheld-photosynthesis-system/) onchain. There are millions of dollars of government and private grants available for this R&D work.
### **Food as Medicine**
Public health agencies and providers are increasingly recognizing the role of food and nutrition in health outcomes. The Public Health Institute of Metropolitan Chicago has partnered with us and manages our finances. Their deep connections in the pubic health field place us in a strong position to secure grants for this work. 
### **Workforce Development** 
PHIMC also has deep connections with the Illinois Department of Justice and a commitment to restorative justice programs. It is our goal to leverage this to create a workorce development program for individuals with criminal records. We have a pilot location in mind next door to a Juvenile Detention Facility in Chicago.
### **Grassroots Community Empowerment**
By refining the methods and educating the people, Nouns stands to empower low-income, low-access neighborhoods to develop into thriving, sustainable communities by directly addressing their core issues: *health, local nutritious food, and equitable employment.*
### **Ultimate Proliferation**
Bringing Nouns into the grocery store, refigerator, and people's stomachs makes it a household brand, while living true to the founding principles of positive impact through public goods.


Our mission to make nutrious food a public good may be ambitious, however the impact that success would have across society makes it an obvious bet.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BkTtkJxb6.png)

---

## 📊 **Budget Breakdown**

Per the TLDR, our ask is **300,000 USDC** to our payment address at [wallet address.] This funds 1st year startup costs and puts The City Farmers program in a position to generate revenue through crop production within the first year.

In order to be as compliant as possible given the U.S. regulatory environment, and our status as a 501c3 non-profit corporation, 100% of our cryto donations are facilited by [BitPay.](https://bitpay.com/nonprofits/)

### **Annual Salaries - 162,000 USDC**
- Executive Director: 50,000 USDC
- Compliance Officer: 12,000 USDC
- Grantwriter (to be hired): 50,000 USDC
- Videographer/ Editor (to be hired): 50,000 USDC

### **Grow Operations - 108,000 USDC**
- 1st year warehouse rental + utilities (electricity, water, heat) - 45,000 USDC
- 50 Grow Towers - 12,000 USDC
- Seeds, growing medium, nutrients - 10,000 USDC
- Plumbing Materials: 10,000 USDC
- Plumbing Contractor 5,000 USDC
- Pickup Truck Down Payment: 5,000 USDC
- Technology (Staff computers, media equipment:) - 10,000 USDC
- A watering automation controller - 5,000 USDC
- Seed starting station - 5,000 USDC
- Water Tanks - 1,000 USDC

### **10% to PHIMC - 30,000 USDC**
While 10% may seem steep, PHIMC's CFO has over 25 years of experience in public accounting, including CFO-as-a-service for both for-profit and non-profit businesses in previous roles. They play a crucial role in monitoring our financial performance and provide an extra layer of accountability, governance, and legal compliance to our finances.

📝 *As a 501c3 non-profit corporation, our Board has strict fiduciary duties and multiple laws/ IRS tax codes to comply with. Our [governing documents](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1Q28mBj41azbLQOMLQG_NjBgUMSDVMJOt) and [operating policies](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1_mK54RAHAnpSseQqY2ii3vLX5PKhiPTu) can be found in this Google Drive.*

---

## 🏛️ **Our Team**
🌐 [*https://thecityfarmers.org/about/*](https://thecityfarmers.org/about)

The Kenwood Training Center's Board of Directors is composed of:

[**Ian Wylie Hedrick**](https://www.linkedin.com/in/iwylie/) 
-aka wylin💎. wylin's breadth of urban agriculture experience can be found [here](https://wylin.heavens.pictures/urban-ag)

[**Steve Denenberg**](https://www.linkedin.com/in/steve-denenberg-76583b289/)
-President & Co-Founder, M43 Ventures;
-frmr COO of FarmedHere, [a venture-backed 90,000 sq ft indoor urban ag business.](https://www.huffpost.com/entry/farmedhere-nations-largest-vertical-farm_n_2933739)

[**Nick Tanev**](https://www.linkedin.com/in/nick-tanev/)
-Financial Consultant at Venat Capital Strategies
-frmr SEC Reporting Consultant at Workvia & frmr Regulatory Examiner at the CBOE.

***Per our bylaws, Directors are not compensated for their role; they may be hired as staff.***

### Our Staff:
- **Ian Wylie Hedrick:** Executive Director
- **Nick Tanev:** Compliance Officer
- **TBD:** Grantwriter
- **TBD:** Videographer/ Editor

---

## 🧭 **Implementation**


![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/S1w26o0ga.png)

📝 *Installation view of dry-fog aeroponic towers with watering automation, 
almost the exact setup City Farmers will be deploying.*

The mighiest of trees began as a seed, and the same is true of the City Farmers. 
With 300,000 USDC, our organization can:

### **Rent a Warehouse**
We're in contact with a handful of Commercial Real Estate firms. In particular, there is a 2,225 square foot warehouse with skylights that is well with in our budget, and may donate a portion of the lease.
### **Purchase equipment to grow 5,000 individual plants simultaneously**
If we were under pressure to focus on revenue, this setup could generate $80-100,000 gross annual revenue growing romaine lettuce, sold at a retail price of $2 per head.
### **Capacity Build**
An experienced grantwriter is critical to securing federal funding.
A videographer/ editor allows us to share our work in a compelling and dynamic manner.
### **Fundraise!**
The successful implementation of a large donation from Nouns will give Corporate Responsbility/ Impact professionals, Corporate/ Family Foundation directors, and high-dollar donors the confidence to donate to our program with the assurance their dollars are being put to good use.

**Our mindset and vision is longterm. Our medium term financial goal is to raise at least $5 million to invest in an endowment and fund the organization's basic operation in perpetuity.**

*$5M + 5% annual interest = $250,000 operating budget, in perpetuity.*

---

## 🔍 **DYOR**
🌐 [*https://thecityfarmers.org/roadmap/*](https://thecityfarmers.org/roadmap)

This project has been a work in progress for several years. Many thanks to our mentors for guiding and advising us along the way, and encouraging us to pivot when needed.

After a founder recommended we pursue the 501c3 non-profit model, FoodNouns gave us our founding grant via [Prop.House](https://prop.house/foodnouns/open-kitchen-rounds-3/5862), May 2023. This allowed us to secure a contract which ultimately landed us with our finance partner.

It was connections made shortly after at Chicago's Nounish Bitcoin Pizza Day that ultimately formed our Board of Directors.

# Build-A-Noun

## TL;DR

Drop an open edition of Nouns traits & Build-A-Noun system using [ERC6551](https://tokenbound.org/) and TBAs, based on [Station](https://www.station.express/)’s [Loot2](http://l00t.world).

## TEAM
-   [Michael](https://twitter.com/0xmcg) - contracts + front-end - built [l00t.world](http://l00t.world). [[Github](https://github.com/mcgingras)]
-   [Martin](https://twitter.com/anquetil) - front-end - built [mogu.wtf](https://www.mogu.wtf/), [updates.wtf](https://www.updates.wtf/). [[Github](https://github.com/anquetil)]

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BkH5fbkZp.png)


## WHY
Nouns has minted and encouraged Open Edition [Droposals](http://nouns.wtf/vote/346) to generate revenue for the DAO and open ownership to Nouns media.

With Build-A-Noun, we can expand this to Nouns' core artwork with an open edition that allows fans and Nouns-curious folks to build their own Noun. This can be a huge Droposal event that onboards many new Nouns players via a fun, yet meaningful, open edition that others can build upon.

## HOW
Anyone can mint a Character on an infinite open edition. Each Character can hold Traits (NFTs) - noggles, heads, etc… They can then equip those traits and the character will reflect them visually onchain.

The distribution of the NFT traits will happen via a 3-day open edition on a standalone site, where users can mint every trait, and build their Noun.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/HyADfWkZT.png)

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rJpOz-kbp.png)

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/S1hFfWyW6.png)

## TECH
Everything will be deployed on Base for low gas fees. The DAO will be the owner of the contracts and will be able to add new traits in the future via Droposals. If there is any centralization needed, we will come back to the DAO to make decisions.

Character / Noun / TBA :
-   [Loot2 Example](https://basescan.org/token/0xadbc7ec633b78dc4407215d56eb0861dd7c51431)
-   A separate contract that can hold any number of traits (3 heads, 0 shirts, 1 background, etc..), and can then be equipped or unequipped
-   Comes with 0 traits
 
Traits / NFTs :
-   [Loot2 Example](https://basescan.org/token/0xb7d488da393b4f34813dabeb295931a2b86ea505#code)
-   Traits will all be sold in a 3-day open edition, where users can pick which traits to mint, as many of each as they want
-   New traits can be added to the contracts via DAO Proposals (community submissions or noundry creations for example)
-   Start with all the traits currently in the DAO.

## DETAILS
We aim to have the project completed by the end of November.

The target for mint fee / price is similar to Zora's - 0.001 ETH, or ~$1. If this can reach a large audience like past Droposals, this could bring significant revenue to the DAO. For reference, This is Nouns minted 3,500 editions at 0.05 ETH, or 175 ETH total.

Compensation;
-   3 ETH to [Station](https://www.station.express/) for contract work
-   5% of mint fees each for Michael and Martin (based on Agora’s [Droposals fee](https://nouns.wtf/vote/346)) via 0xSplits.

# Sail Nouns: NFT NYC 2024

## TL;DR
Gather the Nounish community on a big boat during NFT.NYC. The New York evening view from a sailboat is the best place to take photos while wearing Noggles.

*Resubmission notes: As per feedback on [Prop386](https://nouns.wtf/vote/386), I am resubmitting the proposal for NYC.NFT sailing event. You can also mint photos from last event on ZORA*

## Description
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/HJjKkJqun.jpg)
Following the success of [Prop 102](https://nouns.wtf/vote/102) and [Prop 173](https://nouns.wtf/vote/173), I would like to organize a sailing event on April 3rd in New York with the help of the Manhattan Yacht Club. IMO, it is important to gather at least once a year to celebrate achievements, brainstorm ideas, and share nounish goods. I believe New York is the best place for such gatherings. It was an amazing experience to meet everyone for the first time in person during NFT.NYC 2023. I think next year, we will have even more loyal nounish people visiting New York.

## Burgee flag
We have a very beautiful flag with a meaning. *A white flag with red noggles symbolizes one noun! When you put many nouns burgee flags together, they symbolize the Nouns community.* The Nouns burgee flag debuted at the 2023 Nouns Sailing event during NFT.NYC, representing the spirit of Nouns and the tradition of the Nounish community. I would love to continue this tradition to distribute burgee flags at sailing event in NY.

## Mint photos
[MINT PHOTOS FROM NFTNYC2023 ON ZORA](https://zora.co/collect/zora:0x2d2505a06797a4b6a313c45e201d78834621e2b2)

![](https://pink-feminist-vole-608.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/QmWfRcMcvTpAaa2KApVzY7vuwWxsDUriPF2TCpj9LJviDd)

# Budget
- **$18,000** Rent sail yacht Arabella
- **$12,000** - Food and drinks by Manhattan Yacht Club
- **$5,000** - 120 Nouns burgee flags
- **$5,000** - 100 T-shirts (plus art by Messhup)
- **$5,000** - Airfare and wage for Five
- **$12,000** - Unexpected expenses (tax, crew allowance etc)

Makerspace Construction + Equipment - 470,000 USD (24-36 months)
