## 🌟 Proven Success in EdTech: Global Impact & Engagement 🌟
Our apps are already used by hundreds of thousands of students yearly across the globe, with impressive success stories such as:  

 1. [Move It](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/move-it/kopilngnmfklhhjocdfdlokmodibcbmk): A brain break Chrome extension for students with 98 million pageviews.
 2. [Balance It](https://apps.apple.com/au/app/balance-it-task-cards/id630956844): An interactive mobile app for teaching gymnastics and balance skills, with over 1 million downloads.
 3. [Sports Tracker](https://sportstrackerapp.com/): A school sports software with over 330,000 student accounts.  

These achievements demonstrate our dedication to creating and delivering high-quality experiences that resonate with students and educators worldwide, as well as our capacity to effectively reach & shape these audiences.



---

## 💡 Nouns ROI: Benefits to the Nouns DAO
### 🌍 Real-Life Proliferation of Nouns
The Nouns Capture app offers a unique opportunity to expand the Nouns brand's reach among the global school student body, targeting a vast and diverse audience. By launching the app to our network of 20,000 PE teachers, we will introduce thousands of students to the Nouns ecosystem. While many proposals focus on Web 3 users, we believe that true proliferation stems from making Nouns known in traditional contexts. Schools serve as an ideal avenue for genuine proliferation, as they bridge the gap between the digital world and everyday life, providing an immersive and educational experience for students to learn about and engage with the Nouns ecosystem.

### 🤝 Engage the Next Generation
The World Economic Forum estimates that over 1 billion people will be using blockchain-based systems by 2030, and much of this future audience is currently in today's schools. By introducing Nouns and Web 3 to students early on, we can help cultivate a knowledgeable user base familiar with the Nouns ecosystem and contribute to the broader Web 3 community. We plan to do this via in-app education and interactive experiences.

![enter image description here](https://connectedpe.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/Screenshot-2023-09-15-at-11.58.09-am.png)

---

## 🎤 Nouns Capture at NFT Conferences and Events
Nouns Capture will be a valuable tool that can be leveraged at NFT conferences and events as an innovative and engaging way to educate attendees about Nouns and Lil Nouns. By utilizing Nouns Capture in these situations, we aim to create memorable experiences for participants and generate enthusiasm for the Nouns ecosystem.  
Here's a simple scenario illustrating how Nouns Capture can be effectively utilized at NFT conferences and events:  
- Attendees are informed about the Nouns Capture activity during the event's opening announcements or through promotional materials distributed before the event.
- They are instructed to download the Nouns Capture app on their smartphones to participate in the activity.
- The event organizers have strategically placed Nouns hidden within QR codes throughout the venue. These QR codes could be located at various points of interest, such as exhibits, booths, or food and beverage stations.
- Attendees use the Nouns Capture app to scan and collect the hidden Nouns as they explore the venue and engage with the event's programming.
- As they collect Nouns, participants also learn about Web 3 concepts and the Nouns ecosystem, further enhancing their understanding and connection to the Nouns brand.
- Upon completion of the activity, attendees return to the Nouns booth to prove their captures by showing their in-app journal containing the collected Nouns.
- Event organizers reward the participants with prizes, such as exclusive NFTs, merchandise, or event passes, creating a memorable and engaging experience for attendees.

---

UI Refinement and Android Development (Nouns Capture): $15,000
Marketing and Global Launch: $10,000
Curriculum Integration and Content Development: $5,000
Operations: $5,000 USDC
Total: 35,000 USDC

---

## 🗓️ Project Timeline: 4-Month Roadmap to Success
### 📅 Months 1-2
- 🎨 UI Refinement and Android Development for Nouns Capture
### 📅 Months 3-4
- 🎯 Finalize App Features and Integrations
- 📚 Start Curriculum Integration and Content Development
- 🚀 Begin Marketing and Global Launch preparations
- 📚 Complete Curriculum Integration and Content Development
- 🚀 Finalize Marketing and Global Launch preparations
- 🌐 Nouns Capture App Global Launch
- 🛠️ Operations commence

---

## 🔧 Ongoing Support and Maintenance
Creating and maintaining impactful educational experiences for students worldwide is at the heart of our business. The ConnectedPE team is fully committed to providing ongoing support and maintenance for the Nouns Capture app as an integral part of our app portfolio. This is what happens when you build aligned experiences that are designed for real-world use; it is NOT a burden to upkeep these as they are fundamental experiences for those in our audience. Nouns Capture will receive the same level of support and attention as any of our other apps and products, ensuring its continued success and impact on global students. This commitment comes without any additional cost from the DAO.

# Onchain Myth.

**To every age its art, to every art its freedom**.

You'll spot this motto right at the entrance of the Secession Building in Vienna. To me, it perfectly aligns with the Nouns concept. With blockchain tech, we can expand these elements, showcasing not just today's aesthetics but also the timeless stories within our community that will stand strong for years to come.


---

## **A Graphic Novel (Vol 1)**.
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BkNjEYyzT.png)
*Draft Cover/Poster*

I’m targeting Graphic Novel readers (15+) who love both sci-fi and fantasy + adventure, usually read action-packed stories, but also love tech, and (included but not limited) are crypto users.
The graphic novel will include concepts related to decentralization, blockchain, and internet technologies, and will show how Nouns live in this interesting universe.

I firmly believe that we can find the right audience in Web3 at first, it’s an amazing niche to build a tech-oriented story and ultimately an onchain mythology, in which Nouns could be not only at the core of it but represent great values and a positive-sum culture.

To me, nouns are not only pixel characters, but something more, they are storytelling vehicles full of potential. And at the same time, there are dozens of small elements in our community lore to include in the story. 

---

## **Evolution of the Nouns aesthetics (from my POV):**
We all love the original Nouns, they are perfect as the source material, but they are also really adaptable to using them in different styles.
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/HyPczHAWa.png)
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BJ-R9gHga.png)
*The last two images are from April-June 2022.*

 In this world-building adventure, I've given the term "Noun" a fresh perspective, digging into its meaning both on the surface and at a deeper, symbolic level. This project isn't just about testing how Nouns look; it's also about spinning an engaging tale. We want to hook current Noun fans and introduce new readers to our world, even if they're not blockchain or DAO experts.
 
---

## **Distribution:**
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rJE-Pclfa.png)
Draft Cover.

**Digital First:**
The main distribution strategy will be online (Free download from the website, manga/comic reader apps like Comixology, Viz Media, Kindle, and P2P/torrents).
Most of the dedicated comic reader apps have more than 500K users minimum, but in the case of bigger apps like Comixology or Viz Media, they have millions of users combined in both the App Store and Google Store.

**Physical:**
Physical copies will be handled through Amazon (highly efficient, global coverage, and no upfront costs). Plus, in case we can make a deal with regional publishers, it's easy to shut down the distribution of a translated version directly on Amazon.


**4 Languages:**
English, Spanish, Japanese, and French. 

I cannot emphasize enough the significance of translating the graphic novel. Translating the artwork can create opportunities for publication by one or multiple publishers in Europe, Asia, or North America. Since many major publishers prefer to review a complete work, and this being the first volume, it could serve as an ideal means to engage regional publishers worldwide.


---

## **Concept Art:**

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rJoFWSRZT.png)

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SJYtXrR-a.png)

---
## **Summary of the story (subject to changes):**


Meet Shady, a Noun who doesn't quite fit the mold of an obedient or exemplary citizen in a world teeming with adventurers, mysteries, and high achievers. His existence is a quiet rebellion in a society that prizes conformity. However, it seems destiny, if it exists, has grander designs for Shady. His insatiable curiosity catapults him into the uncharted territories of unexplored worlds.

As Shady embarks on this enigmatic journey, it becomes clear that more than just his life is at stake. The fate of his entire kind rests on his shoulders, and time is of the essence. He's faced with a dilemma: will he seize this opportunity to change the course of history or let it slip through his fingers?



## **Sample Pages**
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/ryDRkBRWp.png)


## **Characters from the first volume:**
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/Bk-7xu1zp.png)

**Featuring the NounBots:**

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rJVbJ9xza.png)
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/S1nzkqeMa.png)
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SkRmycgM6.png)

---

## **Building in Public:**

I’m also building a graphic style to present the development of the project to the public in a more entertaining way using videos and/or live streams. This way people can follow more closely the development of the graphic novel and can ask questions about nouns and their ecosystem.

The goal is to make 2 videos per week (1 to 2 hours each) showing the process of the Graphic Novel, the idea is to use Twitch or YouTube (ideally both).
I can also use propdates.wtf to show the latest news of the prop and the Manga channel in Farcaster.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SyO0trwWa.png)
*This is a sample of how the videos could look like*.

---

## **Scope and Budget**:
Since this is a graphic novel of 64 pages I will need around 10 to 12 months to finish it.
The ideal deadline would be the next Nouniversary and I’ll push myself and the team involved to do so, but I’m organizing the dates including all the team efforts and the standard timeframes to make the deadline more realistic so it could be released in October/November next year.


---
## **Budget Breakdown:**

- **Preproduction - 8 eth**
  - World Building
  - Concept art 
  - Environment design
  - Character Sheets
  - Props Design 
- **Script - 8 eth**
- **Art Development - 29 eth**
  - Layouts - 6 eth
  - Pencils - 8 eth
  - Inks + Screentones - 11 eth
  - Lettering + VFX/SFX - 4 eth
- **Editorial - 6 eth**
  - Proofreading and formatting for each language.
  - Title and character/localization.
- **Translation - 8 eth**
  - Japanese, French, Spanish.
- **Marketing - 15 eth**
  - Contests / Collaborations
  - Promoted content inside specialized comic websites/forums.
  - Extra collectibles: Wallpapers (desktop and mobile), Open Editions, etc.
  - Promotional video.
- **Management - 10 eth.**
- **Website - 6 eth**
### **Total= 90 eth + Noun 81***

*I would need some extra help with the transfer of the Noun in case the DAO accepts the request.

---
## **It's a me, Messhup!**
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/Syxp3uJfa.jpg)


I've been officially building with Nouns since November 2021, and since then my life changed completely.

Not only I’ve made amazing friends in these 2 years but also collaborated with several SubDAOs and teams like TNS, SharkDAO, GnarsDAO, LilNouns, POAP, Bankless, and many more. Outside of Web3, I’ve worked with Adidas, ExxonMobil, Penguin Random House, LEGO, and more to come.

I have more than 10 years as an illustrator and I feel confident executing this prop, not only because is in my wheelhouse, but also because I've been part of the Nouniverse since the beginning and know the culture, inside jokes and small details that can be easter eggs in this graphic novel. I also have previous experience publishing books, and thanks to the DAO I self-publish [**100 Days of Nouns**](https://nounsense.xyz/), in just 6 months! (2022).

---
**Got Questions?**
I have a separate doc highlighting some of the possible questions I could receive for this prop and will be updating the doc during the voting period. Feel free to check them out **[HERE](https://hackmd.io/JmagYev8T0Wx06eOe0hCKw)**.

You can also find me on Farcaster, Discord, and Twitter as @Messhup.
Thanks for reading, have a good one ᛉ

# 🏠 Nouns House DAO

### 📝 Proposed by yukihamada.eth ([@yukihamada](https://x.com/yukihamada))

---

## 📋 Executive Summary:
As the proud owner of Nouns 312, I am deeply impressed by the vision and expansion strategy behind [NounsDeli](https://nouns.wtf/vote/254) and [NounsBuilder Protocol](https://nouns.wtf/vote/167). I propose an initial investment of 312 ETH into the newly formed "Nouns House DAO," which will be a rebranding of the current Enabler DAO. This investment aims to fortify and grow the entire Nouns ecosystem. This proposal also represents the Initial NFT Offering (INO) of Nouns House DAO.

The ultimate goal is to evolve Nouns House into a platform similar to Airbnb, allowing users to easily rent out their homes. What sets this platform apart is the featuring of Nouns characters, adding a unique layer of branding and engagement. Moreover, Nouns House aims to offer lower fees than Airbnb, making it a more cost-effective option for users.

This new initiative has high synergy potential with existing property rental platform development projects, promising innovative value through the utilization of smart contracts and NFTs.

## 🔍 What is Enabler DAO?

Enabler DAO is a Tokyo-based decentralized autonomous organization founded by Yuki Hamada, a serial tech entrepreneur and a former executive CPO of Mercari, a unicorn company in Japan. The organization specializes in developing property rental platforms using smart contracts and manages high-end properties in Tokyo, Hawaii, Kyoto, and Hokkaido. Given its successful real estate ventures and its profit-generating business model, Enabler DAO is at a pivotal stage, transitioning into tokenization. This evolution marks the birth of Enabler DAO as a key player in the blockchain and real estate space. Additionally, it is planning to introduce special benefits for NFT holders, such as the ability to rent available properties at discounted rates, leveraging its expertise and existing assets to foster new growth opportunities.

## ❓ Why Approve This Proposal?

- **Beyond Art**: Nouns is more than just an art project; it functions as the foundation for a new decentralized protocol. Nouns House DAO is one example, making this not just a proposal but an extension of the Nouns ecosystem. It offers growth and innovation opportunities for both communities.

- **Established and Audited**: Nouns House DAO has already been launched and is built with the security-audited NounsBuilder.

- **Initial Benchmark Price**: The 312 ETH allocation has the potential to serve as an initial benchmark price. In return, 1/20th of the founders' share will be allocated to nouns.eth, bringing economic benefits to the Nouns community.

- **Treasury Allocation**: The 312 ETH will be transferred to the Nouns House DAO's treasury, to be utilized for various initiatives in a DAO-governed manner.

- **Future Valuation**: In the 15 days leading up to approval, the next treasury could exceed the current average price of Nouns, indicating high future potential for the project.

- **Momentum from 15-Day Window**: If approved within 15 days, the treasury price per NFT would increase by 20.8 ETH (312/15), adding momentum to Nouns House DAO.

- **Setting a Good Precedent**: This approach could set a good precedent for future DAOs and projects, strengthening the decentralized ecosystem and serving as a model for how existing projects can evolve symbiotically.

## 🆕 New Features to Consider
  
- **Artwork and Rewards**: Nouns House will have special tokens based on different combinations of Nouns artwork like houses🏠, earth🌏, and islands🌴.
  
- **Property Contributions**: I personally own seven properties worth about $10 million, which will be part of Nouns House.  Instagram page [Enabler.Fun](https://www.instagram.com/enabler.fun/).

- **Legal Hurdles**: We recognize that transferring physical property into digital assets is complicated and will tread carefully.

## 🗳 Approval and Bidding Process

- **For Nouns Holders**: Vote and bid [here](https://nouns.build/dao/ethereum/0x7F4Ec49a66D773D63092dbD8FbCDFC71C9D9e2f3).

- **For Non-Holders**: The auction is live! Start bidding from 0 ETH [here](https://nouns.build/dao/ethereum/0x7F4Ec49a66D773D63092dbD8FbCDFC71C9D9e2f3).

- **Treasury & Governance**: The 312 ETH allocation will be governed by votes from NFTs won in the auctions and from nouns.eth shared treasury.

## 🎉 Conclusion:
Approval of this proposal will significantly benefit not just our initiative but the Nouns ecosystem at large. We eagerly await your support and participation.

# Fortify the Nouns Garden with..Nouns

I suggest sending 4 nutrient-rich Nouns to prop house.

Included some here as placeholders, but if this is something the network finds interesting, folks/gardeners can weigh in on specific IDs that could be a better fit for the experiment and I can update. 

There is an emergent opportunity to incorporate a trial run of Noun grants in parallel with the nascent Nouns Eth-sowing efforts of the upcoming Gardener rounds. I think we'd learn a lot from the relative interest/engagement & qualitative differences in proposals campaigning for the respective tokens, especially if rounds are held side-by-side. 

Prop House/protocol feels like the perfect infrastructure to experiment with merit-based grants of permanent gov rights in Nouns.    

Not to belabor the point, but DAO + burn addresses some of the value proposition of prop house wrt mandated eth rounds; want to allocate x eth every y days? schedule an  x eth burn every y days. its arguable that this is preferable than prop house as last resort forcing function since it is probably worse to fund an egregiously bad proposal than to re-distribute dao wealth via burn (the respective worst-case coordination failure scenarios). 

HOWEVER
there is no way to force Noun recirculation via burn threat since some in dao (unthinkable as it may be) may view sending Nouns into oblivion as somehow..acceptable. 

 Prop house rounds can force Noun recirculation and ultimately motivate dao to think deeply about getting as many tokens into long-term wallets as possible.

# The Noun Pulse


EDIT: We've updated this proposal based on community feedback. Looking forward to your thoughts!

---

*“Is Nouns activity growing?” “Who is helping increase engagement and spreading the meme?” “Which proposals are driving growth?” “What’s our spend rate?” “How many builders are contributing to the Nouns ecosystem?” “Are the amount of proposal candidates increasing?”*

## **TL;DR**

We aim to create a single-purpose website where Nouns activity metrics are published. It will integrate activity across social channels and highlight which Nouns, advocates, and proposals have best supported the Noun’s meme propagation. Our creative motto is: *Track Memes, Not People.*

As a starting point, this proposal focuses on [1] onchain activity (supported by the Nouns subgraph), [2] two sources of social media (Farcaster and Instagram), and [3] a limited set of metrics — such as proposal submissions, votes, comments, posts, and engagement. Opportunistically, we will incorporate additional sources and expand the set of metrics.

## Background

As of the moment, the Nouns’ community and audience members produce a wide variety of data. Over time, more data is likely to migrate onchain (e.g. similar to vote comments today) and data will be produced across even more digital localities. The *United World of Nouns* will have a wide-ranging data footprint. Combining data across these localities can become a powerful tool for proposal development and decision-making.

However, as @Krel mentioned in their [Request for Proposers](https://www.notion.so/Nouns-DAO-Request-for-Proposers-94dadff999ac493b9902aa002e4b296e?pvs=21):

> *“Nouns DAO does not have a reliable way to measure ‘growth’ or ‘success’. Its not clear what should be measured, or what growth in the context of Nouns even means.”*
> 

This project will create an initial repository of activity growth combining onchain and offchain data. We are long overdue to experiment on this front!

## Scope

The metrics tracker will be in the form of a single-purpose web application.

To begin, we will include onchain data available in the Nouns Subgraph and two social media channels: Farcaster and Instagram. We will publish a selection of core metrics that provide clarity to Noun holders and the wider community.

Most importantly, the underlying data pool (Meme Activity Database) will serve a first step towards a data-driven Nouns culture, which community members and potential builders can use to find opportunities for proposal submissions.

Success of this project will be measured based on web application usage (unique visitors), proposal references (e.g. This project will increase X metric supporting Noun activity growth), and data pool connections (e.g. external usage of the Meme Activity Database).

As a stretch goal, we will look to expand the data sources, for example including key derivative NFT projects (Gnars, LilNouns, cc0-lib) and other dominant social spaces (Discord, Discourse, X, Lens, etc).

*Note: X (formerly Twitter) has been deprioritized due to its cost ($5k per month) until initiative is proven useful. It would be included in future proposals.*

*Note: Discord has been deprioritized due to its fragmentation (there multiple Nouns servers) until initiative is proven useful. It would be included in future proposals.*

## Product Components

### 

Whenever we want to test our internet speed, we can easily go to a speed test website. If we want to see how our activity on X (formerly Twitter), we can go to profile analytics. 

**Where do we go to check how the Nouns ecosystem is growing?** We go to *.*

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/ByD5JEHfp.png)

The Pulse is a single purpose website showcasing onchain and offchain activity metrics. This includes public conversations related to the **********************United World of Nouns.********************** The main graph, which we are currently calling *“Activity Momentum”* will showcase daily activity growth, a proxy for the Noun meme adoption and mind-share online.

Our data analytics approach will combine methodologies from (1) traditional media broadcasting (e.g. combining data like number of views, replies, likes, proposal submissions, unique voters, etc.), (2) crypto-native metrics common across DAOs, and (3) materials science and engineering (read more about how engineers develop [material selection indexes here](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Material_selection)).

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/HJSJgVrGp.png)

Data will be synchronized in real-time directly from the Nouns’ Subgraph, Farcaster, Instagram to an SQL database. The sync mechanism will be architected in a uniform adapter interface for easier future integration with other onchain data and offchain sources, such as Twitter, Discourse, Discord, Telegram, DeSo, and Lens.

**Example Onchain Metrics:**

- Treasury
- Treasury Usage Rate (Monthly Spend)
- Burn Value
- Candidate Props Growth
- Proposal Submissions Growth
- Active Proposals
- Percent of Proposals Funded
- Total Unique Builders
- Average Auction Price

**Example Offchain Metrics:**

- Number of Posts
- Total Engagement (Likes+Comments+Shares)
- Engagement Rate (Ratio of Engagement to Posts)
- Most Engaged Content
- Total Followers
- Follower Growth Rate (Updated based on API opportunity)
- Noggles Score: Count of posts using “⌐◨-◨” on Farcaster*

**In the first phase it won’t be possible to index Instagram posts by content, only be hashtags. As a result, the Noggles Score won’t be able to include Instagram posts.*

### Meme Activity Database (a.k.a. The MAD)

Curcially, the product’s underlying data model will be available for others to query and contribute to. That way, others can embed the index into their own Noun interfaces. Anyone should be able to get clean and reliable **meme-data-as-a-service** to support a diversity of Noun initiatives. Imagine a world where active proposals have conversation hype trackers, or ongoing projects can easily see total impressions across social media channels.

At the end of the day, we want to facilitate the use of data across the Nouns ecosystem. As the cc0 library enables media usage, the activity database enables tracking and impact analysis.

The Web API interface will be available publicly in the form of parametrizable JSON endpoints. The data will be distributed per specific sources (onchain Nouns, Farcaster, and others) as well as in aggregated form to enable the development of tools such as alerts, bots, and analytics dashboards.

## Product Roadmap

The execution of this project will be done in an iterative fashion. By building in public and getting ongoing feedback, we can deliver what the community needs, and data that will support Nouns decisions.

**Iterative Phases:**

- **Phase 1:** Deliver basic UI w/ limited branding and processed Farcaster data displayed in form of metrics. Deliver mock-up UI for onchain metrics and Instagram metrics. Host open Q&A with Nouns (e.g. via Aburra) to gather community feedback.
- **Phase 2:** Deliver basic UI w/ Farcaster metric feedback, plus Noun Subgraph indexing and onchain metrics. Host open Q&A (e.g. via Aburra) to gather community feedback.
- **Phase 3:** Deliver basic UI w/ Farcaster, Onchain metric feedback, and Instagram metrics for specific accounts and hashtags. Host open Q&A (e.g. via Aburra) to gather community feedback.
- **Phase 4:** Complete UI polishing and metrics calibration. Host open Q&A (e.g. via Aburra) to celebrate launch and discuss future opportunities (where next).

## An Ambitious Vision

This project aims to uncover what “Nouns-Native” analytics could look like, and what data infrastructure is necessary to feed this analytics into the broader Nouns governance and participation process.

We’ve already intuited that we want to ***Track*** ***Memes, Not People*** — and we’re certain there will be other innovations along the way. After all, we need to address challenges in crossing the web3-to-web2 data pipeline chasm. Is it possible? We think so.

Nouns is a place for ambitious ideas, and we are an ambitious team.

## Team

This project will be led and executed by Rafa Fernandez (Farcaster: @rafa) and Rafi Gutkowski (Farcaster: @rafi). 

- Rafa Fernandez is a community architect with a focus on building [Digital Public Utilities](https://www.notion.so/General-Networks-e4615b9b52294f8bab34a82b47023d11?pvs=21). He has decade of experience in corporate analytics and studied materials-science and engineering. He is the founder of Folklore (Folklore.Institute), a community that curates and commissions research on digital cultures. Most recently, he was part of the Summer of Protocols research program looking at [online swarms](https://www.notion.so/Welcome-to-the-Swarm-41c114211ac045f087c44c16bd993748?pvs=21). Previous to the program he worked at Mirror where he worked in creator partnerships and community development.
- Rafi Gutkowski is a software engineer and data scientist ([libred.org](https://libred.org/), [LinkedIn](http://linkedin.com/in/rgutkowski)). He started mining bitcoin in 2015 but only after exiting from his recent startup, did he double down on web3. Since then Rafi has been working on sementic analysis of decentralized social graphs, as well as creating web3-web2 bridges, such as Folklore’s web3-signature to feed [broadcast applet](https://www.notion.so/Folklore-5d34757913064064b87119c4593eda74?pvs=21).

## Funding

We are a stream of 22.5 ETH to fund this project over approximately 10 weeks.

The funds will be allocated to a two-person team (Rafa and Rafi). They are split roughly 25-75 between planning and iterative engineering. There is about a 40-40-10 between data engineering, visuals and handoff. There is approximately 10% reserved for bugs and issue resolution.

We expect that once the initial traunch of data engineering and visuals is complete, then we can make a decision on what the community needs more of (if anything), such as expanded data, or expanded analysis

## Our Commitments

- We commit to posting updates on [updates.wtf](https://updates.wtf/) with sprint plan and outcomes, in alignment with each of the community Q&A feedback sessions.
- We commit to cancelling the stream based on community feedback.
- We commit to executing this work as an open-source project, such that other onchain communities and organizations can benefit.

## Other Notes

This proposal was built based on the Basic Nouns Proposal Template, built by Rafa and available here: https://hackmd.io/@rafathebuilder/BkPAmHZbp

If you’d like to learn more about this proposal, the first Q&A conversation on Aburra is available here: https://youtu.be/_dr2yZulMG

# The City Farmers - Proliferating the Meme by Making Food a Public Good

## 📌 TL;DR

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/S1zlywmW6.png)

Food, a basic building block of life, is not treated as a public good.
[As a result, nearly 1/3 of the global population has insecure access to food.](https://www.fao.org/state-of-food-security-nutrition/2021/en/#:~:text=Moderate%20or%20severe%20food%20insecurity%20has,30%20percent%20of%20the%20world%20population&text=Moderate%20or%20severe%20food,of%20the%20world%20population&text=severe%20food%20insecurity%20has,30%20percent%20of%20the) 
**Nouns is an engine for positive sum world-building; 
making food a public good is core infrastructure for a positive-sum world.**

### **Requesting 300,000 USDC**

1️⃣ **Rent a warehouse.**
2️⃣ **Purchase growing equipment and materials.**
3️⃣ **Grow a few thousand pounds of strawberries.**
4️⃣ **Hire a grantwriter and a videographer/editor.**
5️⃣ **Become self-sustaining without requiring further funding.**

## ⌛️ 0-24 Month Deliverables

The mighiest of trees began as a seed, and the same is true of the City Farmers. 
With 300,000 USDC, our organization can:

### 1️⃣ **Rent a Warehouse**
We're in contact with a handful of Commercial Real Estate firms. In particular, is this warehouse with skylights that is well with in our budget, and may donate a portion of the lease.
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BJ2HwxE-6.jpg)

### 2️⃣ **Purchase equipment to grow 5,000 plants simultaneously**
If we were under pressure to focus on revenue, this setup could generate $80-100,000 gross annual revenue growing romaine lettuce, sold at a retail price of $2 per head.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/H1AnFxNWT.png)
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/S1w26o0ga.png)

📝 *Installation view of dry-fog aeroponic towers with watering automation, 
almost the exact setup City Farmers will be deploying.*

### 3️⃣ **Grow ~4,000 pounds of Strawberries**
- Using day-neutral strawberry transplants, we can produce over 2 tons of strawberries within 18 months of the growing system being installed. We will donate them to the community, and sell them at the local farmers markets as we complete applications and are given permission to.
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BkuDtOoZa.png)

### 4️⃣ **Capacity Build**
- An experienced grantwriter is critical to securing federal funding;
we expect to submit for $9M+ of federal grants by June 2024.
- A videographer/ editor allows us to share our work in a compelling and dynamic manner.

### 5️⃣ **Fundraise!**
The successful implementation of funding from Nouns will give the United States Federal Government & State Governments, Corporate Responsbility/ Impact professionals, Corporate/ Family Foundation directors, and high-dollar donors the confidence to give grants to our program with the assurance their dollars are being put to good use.

**Our mindset and vision is longterm. Our medium term financial goal is to raise at least $5 million to invest in an endowment and fund the organization's basic operation in perpetuity.**

*$5M + 5% annual interest = $250,000 operating budget, in perpetuity.*

---

🌐 [*https://thecityfarmers.org/about/*](https://thecityfarmers.org/about)

The Kenwood Training Center's Board of Directors is composed of:

[**Ian Wylie Hedrick**](https://www.linkedin.com/in/iwylie/) 
-aka wylin💎. in a previous position, wylin was responsible for the physical conditions and maintenance of 19 school and community gardens across the City of Chicago.(https://wylin.heavens.pictures/urban-ag)

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rJ-r94vWa.jpg)

[**Steve Denenberg**](https://www.linkedin.com/in/steve-denenberg-76583b289/)
-President & Co-Founder, M43 Ventures;
-frmr Co-Founder & COO of FarmedHere, [a venture-backed 90,000 sq ft indoor urban ag business.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kRlzRIOcrcU) Steve has experience operating an urban ag business at scale, and selling products to Whole Foods, Kroger, and other national grocery retailers.
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SylCLlVb6.jpg)

[**Nick Tanev**](https://www.linkedin.com/in/nick-tanev/)
-Financial Consultant at Venat Capital Strategies
-frmr SEC Reporting Consultant at Workvia & frmr Regulatory Examiner at the CBOE. Nick has deep experience navigating the US financial regulatory system, business compliance, and raising capital.
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/HJ9kz1Vb6.png)

***Per our bylaws, Directors are not compensated for their role; they may be hired as staff.***

### Our Staff:
- **Ian Wylie Hedrick:** Executive Director
- **Nick Tanev:** Compliance Officer
- **TBD:** Grantwriter
- **TBD:** Videographer/ Editor

📝 *As a 501c3 non-profit corporation, our Board has strict fiduciary duties and multiple laws/ IRS tax codes to comply with. Per the TLDR, our ask is **300,000 USDC** to our financial manager's Endaoment smart contract address at 0xCAAfF3b2D946d944016464123547ef38824cA330. 

This funds 1st year startup costs and puts The City Farmers program in a position to generate revenue through crop production within the first year.

### **Grow Operations - 108,000 USDC**

- Compliance Officer: 12,000 USDC
- Grantwriter *(to be hired):* 50,000 USDC
- Videographer/ Editor *(to be hired):* 50,000 USDC

*tldr: 
Experiment with Prop House as a way to bring in long-term aligned players by running a round where the award is one Noun.*

Post-fork, the main goal for Nouns has been to create a stable environment where the auction attracts long-term aligned participants rather than arbitrageurs. The strategy includes increasing thoughtful spending, [testing out new mechanisms](https://w.mirror.xyz/AmHOzH-FQZVO3IhGXHSvCRxRSf2MO6VCZdmMwNEIyKE), and [rewarding Nouns to deserving contributors](https://www.nouns.camp/proposals/409).

The round's focus would be to bring in exceptional people who have previously contributed something meaningful in their respective fields. **Taking inspiration from [Brian Armstrong](https://twitter.com/brian_armstrong/status/1681439056323051529), the round will be an explicit invitation for interesting people who've done awesome things.** 


Here’s how the round would work:

- A two-week period for submitting proposals.
- A one-week period for voting.
- Open submission for all (with basic criteria to avoid spam).
- Voting conducted by Nouns voters.
- The proposer with the highest votes receives one Noun.

If the experiment is successful in attracting worthy participants, we could consider running continuous rounds to help allocate the 500+ Nouns in the treasury. Worth noting is that if it is indeed a success, more than helping allocate Nouns, these rounds could be a sort of Nouns-wide celebration akin to noun-o-clock.

Strong conviction that 1 Noun is a too-timid way to initiate a potentially transformative experiment. 

If sen/prop house wallet custodians disagree then these can be returned to the treasury, but hoping dao will choose to signal that it means business wrt recirculation at scale, and is not afraid to allocate appropriately to what is, by far, our most promising pathway towards achieving. 

There are 20+ people I can think of that easily deserve a permanent voice in Nouns, and I'm aware of probably <10% of what is going on in network.

if the fork aging requirement is added, there is additional risk of an expanding voting block counter-incentivized to increasing exit dilution.  

it's time to rapidly iterate on merit-based gov expansion

# Nouner Scout Rounds

*tldr: 
Experiment with Prop House as a way to bring in long-term aligned players by running a round where the award is one Noun.*

---

Post-fork, the main goal for Nouns has been to create a stable environment where the auction attracts long-term aligned participants rather than arbitrageurs. The strategy includes increasing thoughtful spending, [testing out new mechanisms](https://w.mirror.xyz/AmHOzH-FQZVO3IhGXHSvCRxRSf2MO6VCZdmMwNEIyKE), and [rewarding Nouns to deserving contributors](https://www.nouns.camp/proposals/409).

To advance this goal, I suggest conducting a trial round where a Noun is awarded through a Prop House round. The round's focus would be to bring in exceptional people who have previously contributed something meaningful in their respective fields. **Taking inspiration from [Brian Armstrong](https://twitter.com/brian_armstrong/status/1681439056323051529), the round will be an explicit invitation for interesting people who've done awesome things.** 


**Round parameters:**

- A two-week period for submitting proposals.
- A one-week period for voting.
- Open submission for all (with basic criteria to avoid spam).
- Voting conducted by Nouns voters.
- The proposer with the highest votes receives one Noun.

**Logistics:**
The nouns would be escrowed in a 2/3 safe managed by trusted community members [ccarella](https://twitter.com/ccarella), [necfas](https://twitter.com/necfas) and [seneca](https://twitter.com/cryptoseneca). 

If the experiment is successful in attracting worthy participants, we could consider running continuous rounds to help allocate the 500+ Nouns in the treasury. Worth noting is that if it is indeed a success, more than helping allocate Nouns, these rounds could be a sort of Nouns-wide celebration akin to noun-o-clock.

# Onchain Myth.

**To every age its art, to every art its freedom**.

**TL;DR:** I'm creating a graphic novel for readers who like sci-fi, and fantasy, integrating blockchain concepts and Nouns in a web3 world. Distribution will be digital and physical, with plans for translation in 4 Languages. The project development will be shared through videos, live streams, and Open Editions, aiming for completion in 10-12 months.

---

## **A Graphic Novel (Vol 1)**.
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BkNjEYyzT.png)
*Draft Cover/Poster*

I’m targeting Graphic Novel readers (15+) who love both sci-fi and fantasy + adventure, usually read action-packed stories, but also love tech, and (included but not limited) are crypto users. The artwork will include concepts related to decentralization, blockchain, and internet technologies, and Nouns will be the characters that inhabit this universe.

I firmly believe that we can find the right audience in Web3 at first, it’s an amazing niche to build a tech-oriented story and ultimately an onchain mythology, in which Nouns could be not only at the core of it but represent great values and a positive-sum culture.

To me, nouns are not only pixel characters, but something more, they are storytelling vehicles full of potential. And at the same time, there are dozens of small elements in our community lore to include in the story. 

---

## **Evolution of the Nouns aesthetics (from my POV):**
We all love the original Nouns, they are perfect as the source material, but they are also really adaptable to using them in different styles.
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/HyPczHAWa.png)
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/BJ-R9gHga.png)
*The last two images are from April-June 2022.*

 In this world-building adventure, I've given the term "Noun" a fresh perspective, digging into its meaning both on the surface and at a deeper, symbolic level. This project isn't just about testing how Nouns look; it's also about spinning an engaging tale. We want to hook current Noun fans and introduce new readers to our world, even if they're not blockchain or DAO experts.
 
---

## **Distribution:**
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rJE-Pclfa.png)
Draft Cover.

**Digital First:**
The main distribution strategy will be online (Free download from the website, manga/comic reader apps like Comixology, Viz Media, Kindle, and P2P/torrents).
Most of the dedicated comic reader apps have more than 500K users minimum, but in the case of bigger apps like Comixology or Viz Media, they have millions of users combined in both the App Store and Google Store.

**Physical:**
Physical copies will be handled through Amazon (highly efficient, global coverage, and no upfront costs). Plus, in case we can make a deal with regional publishers, it's easy to shut down the distribution of a translated version directly on Amazon.


**4 Languages:**
English, Spanish, Japanese, and French. 

I cannot emphasize enough the significance of translating the graphic novel. Translating the artwork can create opportunities for publication by one or multiple publishers in Europe, Asia, or North America. Since many major publishers prefer to review a complete work, and this being the first volume, it could serve as an ideal means to engage regional publishers worldwide.


---

## **Concept Art:**

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rJoFWSRZT.png)

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SJYtXrR-a.png)

---
## **Summary of the story (subject to changes):**


Meet Shady, a Noun who doesn't quite fit the mold of an obedient or exemplary citizen in a world teeming with adventurers, mysteries, and high achievers. His existence is a quiet rebellion in a society that prizes conformity. However, it seems destiny, if it exists, has grander designs for Shady. His insatiable curiosity catapults him into the uncharted territories of unexplored worlds.

As Shady embarks on this enigmatic journey, it becomes clear that more than just his life is at stake. The fate of his entire kind rests on his shoulders, and time is of the essence. He's faced with a dilemma: will he seize this opportunity to change the course of history or let it slip through his fingers?



## **Sample Pages**
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/ryDRkBRWp.png)


## **Characters from the first volume:**
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/Bk-7xu1zp.png)

**Featuring the NounBots:**

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/rJVbJ9xza.png)
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/S1nzkqeMa.png)
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SkRmycgM6.png)

---

## **Building in Public + Key Milestones:**

I’m also building a graphic style to present the development of the project to the public in a more entertaining way using videos and/or live streams. This way people can follow more closely the development of the graphic novel and can ask questions about nouns and their ecosystem.

The goal is to make 2 videos per week (1 to 2 hours each) showing the process of the Graphic Novel, the idea is to use Twitch or YouTube (ideally both).
I can also use propdates.wtf to show the latest news of the prop and the Manga channel in Farcaster.

![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/SyO0trwWa.png)
*This is a sample of how the videos could look like*.

## Key Milestones:

**Concept and Team (Months 1-3):**
Develop the storyline and artistic style.
Assemble and prepare the creative team.

**Production and Marketing (Months 4-10):**
Create the 64-page graphic novel while translating it into multiple languages.
Implement marketing and promotion strategies on online platforms.

**Distribution and Launch (Month 11-12):**
Plan and execute the distribution strategy for both digital and physical copies.
Officially launch the graphic novel, including online and potentially in-person events.

**Audience Engagement and Public Building (Ongoing):**
Continuously engage with the community on various platforms.
Adapt the project based on audience feedback and reception.

**Global Expansion and Future Planning (Ongoing):**
Start the conversations with external publishers to get the graphic novel.
Evaluate the project's performance and plan for the next chapters.
![](https://hackmd.io/_uploads/ByWvFmvG6.png)

---

## **Scope and Budget**:
Since this is a graphic novel of 64 pages I will need around 10 to 12 months to finish it.
The ideal deadline would be the next Nouniversary and I’ll push myself and the team involved to do so, but I’m organizing the dates including all the team efforts and the standard timeframes to make the deadline more realistic so it could be released in October/November next year.

---

## **Budget Breakdown:**

- **Preproduction - 8 eth**
  - World Building
  - Concept art 
  - Environment design
  - Character Sheets
  - Props Design 
- **Script - 8 eth**
- **Art Development - 29 eth**
  - Layouts - 6 eth
  - Pencils - 8 eth
  - Inks + Screentones - 11 eth
  - Lettering + VFX/SFX - 4 eth
- **Editorial - 6 eth**
  - Proofreading and formatting for each language.
  - Title and character/localization.
- **Translation - 8 eth**
  - Japanese, French, Spanish.
- **Marketing - 15 eth**
  - Contests / Collaborations
  - Promoted content inside specialized comic websites/forums.
  - Extra collectibles: Wallpapers (desktop and mobile), Open Editions, etc.
  - Promotional video.
- **Management - 10 eth.**
- **Website - 6 eth**
### **Total= 90 eth + Noun 81***

*I would need some extra help with the transfer of the Noun in case the DAO accepts the request.

# Nouns House #1 - Tokyo, Jpn

This proposal serves as an alternative to Proposal Candidate ["Nouns House DAO"](https://www.nouns.camp/candidates/-nouns-house-dao-1bde33dbc5c2ac7109c4a7ecf0d0a0a6cd6f57cc), offering a **phased approach to establishing a new Nounish subDAO called Nouns House DAO**. It outlines the first steps which includes creating the first Nouns House, mobile app, and website. As a second step, we plan to submit another proposal by February 2024 to fund the Nouns House DAO treasury followed by successful execution of this proposal. 

**We have already created the Nouns House DAO multi-sig [treasury](https://etherscan.io/address/0x1C99D1e81772aFF2eD0ABC802AA571B19cE2d72B), and all of the funding from this and future proposal will be going to the treasury.**

Thanks in advance for your support and feedback! ⌐◧-◧

## TL;DR

Hello! I am [tenichiliu.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/tenichiliu.eth), co-founder of Enabler DAO ([Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/enabler.fun/), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/enablerofficial), [Website](https://enablerdao.com/)). Our decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) focuses on gathering, utilizing, managing, and improving idle assets like unused houses and cars within communities worldwide. My fellow co-founder at Enabler DAO, [yukihamada.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/yukihamada.eth), is a holder of [Noun 312](https://nouns.wtf/noun/312), and we believe in the power of NounsDAO just as you do.

We are proposing a funding of **45,450 USDC** to give a Nounish makeover to a vacation rental property in Tokyo, Japan, valued over $1,000,000 USD. We intend to create “Nouns House #1” with this funding. Our property has already completed interior and exterior renovations; **all of the funding will be used for the Nounish makeover, and development of mobile apps & websites.**

We believe the Nouns model holds a huge potential in the realm of asset management. **The decentralized, community-led governance model combined with NFT auction may open new forms of asset sharing.** We plan to take this Nouns approach of asset management and expand the Nouns House brand into a scalable global business.

In alignment with NounsDAO’s **CC0 philosophy**, we will make all software and hardware implemented in this project open source. Furthermore, we plan to collaborate with the Nouns projects active in Japan such as [pNouns](https://pnouns.wtf/en/) ([Noun 553](https://nouns.wtf/noun/553), [Noun 556](https://nouns.wtf/noun/556)), to add Nounish elements to Nouns House #1.

**The diverse industry experience of our team will significantly contribute to the success of this project.** [yukihamada.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/yukihamada.eth) is a former executive CPO at Mercari, [yukill.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/yukill.eth) is a former CEO at ZOZO Technologies, [Jiro](https://twitter.com/jiroisagame) is a former YouTuber with 1.3 million subscribers, and I, [tenichiliu.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/tenichiliu.eth), am a former engineer from Amazon Seattle.

This proposal was inspired by [Nouns Deli](https://twitter.com/NounsDeli)’s proposal ([Proposal 254](https://nouns.wtf/vote/254), approved on 03/09/2023). Our next step is to establish a Nounish subDAO, called “Nouns House DAO”. Similar to the [Nouns Builder Protocol](https://nouns.build/) ([Proposal 167](https://nouns.wtf/vote/167), approved on 11/12/2022), we aim to create a subDAO inheriting NounsDAO’s auction, treasury, and governance system. We plan to create Nouns House #2 and subsequent Nouns Houses based on community decisions governed by Nouns House DAO.

## 1.  Nouns House DAO ⌐◧-◧

Nouns House #1 created through this proposal will serve as the first Nouns House governed by Nouns House DAO. Following the successful execution of this proposal, we will submit a 2nd proposal to establish the Nouns House DAO as a Nounish subDAO. **Our goal is to create Nouns House in major cities around the world where people can experience Nouns art and culture.** Nouns House DAO will be responsible for the operation and financial management of all Nouns Houses. 100% of the funds secured in our proposals will be transferred to the treasury of Nouns House DAO.

**Enabler DAO is a asset sharing community that aims to facilitate easy sharing of large assets like houses and cars by leveraging blockchain and AI technology.** As of October 2023, we operate 10 properties across 5 locations (Tokyo, Kyoto, Atami, Teshikaga, and Honolulu) in Japan and the United States. These properties are monetized through asset sharing within the community as well as through Online Travel Agencies (OTAs) such as Airbnb and Booking.com. The app utilizes the Solana blockchain, which offers a rich selections of tools and packages for on-chain development. Solana also supports user-friendly multi-chain wallets like Phantom. Moreover, the low gas fees on Solana enable cost-effective transactions.

We are incorporating a **token-gating** feature into the app to offer special coupons and priority reservations to Nouns House NFT holders (and more). The app will also handle room **inventory management** and automatically notify cleaners once a reservation is confirmed. Nouns House NFT holders can **earn utility tokens by contributing to the community by completing gigs listed in the app.**

The app will accept **credit cards and cryptocurrencies** as form of payment. It will also be fully integrated with the **smart home features**, enhancing guest experiences through mobile-operable smart locks (Sesame Lock) and smart lights (Philips Hue). ## **7. Community Benefits ⌐◧-◧**

**This proposal aims to expand the Nouns community by creating the first "Nouns House", a network of properties where people can experience Nouns art and culture in major cities worldwide.**

In the next step, we will propose to establish Nouns House DAO, Nounish subDAO, that will own Real World Asset (RWA) and operate them as a profit-making business, and to scale the Nouns House brand as a global brand. RWA is an area where the web3 industry is still struggling, and this new venture has the potential to significantly advance the industry on this front.

Both Nouns and Nouns House NFT holders will be offered special perks such as discounted rates and priority access to Nouns Houses via token gating. Additionally, upon the funding of the Nouns House DAO treasury in our next proposal, **existing Nouns NFT holders can apply for Nouns House NFT airdrop by a pre-determined date**. This airdrop is optional and provides an opportunity for existing NounsDAO members to participate in the governance for Nouns House DAO without having to bid in the auction. 

## **8. CC0 ⌐◧-◧**

We believe, Nouns House’s CC0 culture will bring innovation to the real estate industry. While real estate design and architecture are generally not open-source, we will make all of these publicly available through our CC0 library. CC0 approach will also have a large impact on the vacation rental industry. By providing tools to help achieve efficient operations, we will accelerate the automation and digital transformation of the traditionally labor intensive and manual vacation rental industry. **The interest and attention that this CC0 model will generate within these industries will serve as the ideal platform for spreading the culture and values of Nouns.**

## **9. Risks & Considerations ⌐◧-◧**

We are enthusiastic members of the Nouns community and, as Noun owner, strongly resonate with the vision of Nouns. **We believe that the Nouns model holds innovative power in asset management and vacation rental fields.** This decentralized, community-led governance model has the potential to offer new approaches in asset sharing and feels like the ideal way to manage assets in a decentralized manner. On the other hand, there are some risks considered in achieving the vision of this project:

1. **Regulatory Risk**: Operating within a decentralized framework could potentially make the project subject to regulations. Compliance with local laws is crucial.
2. **Technical Risk**: The integration of blockchain technology with physical assets like real estate presents several challenges. The implementation of smart contracts to manage the property must be executed flawlessly.
3. **Community Engagement**: The strength of a DAO lies in its community. For long-term success, it's important to maintain community engagement and participation in governance.

By acknowledging these risks and proactively addressing them, we aim for the success of the Nouns House project.

# Nouns : A Movie - Chapter 3, 4 & 5! ⌐◨-◨

### Tl;dr:
This specific prop is seeking funding to create **Episode 3, 4 & 5 with a run-time of 10.5-11 mins each** delivered within 240 days.

#### What is Atrium?
Atrium is a crypto-native network of independent artists and creators. Disciplines represented on Atrium currently include Screenwriting, Animation, Concept Art, VFX, Voice Actors, and Music production. Together, creatives on Atrium bring the best ranging experiences from **Pixar, Marvel, Luma Pictures, Sony, Netflix & many more.**

---
### Proposal Ask:
 1,125,000 (375K X 3) USD for a time-period of 240 days.

> Note: *Ask is following the funding breakdown shared in the original kick-off [proposal 245](https://nouns.wtf/vote/245).*  

#### Proposal timeline progress
![](https://i.postimg.cc/wBLDJgz6/3244.png)

#### Why Ask for 3 episodes at once?
- Working on 3 month-long milestones at a time was tuned in to showcase proof-of-work to DAO and drive accountability forward.


- Since then [Nouns Movie](https://twitter.com/nounsmovie) team has led by example, on what it means to be transparent in production process and keeping community at large in the loo.


- What we realised however, this introduced inefficiency in securing long-term senior talent to be available to work on the film as they have no guarantee on whether they will still be working on the film after 3 months (*for e.g. followup proposals not passing*). We are often competing against traditional studio contracts for senior talent.
  
- Funding 3 episodes upfront will enable us to introduce batching of tasks for pre-production and animation, making the process much more predictable to manage. 


- More funding committed for the film will enable us to pre-empt discussions with distribution partners who will have a clearer picture of financing on the project and high likelihood of it being fully completed once they commit.

# NounsWatch: Nouns Iconic cc0 Timepieces ⌐◨-◨ ⌚ (V2)

# 

# tldr
1. **Why funding a NounsWatch?**
    - **Cultural Capital**: In the digital age, physical products with a cultural and fashion statement become powerful tools of social reach and influence. They serve as “physical memes," carrying the DAO's brand and ideals into new spaces.
    - **Leveraging Existing Success**: Building upon the memetical success of the sunglasses, the NounsWatch diversifies the DAO's brand to new places and moments, making it more resilient and future proof.
    - **Broader Audience**: This opens up the growing fashion watch market and audiences in numbers never reached before.
    - **Revenue Share**: With a 10% return of sales revenue to the DAO's treasury, the NounsWatch contributes to the much need flywheel spin.
    - **Open Source Legacy**: By making the blueprints and digital models public domain (CC0), the project stands to benefit the broader community, true to NounsDAO open-source nature.
2. **What is the NounsDAO funding covering?**
    - The partially done product development.
    - The minimum order quantity of 1000 watches (Dwiss will cover overproduction)
    - The launch campaign.
    - The team compensation ensuring the project’s success from inception to market.
3. **What is the Go-to-Market Strategy?**
    - Position the NounsWatch collection in the prominent affordable fashion watch segment.
    - Run a Pre-sale discount Drop on Indiegogo massive 10 million people audience.
    - Continue selling on Shopify.
    - Run Influence Marketing and User Generated Content campaigns.
    - Keep on building.

![](https://i.imgur.com/qj6bN2J.png)

# A new hero product for Nouns

The NounsWatch serves as a new, tangible interface for the Nouns brand. Designed to be worn day and night, it reaches places that the Noggles glasses can't. This watch represents a powerful demonstration of what the Nouns community can achieve, extending the brand's narrative into an entirely new realm of self-expression. It seamlessly combines nounishness and horology, on the verge of becoming **the most personal and novel product Nouns has ever created**.

![](https://i.imgur.com/PleFEx9.png)
## The NounsWatch cc0 design: accessible to everyone

Created by renowned watch designer Rafael Miranda, the bold Noggle-inspired design is **half a watch and half a ⌐◨-◨**, literally. And like all nounish things should be, it’s cc0!



It's as much about functionality as it is about meticulous attention to detail. It features an exquisite *mysterious hours* full day half display, with a glass mirror and a black dial. The hour and minute handles are individual pieces that combines every hour to form the Noggles symbol. On the NounsWatch, **every hour is Noun O'Clock!**

![](https://i.imgur.com/NC00WLn.gif)

## The most personal Nouns product yet

Explore a diverse range of personalization options with the interchangeable straps. Choose from 8 solid colors for the body and straps, or select one of the 8 available Nouns Accessory-themed straps. With 128 unique combinations, the NounsWatch will fits various styles.

![](https://i.imgur.com/9ptDzga.png)

## First Prototypes

To demonstrate our unwavering commitment to the project, not only have we developed two 3D-printed prototypes, as shown below, but we've also field-tested the product for comfort and fit on the wrists. Just imagine how stunning these will look when adorned with the final production finish and colorful straps! Watch the prototype live in video: [here](https://x.com/rsmiranda/status/1714557390241059120?s=20) and [here.](https://x.com/fabioseva/status/1714901327631843711?s=46&t=OnA_W289RIsplarDuhpSrg)
Note: The current brand identity will be revised for production version.
![](https://i.imgur.com/PekUrdI.png)

## Final Product Specs

**Case:** Injected Polycarbonate, 42 mm x 42 mm x 6 mm.
**Movement:** Japanese.
**Dial**: Exquisite half display reading system, black dial with contrasting numbers.
**Glass:** Mineral glass with anti-reflective coating. 
**Strap:** Soft Silicone.
**Water resistance:** Yes (3ATM)

---

# Dwiss: a decade of innovation

DWISS - the manufacturer - is a niche watch brand founded in 2011 by Rafael Miranda, a former professor of watch design in Milan, Italy. His accolades include several design awards and publications in the watch industry.

The brand is committed to craft distinctive timepieces that stands out with innovative designs and groundbreaking features, including the use of pioneering materials and early adoption of web3 technology such as cryptocurrency, NFTs and metaverse experiences in the watch space.

![](https://i.imgur.com/p8gK5Fi.png)

![](https://c1.iggcdn.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1694722112/t9ce7v5l3t52g3azgydp.png)

![](https://c1.iggcdn.com/indiegogo-media-prod-cld/image/upload/c_limit,w_695/v1694722042/xhyf0mdtyqkfiip0plmr.jpg)


## Contemporary distribution methods

DWISS also excels in modern distribution methods. Leveraging the power of crowdfunding and Direct-to-Consumer (D2C) strategies, launching multiple campaigns and mastering influencer and digital advertising. These accomplishments attest to DWISS's strong marketing and sales capabilities, setting a **solid foundation for the success of our Go-to-Market strategy for NounsWatch**.

Crowdfunding campaigns that generated more than USD $1.5 million.
![](https://i.imgur.com/U5gHT6Y.png)

Dwiss have a portfolio of influencers that have millions of followers especially in Youtube, but also instagram, facebook, blogs and magazines.
![](https://i.imgur.com/JS08Qcu.png)

Dwiss masters Digital Advertising, generating 9.4 millions of impressions, and 109k clicks in 2023 alone.
![](https://i.imgur.com/f3G84AV.png)

---

# A unparalleled opportunity to reach a new audience

We meticulously planned a winning Go-to-Market Strategy to make the most of it with optimal resources. **The NounsWatch collection seizes an unparalleled opportunity of introducing Nouns to a whole new audience.** 

## Step 0: Entering the Affordable Fashion Market

In an industry that generated over $70 billion in 2022, fashion ranks as the second most significant reason people wear watches, trailing only behind timekeeping. This largely accounts for why the fashion watch segment records the highest annual unit sales in the tens of millions. **The NounsWatch collection pricing and style aims to secure a position in the largest portion of this growing segment: the sub-$200 fashion watch market.**

That said, time to sell.

![](https://i.imgur.com/DprKVhF.png)

## Step 1: A pre-sale shortcut to meet 10 Million customers on Indiegogo

A common challenge to IRL products is meeting the minimum order quantities (MOQ) whilst ensuring enough demand for the product. And for custom designed watches, the MOQ of 1000 pieces makes the equation a bit challenging. 

Thanks to Dwiss successful track record on Indiegogo campaigns we can have a reputable access to create a Drop.

An Indiegogo Drop is an exclusive offer for qualified business that serves a discount pre-sale channel without the need for the regular crowdfunding. The highlight is the added layer of marketing to reach the fullest of Indiegogo’s 10 million monthly visitors and 1 million combined social media followers from 235 countries.

Dwiss will launch a NounsWatch Drop pre-sale for the price of ~~$189.00~~ $129.00 with [teaser videos and images](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r7ZsbPHqzFw) that will feature Nouns on the homepage of the Indiegogo website, as well as in related content such as carousels, newsletters, and social media.

**By doing so, we aim to generate sufficient demand for NounsWatch, particularly from outside the Nouns and watchmaking communities, thus bringing it closer to mainstream media and markets.**

![](https://i.imgur.com/exRMxAh.png)

## Step 2: Continuous sale on the NounsWatch Shopify store

After the presale window concludes, sales will resume in our website [nounswatch.com](http://nounswatch.com/) for $189.00 ($169.00 for selected communities), where we will accept both fiat currency and cryptocurrency. Leveraging the same proven digital marketing strategy that Dwiss employs for its products, we are going to use a share of the sales profit in Digital Advertising to generate millions of impressions and drive hundreds of thousands of clicks to our website, until the point of delivery and after. If demand falls short, Dwiss name is in play. We bear the risk and will undertake the responsibility of selling the product.

![](https://i.imgur.com/jIsZVSV.jpg)

## Step 3: Ding-dong! Delivery Time

Upon receiving the initial shipment from the factory, we'll start fulfilling orders through both Indiegogo and Shopify channels. At the same time, we'll ramp up our marketing efforts to stimulate new demand, focusing on a broad [influencer campaign and a user-generated content initiative](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL5h5gh3ZqPzjm_Rrt6FKdrTbbJ00IF9Es). **This is a pivotal moment for the NounsWatch and Nouns history, and we are committed to maximizing its impact.**

![](https://i.imgur.com/wztkALV.png)

## Step 4: The NounsWatch Legacy

**Spin the Flywheel (new!)**
Regardless the supply, **10% of every NounsWatch collection sales revenue will be sent back to the Treasury** and submitted to Propdates. Assuming a pre-sale sold-out of 1000 pieces, the gross revenue would be $129,000. 10% of this ($12,900) goes back to the DAO treasury, further reducing the actual costs to the DAO. Sales out of the pre-sale window generate more revenue.

**Release the IP (new!)**
The NounsWatch blueprint and 3d files **will be cc0, fully available on the public domain**.

**Everyday, forever (new!)**
The objective for NounsWatch is not to exist as a limited edition, but rather to establish it as a standard product in the Dwiss partnership lineup. **We will sustain production for as long as consumer demand remains**, and may release new straps, models, and features when deemed appropriate.

**Warranty and Customer Support**
Dwiss will provide a world-class ongoing support and warranty for customers after 2 years they have purchased NounsWatch.

---

## **Funds Allocation**

We have meticulously planned the budget to ensure optimal allocation of funds across all critical aspects of the project. Our financial strategy for V2 has been redesigned to sustain our competitive pricing strategy while accommodating the increased workload of the team until the sales take-off. 

We have estimated the financial requirements for the NounsWatch project as follows:

- $5,000 - Development
- $90,000 - NounsWatch and straps (1,000 pieces)
- $10,000 - Packaging
- $25,000 - External Labor and Taxes
- $14,000 - First-Class Video and 3D Production (third-party services)
- $7,000 - Indiegogo Drop Paid Feature Package
- $18,000 - Team Compensation

**TOTAL ASK: $169,000 USDC**
Wallet: [dwiss.eth](https://etherscan.io/address/0x80b0b325D6A1E19953dFffb6Cc117263916796F8)

## Timeline

![](https://i.imgur.com/UK7lhJP.png)

---

## Team

[Fabio Seva](https://x.com/fabioseva) - Concept & Marketing
LilNoun#125, nouns-pilled founder of [Public Good Beer](https://twitter.com/publicgoodbeer?s=21&t=OnA_W289RIsplarDuhpSrg)
[Rafael Miranda](https://x.com/rsmiranda) - Design
LilNoun#7753, watch designer and Dwiss founder
[Dwiss](https://x.com/dwisswatch) - Production and operations

---

**Acknowledgments:** we would like to thank the dozens of comments we received during V1, which enabled us to develop this new version. By participating in this project, the DAO is not just 'spending' on a product but making a strategic investment in invaluable brand equity. This intangible value—captured through consumer engagement, social influence, and expanded market reach—is an asset that can far outlive the investment, providing a return that is difficult to quantify. It’s important to understand that the full impact of this investment will unfold over time, requiring a level of trust in the project’s long-term vision and execution.

# Bounce Nouns Across the Metaverse [UPDATED w/ Feedback Q&A]

# TL;DR

The Nouns community has created high quality libraries of Nouns artwork and assets that are incredibly all in the public domain. These are fantastic resources for developers and designers, but can be difficult for non-technical audiences to use. We want to bring accessibility and utility of Nouns to **everyone** by providing a simple, seamless way to use Nouns avatars and art across the best digital platforms and spaces. 

![nounsIntegrations](https://baunsu.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/nouns/pineappleMosaic.gif)

## Proposal brief
With the Bounce platform, we want to bridge the Nouniverse and the open Metaverse:

- make current and future Nouns easily to use, seamlessly, across digital platforms ⇒ **everyone** can experience and enjoy Nouns, forever
- bring exposure in more spaces to new audiences, both web3 and web2 ⇒ **grow** Nouns community
- build and open and extensible system with a Bounce API & SDK ⇒ **empower** community to innovate and build on top of Bounce

## Feedback Q&A

**onizuka.eth - Abstained**

**Q**: I think there is a value in proliferating across Snap/Instagram, but I think there has already been progress made on filters there (from CoralOrca?) I'm not sure what exactly the public API would be for? general infrastructure like this can be valuable, but I'm not optimistic about something like the bounce site getting any sort of use from such a decentralized org like Nouns

**A**: Great feedback and thanks for bringing up these points. CoralOrca and 0xFloyd have done fantastic work on [social filters](https://www.snapchat.com/explore/nouns/lenses), as well as [Noun 3D models](https://3dnouns.xyz/). This proposal builds on top of both of these by providing a hub where all experiences are easily accessible, not only social filters but also VR Chat, Mona, and any other platforms that will be integrated into Bounce in the future.

Our goal is to make these cross-platform experiences easily accessible through all DAO projects, both web (with a public API to link directly to Nouns experiences) and physical (Bounce NFC tags, QR codes). The Bounce site will act as a hub for Nouns and other onboarded projects, and will help bring in other users and communities into the Nouniverse.

## Budget

We’re asking for 15 ETH (to the Bounce multisig safe) to onboard Nouns onto Bounce and enable cross-world experiences.
The budget includes:

- Build a Nouns X Bounce community microsite
- Cost of asset onboarding and processing all existing and future Nouns for the following platforms:
    - VRChat
    - Mona
    - Snap
    - Instagram
- Making Bounce connections free for everyone, across all spaces, forever
- Developing new platform integrations for spaces the Nouns community is excited about

# Proposal

Bounce is a new cross-world digital asset platform that makes it easy for fans and collectors to embody their avatars in immersive web2 and web3 platforms, and connect with their communities. Our goal is to empower avatar communities to embody their avatars, express themselves and come together in more immersive and engaging ways.

This proposal is to onboard Nouns onto Bounce as an early partner, making Nouns enjoyable by the community across a range of digital spaces, including social, gaming and metaverse platforms

## How Bounce benefits the Nouns community

- Easily enjoy Nouns as avatars, sticker packs, face filters and more across social, gaming and metaverse platforms
- Expand the community and reach of the Nouns brand and content across digital spaces
- Access more platforms and experiences as they roll out, new spaces are available to all Nouns, new and existing
- Support other DAO projects with public API and SDK that make “bouncing” a seamless and hassle-free process
- Bounce Tags support phygital projects with easy onboarding and allocated stock
- Nouns on Bounce will be free for everyone, forever

## Deliverables

The project is estimated at 1.5 to 2 months and will include:

- **A unique Bounce X Nouns microsite** where the community can go to bounce across spaces and enjoy exclusive content. This site also acts as a landing page for special Nouns events and activations across spaces. (EXAMPLE MOCKUP BELOW)
    
    ![nounsMicrositeMockup.jpg](https://baunsu.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/nouns/nounsPage.jpg)
    
- **Cross platform digital avatars** that can be used as in-space characters, face lenses and filters, sticker packs and more across a range of platforms.
    
    Platforms include:
    
  - VR Chat
    
    ![VRChat Nouns](https://baunsu.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/nouns/vrchatGifNouns.gif)

    
  - Mona
    
    ![Mona Nouns](https://baunsu.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/nouns/monaGif.gif)
  
    
  - AR Filters: (ROUGH PROTOTYPE BELOW)
    - Snap
    - Instagram
    
    ![AR Filter Nouns](https://baunsu.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/nouns/social+lenses.gif)

    
- More spaces the community is excited about
- **Public API, SDK and docs** that can be used by other DAO projects to give utility to digital assets and make bouncing a hassle free integration.
- **Free access to everyone, across all spaces, forever**

We also commit to posting frequent updates on https://www.updates.wtf/ to keep the community informed on progress and updates, both as the proposal is developed, and as future platforms and experiences are rolled out and made available.

# Future proposals

## Bounce X Nouniverse events and community activations

We think the best way to experience bounce as a community is through special events, gatherings and activations. Our collab with the Wassies community was made so much more exciting by their VR Chat Among Us and Zombie Survival (https://twitter.com/ByWassiesEvents)

As Nouns is decentralized, we’d like to put forward future proposals to design, plan, coordinate and market events and games across platforms.

## Bounce Tags for DAO and community projects

Bounce Tags, our secure chain-linked NFC tags, are integrated into the Bounce ecosystem and make bouncing from a physical collectible to digital spaces a quick and seamless experience. Many DAO proposals are dedicated to crafting both amazing new Nouns physical products (Noggle Changers, NounsDAO x Pudgy Penguins toys, NOUNISH FRIENDS mini-figures, etc), and these could all be linked using tags (think tapping your Nouns glasses and bouncing to Nouns AR filters and more). We would like to put forward a future proposal to provide tags for community projects (as part of their proposals) that will be custom designed, programmed and integrated with our support. 

# Who we are

## About Bounce

Bounce is a new cross-world avatar platform that makes it easy for fans and collectors to embody their avatars in immersive web2 and web3 platforms, and connect with their communities. We automate all platform-specific integrations, such as coding, rigging, file conversions and API & SDK connections, making it simple to use a unique physical or digital collectible (such as NFTs, sneakers, trading cards and more), generated based on unique traits, as an avatar across platforms. Our Bounce Tag uses active encryption NFC to ensure a secure and permanent link between authentic physical goods and their digital counterparts.

- Learn more about Bounce - [letsbounce.gg](http://www.letsbounce.gg/)

## Bounce partnerships with avatar communities

A great example of how Bounce can help engage and activate a web3 community is our recent partnership with Wassies. Bounce allows the Wassies community to enjoy their fridge-dwelling creatures in new ways, from face filters on Snap and Instagram, to custom avatars on VR Chat, and create unique HD renders of their Wassie. 

Wassies on Bounce can be viewed by everyone, holders can bounce their held ones, and CC0 Wassies are available for everyone to bounce.

Response from the Wassies community has been great, and the team has created a series of engaging events on Twitter and VR Chat that brought together fans and holders to play games, show off their unique renders and wassify their socials. 

Below is footage from a Wassies concert in VRChat this weekend, powered by the Bounce VRChat integration.  
![Wassie Event](https://baunsu.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/nouns/wassiesEvent.gif)

## Links

- [Microsite for Bounce collab with Wassies](https://beta.letsbounce.gg/wassies)
- [Wassies announcement tweet](https://twitter.com/bywassies/status/1709554217331949818) (41.4k impressions)
- [Wassies VRChat event](https://twitter.com/bywassies/status/1710625261178228794)

## The Team

Bounce is developed by Barak & Jasper, experienced creative technologists and builders in web3. Previously, they worked together at a Japanese art collective, [teamLab](https://www.teamlab.art/), and in 2021 they co-founded [Strata](https://www.strata.gallery/), a digital art incubator.  At Strata, they developed [DenDekaDen](https://www.dendekaden.com/) with Toei Animation (the Japanese animation studio behind One Piece and Dragon Ball Z).

- More on [Barak](https://twitter.com/barakchamo)
- More on [Jasper](https://www.linkedin.com/in/jasper-degens-7269a256/)
